āśauce nitya naimittika ādi

original: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ brahmayajñādikaṃ tathā // Ang_1.94 //
analyzed: nityam naimittikam kāmyam brahmayajña ādikam tathā

original: na svādhyāyaṃ na vā homaṃ na sabhāyāḥ praveśanam /
analyzed: na svādhyāyam na vā homam na sabhāyāḥ praveśanam
preta kṛtya rodhe

original: kurvīta manasā saṃdhyāṃ na svādūni ca bhakṣayet // Ang_1.95 //
analyzed: kurvīta manasā saṃdhyām na svādūni ca bhakṣayet

original: tāni kuryāttu mohena sa preto na sahiṣyati /
analyzed: tāni kuryāt tu mohena sa pretaḥ na sahiṣyati
śāpam ghoram dadāti eva tasmāt tad kṛtya rodhanam
manasā api na kurvīta tat cāṇḍālam prakīrtitam

original: kṛtyaṃ ghoraṃ hi duṣṭaṃ tat tādṛśaṃ na tadācaret // Ang_1.97 //
analyzed: kṛtyam ghoram hi duṣṭam tat tādṛśam na tat ācaret
ati anyāya ādi kalau na kārayet
ati anyāyam ati droham ati krauryam kalau api

original: atyakramaṃ cātyaśāstraṃ na kuryānna ca kārayet // Ang_1.98 //
analyzed: ati akramam ca ati śāstram na kuryāt na ca kārayet
yadi kurvīta mohena sadyas vilayam eṣyati

original: kartā kārayitā cāpi prerakaśca nirodhakaḥ // Ang_1.99 // [014]
analyzed: kartā kārayitā ca api prerakaḥ ca nirodhakaḥ
tad sahāyaḥ ca sarve te layam eṣyanti satvaram

original: gṛhakṣetrādikaṃ sarvaṃ na nityaṃ śubhakāriṇaḥ // Ang_1.100 //
analyzed: gṛha kṣetra ādikam sarvam na nityam śubha kāriṇaḥ

original: tannimittamidaṃ rūpaṃ pāpaṃ martyo na cā '; 'caret /
analyzed: tad nimittam idam rūpam pāpam martyaḥ na caret
āgāmi sūtakam jñātvā samupakrānta karmaṇaḥ
aṅga apakarṣaṇam nā eva kuryāt iti manoḥ matam
samāgate sūtake samupakrānta karmaṇaḥ
aṅgāni tad tad kāleṣu kuryāt tatra na sūtakī

original: bhavedeva tadā sadyo gate tasmin punastathā // Ang_1.103 //
analyzed: bhavet eva tadā sadyas gate tasmin punar tathā
jīt pitṛka piṇḍapitṛyajña ādi śrāddham
api jīvat pitā piṇḍapitṛyajñam samācaret

original: māsi śrāddhaṃ tathā homād aṣṭakāṃ pitṛyajñataḥ // Ang_1.104 //
analyzed: māsi śrāddham tathā homāt aṣṭakām pitṛyajñataḥ
pituḥ viyogāt paratas piṇḍa dānam samācaret

original: tenāyaṃ śrāddhakartā syānna mātuḥ piṇḍadānataḥ // Ang_1.105 //
analyzed: tena ayam śrāddha kartā syāt na mātuḥ piṇḍa dānataḥ

original: jīve pitari cecchrāddhe prāpte naimittike yadi /
analyzed: jīve pitari ced śrāddhe prāpte naimittike yadi

original: yebhya eva pitā dadyāt tebhyo dadyāttu tatsutaḥ // Ang_1.106 //
analyzed: yebhyaḥ eva pitā dadyāt tebhyaḥ dadyāt tu tad sutaḥ

original: evaṃ pitāmahe jīve yebhyo dadyāt sa hi svayam /
analyzed: evam pitāmahe jīve yebhyaḥ dadyāt sa hi svayam

original: tebhyo dadyāttu tatpautras tathā syātpripitāmahe // Ang_1.107 // [015]
analyzed: tebhyaḥ dadyāt tu tad pautraḥ tathā syāt pri pitāmahe
pitari saṃnyaste pātitya ādi dūṣite tat pitṛ ādi śrāddham
saṃnyaste patite tāte bhrānta citte cala ātmani

original: tatkartṛkāṇi śrāddhāni svayaṃ putraḥ samācaret // Ang_1.108 //
analyzed: tad kartṛkāṇi śrāddhāni svayam putraḥ samācaret

original: tattatkāleṣu vidhivac chrāddhakartā na tena saḥ /
analyzed: tad tad kāleṣu vidhivat śrāddha kartā na tena saḥ
teṣām akaraṇāt saḥ yam sadyas caṇḍāla tām vrajet
śrāddha adhikārī piṇḍasya dāna mātreṇa jāyate

original: ṛtviktvena vṛte tasmin na tu kartā bhavedayam // Ang_1.110 //
analyzed: ṛtvij tvena vṛte tasmin na tu kartā bhavet ayam
pituḥ piṇḍa pradānena śrāddha kartā bhavet ayam
śrāddha adhikāra sidhi artham kuryāt ekādaśe hani
pārvaṇam tad vidhānena pituḥ siddheḥ anantaram
karmandī brahma bhūtasya tadā tasmin niyojayet
pratisaṃvatsaram siddhidine śrāddham samācaret
paścāt ārādhanam kuryāt tasmin na u ced pare hani
brahma bhūtasya tasya asya sarva deva ādi rūpiṇaḥ

original: saṃgacchate pitṛtvaṃ ca tena rūpeṇa taṃ tathā // Ang_1.114 //
analyzed: saṃgacchate pitṛ tvam ca tena rūpeṇa tam tathā
tasmin śrāddha dine bhaktyā yajet eva vidhānataḥ
tādṛś tat yajanam ca asya śrāddha nāmaka karmaṇaḥ
adhikāri tva sidhi artham tasmāt tena eva tam yajet

original: na mātaraṃ pitṛtvena yajeta tu kathaṃcana // Ang_1.116 //
analyzed: na mātaram pitṛ tvena yajeta tu kathaṃcana
pitṛ tvam mātari gatam eka śeṣa jam alpakam

original: yathā na tatkāryakaraṃ mātṛtvamapi tattathā // Ang_1.117 //
analyzed: yathā na tat kārya karam mātṛ tvam api tat tathā
pitṛvya patnī ādīnām
pitṛvya patnī ādīnām syāt tādṛś patnī tvam eva hi

original: tāsāṃ bhavati tasmāttu na tanmātṛtvamucyate // Ang_1.118 //
analyzed: tāsām bhavati tasmāt tu na tad mātṛ tvam ucyate
pitṛ tvam api mātṛ tvam dānataḥ nāśam eṣyataḥ

original: tatkarmaṇi punaḥ prāpte jananītvādinā bhavet // Ang_1.119 //
analyzed: tad karmaṇi punar prāpte jananī tva ādinā bhavet
pitṛ tvam api mātṛ tvam ekatra eva hi tiṣṭhati
na tiṣṭhati tat anyatra kriyā śata sahasrakāt
gauṇa mātari
gauṇa mātari mātṛ tvam puraskṛtya artha lobhataḥ

original: samuccārya kriyāṃ kuryān na sā tadgā bhaveddhruvam // Ang_1.121 //
analyzed: samuccārya kriyām kuryāt na sā tad gā bhavet dhruvam
lobhāt mātṛ tvam anyāsu yadi nikṣipya mohataḥ
kriyām kuryāt jaḍa matiḥ sadyas caṇḍāla tām vrajet
a tasmin tattvam āropya saṃskuryāt yadi kāmataḥ

original: niṣphalaṃ yāti tatkarma so 'pi pātityamāpnuyāt // Ang_1.123 //
analyzed: niṣphalam yāti tat karma saḥ u pi pātityam āpnuyāt
pitṛ tvam janitari eva mukhyatas nyatra gauṇatas

original: tatpuraskṛtya cetkarma kṛtamanyaiḥ punaḥ kriyāṃ // Ang_1.124 // [017]
analyzed: tat puraskṛtya ced karma kṛtam anyaiḥ punar kriyām
vihitena eva putra tvam svīkāreṇa na ca anyatas
samavāpnoti bandhūnām rāja vidvas anujñayā
bhrātṛ jaḥ kṛta dāraḥ kṛta kriyaḥ pi
bhrātṛ jaḥ vākyataḥ pitroḥ jyaiṣṭhya kāniṣṭhya varjitaḥ
putra tvam samavāpnoti kṛta dāraḥ kṛta kriyaḥ
saḥ pi ekaḥ ced avāpnoti na ubhayoḥ tu tathā vidhiḥ

original: janiturmukhyasūnuḥ syād anyasya guṇataḥ sutaḥ // Ang_1.127 //
analyzed: janituḥ mukhya sūnuḥ syāt anyasya guṇataḥ sutaḥ
mātula tva pitṛvya tva suta tva ādi anubandhakam

original: mukhyato yasya yadvā syāt taduddiśyaiva tatkriyā // Ang_1.128 //
analyzed: mukhyatas yasya yat vā syāt tat uddiśya eva tad kriyā
mukhya anubandham tyaktvā yaḥ karma kuryāt pramādataḥ

original: pitṛvyādikamuccārya punaḥ kuryāttu tāṃ kriyām // Ang_1.129 //
analyzed: pitṛvya ādikam uccārya punar kuryāt tu tām kriyām
gotra nāma anubandha vyatyāse
gotra nāma anubandhānām vyatyāsena api anehasaḥ

original: yadi kuryātkriyāṃ tāṃ vai punaḥ kuryādyathāvidhi // Ang_1.130 //
analyzed: yadi kuryāt kriyām tām vai punar kuryāt yathāvidhi
upanītaḥ tu ced upanetṛ tvena eva tad kriyā
bhayapa tvena bhayape pitṛvya tvena tādṛśe
tad tad uccāraṇam kṛtvā tat tat karma samācaret
tat anyathā kṛtam tat ced samyak bhūyas samācaret
kartari dūra ge preṣya tvena kurvīta
mukhya kartṛ asamīpe nyaḥ na kuryāt sva anubandhataḥ
tat preṣya tvena kurvīta preṣitaḥ tena vai vṛtaḥ
a vṛtaḥ tena tad preṣya tvena tad dūra ge sati
kṛtam ced karma tat bhūyas saṃkalpa ādi samācaret
anyena kṛte vāc mātra dāne śrāddha mātram
vāṅmātradatta putraḥ tu kṛtadāraḥ kṛta kriyaḥ

original: grāhakasya na kurvīta darśādi na kadācana /
analyzed: grāhakasya na kurvīta darśa ādi na kadācana

original: tatpatnyāstasya ca śrāddhamātraṃ samyak samācaret // Ang_1.136 //
analyzed: tad patnyāḥ tasya ca śrāddha mātram samyak samācaret
prativarṣam prayatnena na darśa ādikam ācaret

original: satāmeva hi bandhūnāṃ karma kuryāt prayatnataḥ // Ang_1.137 //
analyzed: satām eva hi bandhūnām karma kuryāt prayatnataḥ
bhraṣṭānām api tucchānām patitānām vikarmiṇām

original: na kurvīta kriyāṃ yatnād api snānaṃ samācaret // Ang_1.138 //
analyzed: na kurvīta kriyām yatnāt api snānam samācaret

original: asatāṃ patitānāṃ ca bhasmāntaṃ sūtakaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: asatām patitānām ca bhasma antam sūtakam smṛtam
bhraṣṭa patitānām ghaṭa sphoṭana adhikāriṇaḥ
jāti bhraṣṭān akarmiṣṭhān patitāt mātaram sutam
pitaram bhrātaram patnīm patim eva mithas sataḥ
tyajet ghaṭa prahāreṇa na anyān evam samācaret
anātha preta saṃskāre
anātha preta saṃskārāt aśvamedha phalam labhet
preta nirvāpaṇam proktam atra saṃskāra śabdataḥ
preta saṃskāra abhāve
a kṛtvā preta saṃskāram yaḥ bhuṅkte kāmakārataḥ
tad preta kṛta pāpa ogham tad kṣaṇāt labhate khilam
tad doṣa śamanāya atha cāpa agre snānam ācaret

original: māsamātraṃ prayatnena na cedukthyaṃ samācaret // Ang_1.143 //
analyzed: māsa mātram prayatnena na ced ukthyam samācaret
vipra anujñayā yati kṛtyam
vipra abhyanujñayā kuryāt karma mātram viśeṣataḥ
pitṛ kṛtyam preta kṛtyam tayoḥ no ced yateḥ api
vipra anujñām yatiḥ api labdhvā snātvā ārdra vastrataḥ

original: pretakṛtyaṃ prakurvīta na cet kṛtyaṃ tu tanna tu // Ang_1.145 //
analyzed: preta kṛtyam prakurvīta na ced kṛtyam tu tat na tu

original: api śāstrakṛtaṃ karma bahuviprāmataṃ tu yat /
analyzed: api śāstra kṛtam karma bahu vipra amatam tu yat
tad abhyanujñayā tat tu karmataḥ punar ācaret
bahu vipra tiraskāra pradveṣa āgaḥ pradūṣitam
tad abhyanujñā rahitam yat tat karma punar caret
kartari sannihite kartṛ kṛtam punar
yadi akartṛ kṛtam karma samīpe kartari sthite
dhana vṛtti gṛha kṣetra hetave tat punar caret
a sagotra saṃskṛtau āśaucam
asagotram api pretam dāhayet yaḥ kathaṃcana

original: sa cāpi gotribhistulyo daśāhaṃ sūtakī bhavet // Ang_1.149 //
analyzed: sa ca api gotribhiḥ tulyaḥ daśa aham sūtakī bhavet
mṛtāhasya parityāge mātā pitroḥ
mṛtāhasya parityāge mohāt kṛchra dvayam caret
gāyatrī daśa sāhasra japaḥ godānam eva ca
evam pañcatriṃśa varṣa paryantam cittam ucyate

original: pṛthaktvena mahābhāgais tadūrdhvaṃ patito bhavet // Ang_1.151 //
analyzed: pṛthaktvena mahābhāgaiḥ tad ūrdhvam patitaḥ bhavet
nadī snānena niṣkṛtiḥ
mahānadī snāna śatam pitroḥ tyakte tu paitṛke
niṣkṛtiḥ kathitā sadbhiḥ punar saṃskārataḥ tathā
nadī snānāni sarvatra sarva kṛtyeṣu vacmi vaḥ
niṣkṛti tvena viprāṇām vedinām abhyanujñayā

original: na hi snānena sadṛśī niṣkṛtirvihitāsti hi /
analyzed: na hi snānena sadṛśī niṣkṛtiḥ vihitā asti hi
tasmāt snānāni sarvatra tīrtha ādiṣu viśiṣyate
saṃhitā paṭhana ādiḥ
śruti pārāyaṇam yat vā vyāhṛtīnām

original: gāyatryā vā japo no cen mahārudrajapo 'thavā // Ang_1.155 //
analyzed: gāyatryāḥ vā japaḥ na u ced mahārudra japaḥ
puruṣasūkta japaḥ vā api saṃhitā paṭhanam sakṛt
niṣkṛtiḥ vihitā sadbhiḥ api pātakinām api
veda mahimā
veda akṣara uccāraṇataḥ sarvanāma phalam labhet
hari nāmāni yāvanti paṭhitāni dvijātibhiḥ
asaṃkhyākāni anantāni sarva āvila harāṇi api
tāni eka veda varṇaḥ syāt tādṛśaiḥ divya varṇakaiḥ
ameyaiḥ saṃvṛtaḥ vedaḥ sākṣāt nārāyaṇa ātmakaḥ
tādṛśasya asya vedasya paṭhanāt sarva kilbiṣaiḥ

original: sadya eva vimuktaḥ syāt pātakī nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: sadyas eva vimuktaḥ syāt pātakī na atra saṃśayaḥ
brāhmaṇasya veda adhikāraḥ

original: tādṛśasyāsya vedasya paṭhane brāhmaṇasya vai // Ang_1.160 //
analyzed: tādṛśasya asya vedasya paṭhane brāhmaṇasya vai
adhikāraḥ na ca anyasya saṃskṛtasya eva karmabhiḥ
tatra api pariśuddhasya kṛta nitya kriyasya vai
tatra api pariśuddhasya viśeṣeṣu dineṣu api

original: śuddhācchuddhaḥ svato vedas taduccāraṇataḥ kṣaṇāt // Ang_1.162 //
analyzed: śuddhāt śuddhaḥ svatas vedaḥ tad uccāraṇataḥ kṣaṇāt
deva nāmāni anantāni nikhilāni agha hāni vai

original: asakṛtpaṭhitāni syur nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // Ang_1.163 //
analyzed: asakṛt paṭhitāni syuḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: snānaṃ kṛtvā prārabhecca vedaṃ taṃ tādṛśaṃ śivam / [022]
analyzed: snānam kṛtvā prārabhet ca vedam tam tādṛśam śivam
a snātvā ārambhe

original: yadyasnātvaiva mohena prārabhet pātakī bhavet // Ang_1.164 //
analyzed: yadi a snātvā eva mohena prārabhet pātakī bhavet
snānataḥ sarva karmāṇi sidhyanti eva na saṃśayaḥ
sarvam snāna mūlam
snāna mūlam idam brāhmam snāna mūlam idam tapaḥ
snāna mūla akhilāḥ yajñāḥ snāna mūlam idam jagat

original: sarvakṛtyevu sarvatra snānameva paraṃ matam // Ang_1.166 //
analyzed: sarvatra snānam eva param matam
kṛtsneṣu aśuciṣu snānam tārakam parikīrtitam
a spṛśya sparśana ādi karma aṅga snānam

original: aspṛśyasparśane caivam abhakṣyāṇāṃ ca bhakṣaṇe // Ang_1.167 //
analyzed: a spṛśya sparśane ca evam abhakṣyāṇām ca bhakṣaṇe
sakalīkaraṇe ca atra malinīkaraṇe tathā
a pātrīkaraṇe nyatra jāti bhraṃśa kara ādiṣu
sūtaka ādiṣu sarveṣu sarveṣu āśauca karmasu
snānam eva param proktam sarva kṛchra vrata ādiṣu
sarva ādi anteṣu satreṣu tat eva parikīrtitam
abhojya bhojaneṣu evam snānam tat samudāhṛtam
akārya karaṇeṣu eṣu mukhya snānāni mukhyatas

original: bhaveyurhi pavitrāṇi tānīmāni tataḥ sadā // Ang_1.171 //
analyzed: bhaveyuḥ hi pavitrāṇi tāni imāni tatas sadā

original: caredyatnena śudhyarthaṃ na cetkiṃ vātra śudhyati /
analyzed: caret yatnena śudhi artham na ced kim vā atra śudhyati
vamane snānam
svakriyā vamane sadyas sa vāsāḥ jalam āviśet
ajīrṇa vamane snānam auṣadha ādi kriyā vaśāt
vamane snāna abhāva sthalam
vamane pi avagāhaḥ syāt makṣikā mūlataḥ yadi
na avagāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ tad lepa kṣālanam param
prakartavyam prayatnena dhāraṇam śuddha vāsasām
śāka mūla ādi vamane
śākaiḥ mūlaiḥ phalaiḥ patraiḥ kaṭu tikta rasa ādibhiḥ

original: sadyaścedvamanaṃ tanna cirakāle tu tadbhavet // Ang_1.175 //
analyzed: sadyas ced vamanam tat na cira kāle tu tat bhavet
yadā ced roga vamanam tadā snānam vidhānataḥ
sadyas eva prakartavyam aghamarṣa vidhānataḥ
rātrau vamane
rātrau tu vamane jāte roga ādyaiḥ api ajīrṇataḥ
ardha rātrāt adhas tu uṣṇe pāthasi snānam ucyate
tad param prātar eva syāt iti śākala bhāṣitam
sva gotra tyāge nya gotra parigrahaṇe
svīya gotra parityāgāt anya gotra parigrahāt
prabhavet patitaḥ sadyas śuddhaḥ saṃskārataḥ punar
svīya gotra parityāgaḥ bhinna gotra parigrahaḥ

original: dvayametatprakathitaṃ striya eva hi nurna tu / [024]
analyzed: dvayam etat prakathitam striyaḥ eva hi nuḥ na tu
ardha udayaḥ
arka śruti vyatīpāta yuktā mā puṣyam āvayoḥ
asau ardha udayaḥ yogaḥ koṭi arka graha saṃnibhaḥ

original: asmin snāto cāpakoṭau kuryānsnānaśataṃ yadi // Ang_1.181 //
analyzed: asmin cāpa koṭau kuryāt snāna śatam yadi
triṃśat varṣam tyakta pitṛ karmā śuddhaḥ bhavet tatas

original: mahodaye tu tatsnānasahasraṃ yadi bhaktitaḥ // Ang_1.182 //
analyzed: mahodaye tu tat snāna sahasram yadi bhaktitaḥ
kuryāt vā kārayet vā api śuddhaḥ pūrva āghataḥ bhavet
anyathā niṣkṛtiḥ nā asti tādṛśasya asya pāpinaḥ
tam yogam tasmāt tādṛś tu kilbiṣī
pati anyena citārohitāyāḥ putrasya kṛtyam

original: yadi sādhvī pramādena patyanyena citi vrajet // Ang_1.184 //
analyzed: yadi sādhvī pramādena pati anyena citi vrajet
katham tad karma karaṇam paścāt tad jāta janmanām

original: iti cintāparā devā babhūyuḥ kila vai ciram // Ang_1.185 //
analyzed: iti cintā parāḥ devāḥ babhūyuḥ kila vai ciram
paścāt udabhavat vāṇī divyā spaṣṭa pada akṣarā
pati anya nara yogasya ṣaṣ abdam kṛcchram ucyate
mohāt prāṇa parityāge mahā pāpasya karmaṇaḥ

original: tasyāḥ ṣaḍabdaṃ saṃproktaṃ ṣaḍguṇenaiva saṃyutam // Ang_1.187 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ ṣaṣ abdam saṃproktam ṣaḍguṇena eva saṃyutam
sadā anena eva kurvīta lobha śāṭhya vivarjitam
tad doṣa śamanāya eva prāṇatyāga ākhya karmaṇaḥ
cāpa agra yānam kṛtvā ādau tatra snāna śatam caret
pakṣa mātram prayatnena nityam priya puraḥsaram
tad śāntiḥ tena na anyena sārdha sāhasra majjanaiḥ
brāhmaṇānām prasādena kūṣmāṇḍa gaṇa pāṭhataḥ

original: nityaṃ trivāraṃ tatraiva paścāttu prākṛtaṃ caret /
analyzed: nityam tri vāram tatra eva paścāt tu prākṛtam caret

original: tataḥ śuddhā bhavetsā tu tairetaiḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ // Ang_1.191 //
analyzed: tatas śuddhā bhavet sā tu taiḥ etaiḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ
jāti bhedena niṣkṛtiḥ
dviguṇam rājayogena triguṇam vaiśya yogataḥ
catur gurṇam śūdra yogāt evam niṣkṛtiḥ īritā
striyaḥ punar vivāhe
punar vivāhitā mūḍhaiḥ pitṛ bhrātṛ mukhaiḥ khalaiḥ

original: yadi sā te 'khilāḥ sarve syurvai nirayagāminaḥ // Ang_1.193 //
analyzed: yadi sā te khilāḥ sarve syuḥ vai niraya gāminaḥ
punar vivāhitā sā tu mahāraurava bhāginī

original: tatpatiḥ pitṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ kālasūtragato bhavet // Ang_1.194 //
analyzed: tad patiḥ pitṛbhiḥ sārdham kālasūtra gataḥ bhavet
dātā ca aṅgāraśayana nāmakam pratipadyate
tasya niṣkṛtiḥ
tad doṣa śamanāya atha prāyaścittam idam param
dātā setu gataḥ sadyas dhanuṣkoṭyām samāhitaḥ

original: nityaṃ triṣavaṇasnāyī yāvakāhāra eva vai // Ang_1.196 //
analyzed: nityam triṣavaṇa snāyī yāvaka āhāraḥ eva vai
saṃvatsaram prayatnena vaset eva anvaham tarām

original: svakṛtaṃ yacca tatpāpaṃ vadannityanvahan yatan // Ang_1.197 //
analyzed: sva kṛtam yat ca tat pāpam vadan iti anvahan yatan
sarveṣu api ca tīrtheṣu taptakṛcchra śatam caret

original: tataḥ śuddho bhavedevaṃ voḍhā cāpi tadā punaḥ // Ang_1.198 // [026]
analyzed: tatas śuddhaḥ bhavet evam voḍhā ca api tadā punar
tad doṣa śamanāya eva puṇyam cāndrāyaṇa trayam
yatnāt kurvan vaset tatra ṛtu trayam atandritaḥ
pratinityam pañcagavyam piban tad vidhinā rudan
nirlajjayā loka puras kūṣmāṇḍa ādīn paṭhan tathā
drupadām nāma gāyatrīm gāyatrīm veda mātaram
saṃdhyā traye sahasrāṇi japan tapta ākhyakam śivam
kṛcchram vidhānataḥ kṛtvā punar saṃskārataḥ punar

original: puṭagarbhavidhānena śuddho bhavati tatra cet // Ang_1.202 //
analyzed: puṭa garbha vidhānena śuddhaḥ bhavati tatra ced
na ced tapta śatam kuryāt punar upanayāt param
sā ced bhartṛ dvayam tyaktvā setu snāna sahasrakam
kṛtvā ca yāvaka āhārā varṣa mātreṇa śudhyati

original: yadyaputrā putriṇī cet patedevāśu taiḥ saha // Ang_1.204 //
analyzed: yadī aputrā putriṇī ced patet eva āśu taiḥ saha

original: sā vai putraistadudbhūtaiś caṇḍālatvaṃ bhajeta vai /
analyzed: sā vai putraiḥ tad udbhūtaiḥ caṇḍāla tvam bhajeta vai
bhrāntyā putrikā ādi vivāhe jāte sva mātra śuddhiḥ
yadi svasāram tanayām cirāt bhrānti ādi kṛcchrataḥ
vivahet mohataḥ jñāte kṛtvā cāndra sahasrakam
cāpa agra yānataḥ paścāt puṭa garbha vidhānataḥ
karaṇāt jātaka ādīnām sva mātrasya śuciḥ bhavet
pareṣām śūdra tulyaḥ yam tatas tām bibhṛyāt api
pūrvadharmam vinikṣipya tasyām bhaktyā japan vaset
putre jāte

original: yadi tasyāṃ prajāyeraṃs tāṃścaṇḍāleṣu vinyaset // Ang_1.208 //
analyzed: yadi tasyām prajāyeran tān caṇḍāleṣu vinyaset

original: tataḥ svayaṃ ca nityaṃ vai yāvakāśī caredbhuvam /
analyzed: tatas svayam ca nityam vai yā avakāśī caret bhuvam

original: pāpaprakhyāpanaṃ kurvan yāvajjīvaṃ hariṃ bhajan // Ang_1.209 //
analyzed: pāpa prakhyāpanam kurvan yāvajjīvam harim bhajan

original: vivāhitāṃ ca vidhavāṃ mahāmohena vañcakaiḥ // Ang_1.210 //
analyzed: vivāhitām ca vidhavām mahā mohena vañcakaiḥ
dattām vivāhya tat jñātvā sadyas caṇḍāla tām vrajet
tad doṣa śamanāya eva pūrvavat tu samācaret
dviguṇam nikhilam kṛtyam samunneyam vicakṣaṇaiḥ
eka dvi tri catur pañca vāram vivāhitā
eka dvi tri catur pañca vāram vai yā vivāhitā
ati kṣudra eka kāleṣu pāpa eka bahuleṣu ca

original: vijñātā cettu tāṃ samyak pṛṣṭvā gatvā vicārya ca // Ang_1.213 //
analyzed: vijñātā ced tu tām samyak pṛṣṭvā gatvā vicārya ca
tattvam tasyāḥ tu vijñāya prāyaścittam tatas caret

original: yatra yatra ca sā gatvā yaṃ yaṃ vā svajanaiḥ saha // Ang_1.214 //
analyzed: yatra yatra ca sā gatvā yam yam vā sva janaiḥ saha

original: taṃ taṃ jñātvā ca saṃbhāṣya tattadvāṅmūlamapyalam // Ang_1.215 // [028]
analyzed: tam tam jñātvā ca saṃbhāṣya tat tat vāc mūlam api alam
śrutvā paścāt śrotriyebhyaḥ śrāvayitvā akhilam tatas

original: rājñe bandhuni vāvedya prāyaścittaṃ tataścaret // Ang_1.216 //
analyzed: rājñe bandhuni vā āvedya prāyaścittam tatas caret
etādṛśeṣu kṛtyeṣu sā kṣetram prabhavet dhruvam

original: prathamodvāhakasyaiva paraṃ tveṣā parā na tu // Ang_1.217 //
analyzed: prathama udvāhakasya eva param tu eṣā parā na tu
kadācid dharma kṛtyānām na tasya api parasya vā

original: sā bhogamātrayogyāpi veśyā tasyā viśiṣyate // Ang_1.218 //
analyzed: sā bhoga mātra yogyā api veśyā tasyāḥ viśiṣyate

original: tayā cetteṣu kṛtyeṣu sapaṅktau bhojanaṃ tathā /
analyzed: tayā ced teṣu kṛtyeṣu sa paṅktau bhojanam tathā

original: saha vā bhojanaṃ duṣṭaṃ yadi pātityakārakam // Ang_1.219 //
analyzed: saha vā bhojanam duṣṭam yadi pātitya kārakam

original: tacchudhyarthaṃ rasāyāṃ tu śvabhre saṃchādya dharmataḥ /

original: khanitvā yāmamātraṃ vā ghaṭikādvayameva vā // Ang_1.220 //
analyzed: khanitvā yāma mātram vā ghaṭikā dvayam eva vā
tasmāt uddhṛtya paścāt tu jātaka ādi samācaret

niyata ātmā yā avakāśī cāpa agram tat bhavet śuciḥ

original: pañca snānasahasrāṇi svayaṃ vipramukhena vā // Ang_1.222 //
analyzed: pañca snāna sahasrāṇi svayam vipra mukhena vā

original: na pareṣāmayaṃ yogya evamāha purā bhṛguḥ // Ang_1.223 //
analyzed: na pareṣām ayam yogyaḥ evam āha purā bhṛguḥ
praviṣṭa para kāyena yadi saṃyogam āpnuyāt
tri māsa yāvaka āhārā sādhvī śudhyati na anyathā
praviṣṭa para varṣmāṇam vijñātam sva patim satī
prapālayet viśeṣeṇa rati mātram na ca ācaret
kāyayoḥ eva saṃbandhaḥ purā saṃskṛtayoḥ purā

original: nātmanorasti saṃbandho bhinnakāye na cettataḥ // Ang_1.226 //
analyzed: na ātmanoḥ asti saṃbandhaḥ bhinna kāye na ced tatas

original: surāṇāmapi caivaṃ hi manuṣyāṇāṃ tu kiṃ punaḥ // Ang_1.227 //
analyzed: surāṇām api ca evam hi manuṣyāṇām tu kim punar
a grāhya mūrtayaḥ grāhya mūrtayaḥ ca
agrāhya abhedya mūrtīnām grāhma bhaidya śarīriṇām

original: devānāṃ sumahābhedas tāratamyaṃ ca tatparam // Ang_1.228 //
analyzed: devānām su mahā bhedaḥ tāratamyam ca tat param

original: grāhyakāyasurāṇāṃ vai prapūjyāḥ paramāḥ param // Ang_1.229 //
analyzed: grāhya kāya surāṇām vai prapūjyāḥ paramāḥ param

original: adhikā vandanīyāśca te na nīcāstu tena vai /
analyzed: adhikāḥ vandanīyāḥ ca te na nīcāḥ tu tena vai
agrāhya mūrti nivedyam
tat niveditam atyartham na teṣām parikalpayet
tena aparādhaḥ su mahān prabhavet na tathā ācaret
a grāhya abhedya mūrtīnām grāhya bhedya niveditam
ayogyam satatam syāt hi śūdrasya iva śrutiḥ yathā
śrauta smārta kriyā dakṣaḥ vā
niruptam anya uddeśena na devāya nivedayet
niveditena a nivedita yojane
niveditena ruci artham yojayet na a niveditam

original: tathā niveditaṃ bhūyo lavaṇaṃ ca niyojayet /
analyzed: tathā niveditam bhūyas lavaṇam ca niyojayet

original: nivedanādatha punas tadādāya ghṛtena vā // Ang_1.234 //
analyzed: nivedanāt atha punar tat ādāya ghṛtena vā
tailena lavaṇena api yatnena na niyojayet

original: taducchiṣṭaṃ na kurvīta tatkareṇa na pīḍayet // Ang_1.235 //

na khaṇḍayet mithas jñānāt na tat prokṣaṇam ācaret
pariṣiñcet na evam eva tūṣṇīm āsye vinikṣipet
gṛhṇīyāt tu tat antar vai na dantaiḥ api pīḍayet
tat etat paramam śuddham nirmālyam ati durlabham
devānām api tat bhojyam prayatnena ati bhaktitaḥ
tadā upadaṃśam svīkuryāt nivedita mahā kṣaṇe
bhagavat prasāda grahaṇe bhakṣaṇa viṣaye
niveditasya haviṣaḥ bhakṣaṇe samupasthite

original: āpośanaṃ na kurvīta prokṣaṇaṃ pariṣecanam // Ang_1.239 //
analyzed: na kurvīta prokṣaṇam pariṣecanam

original: yadi kurvīta mohena rauravaṃ narakaṃ vrajet /

original: annaṃ pakvāt samuddhṛtya pṛthakpātre niyujya ca // Ang_1.240 //

kṛtvā sukha uṣṇam saṃskṛtya paścāt śākhā ādibhiḥ yajet

original: asahyoṣṇaṃ mahoṣṇaṃ vā pakvapātragamaiva vā // Ang_1.241 //

original: yo nivedayate mohād devāya narakī bhavet / [031]

nivedana prakasaḥ

original: tasmādannaṃ samuddhṛtya pṛthakpātre nidhāya ca // Ang_1.242 //
analyzed: tasmāt annam samuddhṛtya pṛthak pātre nidhāya ca

original: kṛtvā yatnātsukhoṣṇaṃ ca rāśi kṛtvābhighārya ca /
analyzed: kṛtvā yatnāt sukha uṣṇam ca rāśi kṛtvā abhighārya ca
ati śuddham ati śreṣṭham rāja yogyam su śobhanam

a prokṣya a pariṣicya evam a prāṇāhuti pūrvakam

original: na khaṇḍayecchabdayecca kiṃ tu tūṣṇīṃ tadambuvat // Ang_1.246 //

rasavat phalavat yatnāt prāśayet ca na śabdayet

arbhakebhyaḥ dadyāt
pradadyāt arbhakebhyaḥ vai na svīkuryāt svayam yadi

original: svīkuryāttu tadā naktam upaviṣṭaḥ śucisthale // Ang_1.248 //
analyzed: svīkuryāt tu tadā naktam upaviṣṭaḥ śuci sthale
śabdān ajanayan eva tām udanta ādibhiḥ hi adan

original: gṛhī na rātrau snāyīta yadi snāyīta vāriṇā // Ang_1.249 // [032]

original: uṣṇena śakto na snāyād aśaktaścettadācaret // Ang_1.250 //
analyzed: uṣṇena śaktaḥ na snāyāt aśaktaḥ ced tat ācaret
abhyaṅgam
abhyaktaḥ ca tathā snāyāt śarīra ārogya hetave

original: tatsnānaṃ kathitaṃ sadbhir na nityaṃ tena nācaret // Ang_1.251 //
analyzed: tat snānam kathitam sadbhiḥ na nityam tena na ācaret
karma naimittikam tasmāt devānām api nā arcanam
yāvat nitya ādi karma ogham nirvatya eva vidhānataḥ

original: madhyāhne saṃgave vāpi snānaṃ kṛtvā tu tādṛśam // Ang_1.253 //
analyzed: madhyāhne saṃgave vā api snānam kṛtvā tu tādṛśam
mādhyāhnika snānam

kṣura snānam

original: karoti vaidikaṃ karma na tatphalamavāpnuyāt // Ang_1.256 //

original: nābhyañjanaṃ prakurvīta prātaḥsāyaṃ na parvasu // Ang_1.257 //
analyzed: na abhyañjanam prakurvīta prātar sāyam na parvasu
grahaṇe śrāddha kāleṣu vrateṣu nikhileṣu api

original: suptvā bhuktvā ruditvā vā dūraṃ gatvā pipāsitaḥ /

original: atikṣudhāturo rogī na kurvīta kathaṃcana // Ang_1.259 //
analyzed: ati kṣudhā āturaḥ rogī na kurvīta kathaṃcana

original: śaptaḥ śapitvā vyājena ghātayitvā narān parān // Ang_1.260 //

original: hṛtvā dhanāni dīnānāṃ na kuryāttattu sarvadā /
analyzed: hṛtvā dhanāni dīnānām na kuryāt tat tu sarvadā

original: svajanān preṣayitvā ca nyakkṛtya gurubāndhavān // Ang_1.261 //
analyzed: sva janān preṣayitvā ca nyakkṛtya guru bāndhavān
tad avaśyaka kṛtyeṣu kartavya tvena śāstrataḥ
mahatsu upasthiteṣu eva tāni a kṛtvā eva maurkhyataḥ
na kuryāt eva sahasā vigraha udvartanam dvijaḥ
abhyañjana snānam sa udakumbha nāndīśrāddhayoḥ
sa udakumbha śrāddha mātram kṛtvā abhyañjanataḥ param
kuryāt eva iti hārītaḥ na eva anena iti vai manuḥ

original: snātasnānena kurvīta na śrāddhāni kadācana // Ang_1.264 // [034]
analyzed: snāta snānena kurvīta na śrāddhāni kadācana
nāndim tābhyām prakurvīta anukalpena eva tat smṛtam
snānam abhyañjanam snānam aśaktasya kadācana
sodakumbhasya nāndyāḥ ca kartuḥ saṃpadyate kila
krośa sthita nadī snānāt śrāddham
krośa sthita nadī snānāt na pitroḥ śrāddham ācaret
mahāt avabhṛthāt ca api śāvāt vārṣa avagāhataḥ

original: tadaṅgasnānataḥ sadyaḥ śrāddhākhyaṃ karma taccaret // Ang_1.267 //
analyzed: tad aṅga snānataḥ sadyas śrāddha ākhyam karma tat caret
saṃkalpaḥ
karma mātrasya sarvatra prāṇān āyamya mantrataḥ

original: na saṃkalpaṃ vinā karma nityakāmyādikaṃ caret /
analyzed: na saṃkalpam vinā karma nitya kāmi ādikam caret

original: sa mānasaḥ syātsaṃkalpaḥ kartavyo vācikaḥ paraḥ // Ang_1.269 //
analyzed: sa mānasaḥ syāt saṃkalpaḥ kartavyaḥ vācikaḥ paraḥ

original: yasya ityetadvākyena tathā prāha śrutiḥ śivā /
analyzed: yasya iti etad vākyena tathā prāha śrutiḥ śivā

original: deśaḥ kālaśca saṃkalpe vaktavyau tatra cetpunaḥ // Ang_1.270 //
analyzed: deśaḥ kālaḥ ca saṃkalpe vaktavyau tatra ced punar

original: tithiḥ kāla iti prokto vyatyāse tasya karma tat /
analyzed: tithiḥ kālaḥ iti proktaḥ vyatyāse tasya karma tat
naṣṭam eva bhavet sadyas tasmāt tat tu punar caret
pitṛ śrāddha vyatyāse punar caret
ekasmin eva divase pitroḥ śrāddham upasthitam

original: tatkrameṇaiva kartavyaṃ vyatyāse tu punaścaret // Ang_1.272 //
analyzed: tad krameṇa eva kartavyam vyatyāse tu punar caret
mohāt a tad dina kṛta śrāddham ca api punar caret
śūnya tithi kṛtam punar caret

original: tathā śūnyatithau yatnāt kṛtaṃ cāpi punaścaret // Ang_1.273 //
analyzed: tathā śūnya tithau yatnāt kṛtam ca api punar caret
sūtaka ante śūnya tithi doṣaḥ yam śrāddha karmaṇaḥ
kadācid na bhavati eva tasmāt tatra eva tat caret
pitṛ śrāddhāt param kāruṇyaśrāddham
pituḥ śrāddhāt param śrāddham kāruṇyānām samācaret
tat anyathākṛtam tat ced paredyus tat punar caret
nimitta grahaṇa śrāddham kṛtvā annena api tat dinam

original: bhūyaḥ samyak prakurvīta bhissayaiva na cānyathā // Ang_1.276 //
analyzed: bhūyas samyak prakurvīta bhissayā eva na ca anyathā
mātṛ pitṛ śrāddham eka dine nnena
pitroḥ mṛtā aham satatam api kṛcchra gataḥ naraḥ
annena eva prakurvīta nāma ādyena kadācana
grahaṇa ādiṣu śaktaḥ ced bhissayā tāni ca ācaret
na ced āma ādinā śuddhaḥ tad dharmaiḥ akhilaiḥ vṛtaḥ
grahe muhūrta dvitaye gate nna śrāddham ācaret

original: api śakto 'pi tannyūne tādṛk chrāddhaṃ na cācaret // Ang_1.279 //
analyzed: api tad nyūne tādṛś śrāddham na ca ācaret
cākrika śrāddham
cākrikam grahaṇam mukhyam āyanam tat amukhyakam
puṣpavat maṇḍala sama madhya bhāga prapīḍitam
yat nīla lakṣma pṛthulam vartulam tat triyāma gam
tat cākrikam iti proktam grahaṇam pitṛ tṛpti dam
tat ca pañca śata abdānām ekadā vai bhaviṣyati
grahaṇam bhojana niṣedhaḥ
bṛddha bāla āturāṇām na

original: grahasya cākrikasyāsya pūrvaṃ yāmatrayaṃ naraiḥ // Ang_1.282 //
analyzed: grahasya cākrikasya asya pūrvam yāma trayam naraiḥ
bhojanam nā eva kartavyam bṛddha bāla āturān vinā

original: aparāhne na madhyāhne madhyāhne na tu saṃgave // Ang_1.283 //
analyzed: aparāhne na madhyāhne madhyāhne na tu saṃgave

original: saṃgave tu na tu prātaḥ pṛthukānāṃ tu kevalam /
analyzed: saṃgave tu na tu prātar pṛthukānām tu kevalam

original: stanyapāne na doṣo 'sti tatkāle kevale 'pi vā // Ang_1.284 //
analyzed: stanya pāne na doṣaḥ sti tad kāle kevale vā
yavāgvāḥ payasaḥ vā api pānīyasya a śarad samam

original: niyamo 'yaṃ prakathito na tadūrdhvaṃ tu taccaret // Ang_1.285 //
analyzed: niyamaḥ yam prakathitaḥ na tad ūrdhvam tu tat caret
ayana grahaṇe mukhye paunaḥpunya gate sakṛt
koṇa eka deśa saṃspṛṣṭe tad nyūna samaya sthite
yāma dvayam sārdha yāma dvayam yāma trayam tathā
sārdha yāma trayam yāma catuṣṭayam iti kramāt
adhikāra prabhedena bhojanasya nirūpaṇam
yat etat tasya sarvasya pravadāmi vinirṇayam
tad kāla ajīrṇa rāhitye hṛdayam tat nibodhata

original: evaṃ sthitaṃ punarvacmi yāmataḥ sārdhayāmataḥ // Ang_1.289 //
analyzed: evam sthitam punar vacmi yāmataḥ sārdha yāmataḥ
jīrṇa śaktimataḥ nuḥ ced tad kāle kṣudh bhavet yadi

original: na doṣaḥ kathitaḥ sadbhiḥ kadāciddaivayogataḥ // Ang_1.290 //
analyzed: na doṣaḥ kathitaḥ sadbhiḥ kadācid daivayogataḥ
ajīrṇaḥ syāt tadā doṣaḥ su mahān prabhavet api
tasmāt yāma dvayam sarvaiḥ bhuktiḥ tyājyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ
atyanta ātura ādīnām

original: viśeṣaḥ ko 'pi bhūyaśca procyate sumahān paraḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ bhūyas ca procyate su mahān paraḥ
rogiṇaḥ pi atimātrasya ca auṣadha atikṣudh aśnataḥ
krūra graha atitaptasya piśāca āveśinaḥ tathā
vaśyā ākarṣaṇa vidveṣa stambhana uccāṭana ādibhiḥ
pīḍitasya viśeṣeṇa mūrchitasya ati tāḍanaiḥ
tad kāla bhakṣaṇam api na duṣyati kadācana
ati utkrānti pravṛttasya cira tyakta andhasaḥ tathā
a prāśana utpanna mṛti saṃśayasya viśeṣataḥ
tad kāla bhakṣaṇa āvṛttiḥ na doṣāya bhavet ayam
sarveṣām api varṇānām sarva āśrama nivāsinām
mukhyaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ tad kāla ajīrṇa śūnyatā

original: yāmatrayādikāḥ kālās tatra tatra pracoditāḥ // Ang_1.297 //
analyzed: yāma traya ādikāḥ kālāḥ tatra tatra pracoditāḥ
taiḥ taiḥ te nikhilāḥ jñeyāḥ nṛ bhedena vivakṣitāḥ
grasta astake sa kāmi niṣkāminoḥ

original: somaṃ grastāstagaṃ sūryam api vā śāstradṛṣṭitaḥ // Ang_1.298 //
analyzed: somam grasta asta gam sūryam api vā śāstra dṛṣṭitaḥ

original: muktaṃ jñātvā tataḥ snātvā niṣkāmo bhojanaṃ caret /
analyzed: muktam jñātvā tatas snātvā niṣkāmaḥ bhojanam caret
śubhrāṃśu caṇḍāṃśu loka kāmī ced na tu bhojanam
caret eva na saṃdehaḥ tat loka akāminaḥ param
doṣāya bhojana tyāgaḥ evam āha prajāpatiḥ
agnihotram
vihitasya parityāgāt agnihotra svarūpiṇaḥ
sahiṣṇuḥ na bhavet tasmāt tat pūrvam tat samācaret
datta putraḥ
ārāt nyak sodara sutaḥ tarṇakaḥ karma varjitaḥ
kṛta karma traya kṛtaḥ yaḥ dattaḥ pravaraḥ smṛtaḥ
mātā pitṛbhyām dānam grahaṇam ca

original: dadyātāṃ dampatī putraṃ gṛhṇīyātāṃ ca dampatī // Ang_1.303 //
analyzed: dadyātām dampatī putram gṛhṇīyātām ca dampatī
tayoḥ eva adhikāraḥ yam tad dāne tad pratigrahe
brāhmaṇānām sapiṇḍeṣu kartavyaḥ putra saṃgrahaḥ

original: sagotreṣvathavā kāryo hy anyatra tu na kārayet /
analyzed: sagotreṣu athavā kāryaḥ hi anyatra tu na kārayet
a saṃskṛtaḥ datta sūnuḥ pituḥ ca api a kṛta kriyaḥ

original: na taddhanamavāpnoti tadvṛttau kā kathā punaḥ / [039]
analyzed: na tat dhanam avāpnoti tad vṛttau kā kathā punar

original: jātakarmādinā tasya putratvaṃ nānyathā matam // Ang_1.306 //
analyzed: jātakarma ādinā tasya putra tvam na anyathā matam
mauñjī antena ati harṣeṇa sarva matyā sa mantrataḥ
putraḥ jñātimataḥ dattaḥ kṛta sarva pitṛ kriyaḥ

original: yadi svayaṃ tadā sarvāṃ tadvṛttiṃ labhate parām /
analyzed: yadi svayam tadā sarvām tad vṛttim labhate parām
sarvasya prati mantrasya pitṛ hetu prapāṭhanāt

original: dattasya tadbhūlābhaḥ syāt tatpūrvaṃ sā na sidhyati /
analyzed: dattasya tad bhū lābhaḥ syāt tad pūrvam sā na sidhyati
hiraṇya kakṣyā mantrāṇām paṭhanāt tat trayam punar
pradūrīkṛtya tad jñātīn avaśāt eti ca akhilam

original: dattasūnuḥ pitrānyena saṃskṛto yadi tadvṛtaḥ // Ang_1.310 //
analyzed: datta sūnuḥ pitrā anyena saṃskṛtaḥ yadi tad vṛtaḥ

original: tadā tu taddhanaṃ sarvaṃ jñātisādhāraṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tadā tu tat dhanam sarvam jñāti sādhāraṇam bhavet
svayam eva pituḥ dattaḥ karma kuryāt prayatnataḥ

original: taddhanaṃ tu na cetsadyas tajjñātigatameva vai /
analyzed: tad dhanam tu na ced sadyas tat jñāti gatam eva vai

original: datto 'yamasagotraścet sadā durbala eva vai // Ang_1.312 //
analyzed: dattaḥ yama sagotraḥ ced sadā durbalaḥ eva vai

original: bhavedeva na saṃdehaḥ śāstre 'mutra paratra ca /
analyzed: bhavet eva na saṃdehaḥ śāstre mutra paratra ca

original: yadi jāmī tatra bhavet tanmukhaṃ nāvalokayet // Ang_1.313 //
analyzed: yadi jāmī tatra bhavet tad mukham na avalokayet
avaśyam putra saṃgrahaḥ kartavyaḥ
yathā kathaṃcid putrasya saṃgrahaḥ kāryaḥ eva vai

original: daurbalye svasya saṃjāte dharmajñena mahātmanā // Ang_1.314 //
analyzed: daurbalye svasya saṃjāte dharma jñena mahātmanā
jala budbuda saṃkāśam varṣma etat kathitam budhaiḥ

original: na hi pramāṇaṃ jantūnām uttarakṣaṇajīvane // Ang_1.315 //
analyzed: na hi pramāṇam jantūnām uttara kṣaṇa jīvane
tasmāt ātma hitam nityam cintayan eva tat caret
aputrasya lokaḥ na asti

original: nāputrasya tu loko 'sti putriṇastu triviṣṭapam // Ang_1.316 //
analyzed: na aputrasya tu lokaḥ sti putriṇaḥ tu triviṣṭapam
brahma loka ādayaḥ lokāḥ svādhīnāḥ eva sarvadā
putravān agnimān
putravān agnimān nityam putravān śrotriyaḥ smṛtaḥ
putrī sākṣāt brahma vid ca putravān eva bhāgyavān

original: ye ye dharmāḥ svena te te putreṇaitena tatkṣaṇāt // Ang_1.318 //
analyzed: ye ye dharmāḥ svena te te putreṇa etena tad kṣaṇāt
saṃpāditāḥ bhaviṣyanti na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: na putravānapatnīkaḥ kiṃ tu so 'yamaputravān // Ang_1.319 //
analyzed: na putravān apatnīkaḥ kim tu saḥ yam aputravān

original: anagniko na putrī syād aputro 'nagnimān smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: anagnikaḥ na putrī syāt aputraḥ nagnimān smṛtaḥ

original: putreṇa sthāvaraṃ dānaṃ phalavaddānameva ca // Ang_1.320 //
analyzed: putreṇa sthāvaram dānam phalavat dānam eva ca
yat yat loke mahat sarvaiḥ durlabham putriṇī caret

original: putrayatraṃ sadā kuryād vaidikaṃ laukikaṃ śubham // Ang_1.321 //
analyzed: putra yatram sadā kuryāt vaidikam laukikam śubham

original: tasmādṛtumatīṃ bhāryāṃ sadā svastho na laṅghayet /
analyzed: tasmāt ṛtumatīm bhāryām sadā svasthaḥ na laṅghayet
laṅghayet yadi tām mūḍhaḥ bhrūṇa hatyām avāpnuyāt

original: ṛtusnātadine so 'yaṃ yuvā śrotriya eva vā /
analyzed: ṛtusnāta dine saḥ yam yuvā śrotriyaḥ eva vā

original: na kavyāya bhavedeva putravān yadi tadbhavet // Ang_1.323 //
analyzed: na kavyāya bhavet eva putravān yadi tat bhavet
jāta mātre putra mukha vīkṣaṇam
putreṇa jāta mātreṇa ṛṇāt muktaḥ bhavet ayam

original: tasmātputrasya jātasya paśyetsadyo mukhaṃ pumān // Ang_1.324 //
analyzed: tasmāt putrasya jātasya paśyet sadyas mukham pumān
na paśyataḥ tad lapanam ṛṇāt muktiḥ na jāyate

original: yena kena prakāreṇa tasmātkurvīta mānavaḥ // Ang_1.325 //
analyzed: yena kena prakāreṇa tasmāt kurvīta mānavaḥ
putra saṃpādanam dhīmān durbalaḥ ced viśeṣataḥ
vṛttidatta ādayaḥ
vṛttidattam kalpayet vā mauñjīdattam atha api vā
vivāha dattam athavā yajña dattam na ced param
vṛttidattaḥ kulāni aṣṭau mauñjīdattaḥ tu ṣoḍaśa
vivāhadattaḥ dvātriṃśat yajñadattaḥ tariṣyati

original: catuḥṣaṣṭikulānyasya līlayā sadya eva vai // Ang_1.328 //
analyzed: catuḥṣaṣṭi kulāni asya līlayā sadyas eva vai
a putra datta vṛtyā yaḥ prāṇa vṛttim carati alam

original: vṛttidatta iti khyātas tanayaḥ puṇyalokakṛt // Ang_1.329 //
analyzed: vṛttidattaḥ iti khyātaḥ tanayaḥ puṇya loka kṛt

original: dhanato yasya yo loke hy upanīto bhavedaho /
analyzed: dhanataḥ yasya yaḥ loke hi upanītaḥ bhavet aho

original: sa mauñjidatta ityākhyas tanayastu tato 'dhikaḥ // Ang_1.330 //
analyzed: sa mauñjidattaḥ ityākhyaḥ tanayaḥ tu tatas dhikaḥ
evam eva bhavet anyaḥ tanayaḥ para loka daḥ

original: vivāhadattasaṃjñaḥ syāt tato 'pi dviguṇaḥ paraḥ // Ang_1.331 //
analyzed: vivāhadatta saṃjñaḥ syāt dviguṇaḥ paraḥ
tatas dhikaḥ yajñadattaḥ tanayaḥ pitṛ vallabhaḥ

original: ta ete tanayāḥ sarve tattatkarmaikapūrtaye // Ang_1.332 // [042]
analyzed: te ete tanayāḥ sarve tad tad karma eka pūrtaye
kṛtena dhana dānena bhavanti kila nā anyathā
tasmāt santaḥ kila eteṣām karmaṇām ekatas dhanam
na gṛhṇanti para loka didṛkṣavaḥ

original: kaṇaśaḥ kaṇaśaḥ sadbhyaḥ pratigṛhya tatastataḥ // Ang_1.334 //
analyzed: kaṇaśas kaṇaśas sadbhyaḥ pratigṛhya tatas tatas

original: śanaiḥ śanaiśca kālena mahatā tāni cācaret /
analyzed: śanais śanais ca kālena mahatā tāni ca ācaret

original: evaṃ kṛteṣu teṣveṣu mahatsu kila karmasu // Ang_1.335 //
analyzed: evam kṛteṣu teṣu eṣu mahatsu kila karmasu
na ekasya tanayāḥ te syuḥ tasmāt teṣu tathā ācaret
anyeṣu suta grahaṇam

original: durlabhe tu sagotreṣu sapiṇḍeṣu sute yadi // Ang_1.336 //
analyzed: durlabhe tu sagotreṣu sapiṇḍeṣu sute yadi
sutam bandhuṣu vā anyeṣu gṛhṇīyāt anya jātiṣu
savarṇeṣu grahaṇam
savarṇeṣu eva kurvīta na asavarṇeṣu tad graham
asavarṇeṣu tat kurvan sadyas patati varṇataḥ
asagotra svīkṛtau
gṛhīta asagotraḥ ced tanayaḥ puruṣa trayam
kṛtārtha tām prāpayati tat kulam tad anantaram
saṃkīrṇam avaśāt yāti yatnataḥ ced tariṣyati

original: asagotrastu na grāhyo gṛhītuḥ syātsa eva hi /
analyzed: asagotraḥ tu na grāhyaḥ gṛhītuḥ syāt saḥ eva hi
dattaḥ riktham avāpnoti santatiḥ dātuḥ eva hi
tasmāt datta sutaḥ sva sva tanayān udbhavān tatas

original: janakasyaiva gotre tān mauñjyāṃ mantraiḥ praveśayet // Ang_1.341 // [043]
analyzed: janakasya eva gotre tān mauñjyām mantraiḥ praveśayet
yadi datta sva tanayān sva gotre na praveśayet

original: dattajo vātha tajjo vā tadgotradvayajāstu te // Ang_1.342 //
analyzed: datta jaḥ vā atha tad jaḥ vā tad gotra dvaya jāḥ tu te
vivāhe gotra dvaya tyāgaḥ
evam sati atra janane jātānām pāṇipīḍane

original: samāgate tadā samyag yatnādgotradvayaṃ tyajet // Ang_1.343 //
analyzed: samāgate tadā samyak yatnāt gotra dvayam tyajet
tad gotra dvaya yukti artha jñānāya kila tat param
tad jātānām vivāhasya tat ārṣa dvayam ācaret
abhivandana ādau dvi gotra tvam
nitya abhivandane sandhyā vandane kāmya vandane
kṛtsna ārṣeyam tu eka gotre parasmin api gotrake
svīkṛtya ārṣa dvayam tena yojayitvā tatas param
ekam eva vadet gotram eka dvi tri ārṣakam tathā
pañca sapta ārṣakam vā etat nava ekādaśa kārṣakam
gotram ekam bhavet evam trayodaśaka mārṣakam
evam pañcadaśa ārṣam ca gotram tat prabhavet api

original: evaṃ jātāni gotrāṇi dattāvṛttyudbhavāni vai // Ang_1.348 //
analyzed: evam jātāni gotrāṇi datta āvṛtti udbhavāni vai
vartante bhū tale tasmāt gotriṇaḥ tān vicārya ca
pṛṣṭvā tad saṃśayaḥ tyājyaḥ etāvanti eva bhū tale
gotrāṇi śāstra siddhāni ca aikārṣeyāṇi kānicid

original: dvyārṣeyāṇi tryārṣeyāṇi pañcārṣeyāṇi santi hi // Ang_1.350 //
analyzed: dvi ārṣeyāṇi tri ārṣeyāṇi pañca ārṣeyāṇi santi hi
etāvanti eva sarvatra śāstra siddhāni na itarat
ādya datta eka tad datta pāramparyeṇa kevalam
dṛśyante brāhmaṇāḥ saptadaśa ārṣeyau adhi itare
datta ja ādīnām pūrva gotram
tasmāt datta ja putrāḥ tān pūrva gotre praveśayet

original: vinā praveśaṃ yadi te paraṃ prāptaikagotriṇaḥ /
analyzed: vinā praveśam yadi te param prāpta eka gotriṇaḥ

original: yadi syurmohataḥ paścāt pūrvaṃ tajjanakasya ca // Ang_1.353 //
analyzed: yadi syuḥ mohataḥ paścāt pūrvam tad janakasya ca

original: gotraṃ varjyaṃ vivāhādāv evaṃ satyatra kālataḥ /
analyzed: gotram varjyam vivāha ādau evam sati atra kālataḥ

original: ajñātvā pūrvavṛttāntaṃ gotre tajjanakasya ca // Ang_1.354 //
analyzed: a jñātvā pūrva vṛttāntam gotre tad janakasya ca
vivaheran mahān arthaḥ prabhavet kila kevalam

original: pūrvavṛtte 'tha vijñāte tāṃ tyaktvā mātṛvattu tām // Ang_1.355 //
analyzed: pūrva vṛtte vijñāte tām tyaktvā mātṛ vat tu tām
pālayet eva dharmeṇa paścāt kṛcchra trayam caret
tad doṣa parihārāya tatra jātāḥ tu ced tatas
caṇḍāleṣu eva niṣkampam yojayet iti nirṇayaḥ
asagotra sutam tasmāt na svīkuryāt kathaṃcana
buddhimān dharma vid kim tu paurvāparya viśeṣa vid
sagotreṣu eva kurvīta śāstrataḥ putra saṃgraham
bhrātṛ jeṣu na vivāha homa ādiḥ

original: bhrātṛjeṣu vivāho na na svīkāraśca satkriyā /
analyzed: bhrātṛ jeṣu vivāhaḥ na na svīkāraḥ ca satkriyā

original: na homādiśca kāryo vai vāṅmātreṇaiva putratā // Ang_1.359 //
analyzed: na homa ādiḥ ca kāryaḥ vai vāc mātreṇa eva putra tā
bhrātṛ putra ādi parigrahaḥ
bhrātṛ putreṣu tiṣṭhatsu na anyam jñāti janam tathā

original: na svīkuryāddūragaṃ vā svīkṛtaścora eva saḥ // Ang_1.360 //
analyzed: na svīkuryāt dūra gam vā svīkṛtaḥ coraḥ eva saḥ
putra grahaṇa kāle tu tad pitroḥ mānasam tadā
toṣayitvā pradāna ādyaiḥ bhaviṣyat kāla kṛtyakam
kṛtvā ca śapatham bāḍham bandhu rāja ādibhiḥ janaiḥ

original: tatputrasya ca maryādā caivamityapi vai punaḥ // Ang_1.362 //
analyzed: tad putrasya ca maryādā ca evam iti api vai punar

original: jāte 'pi caurase bhūyaḥ karomyevaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: jāte ca aurase bhūyas karomi evam na saṃśayaḥ

original: dṛḍhayitvā svayaṃ paścāt svīkuryāttanayaṃ tataḥ // Ang_1.363 //
analyzed: dṛḍhayitvā svayam paścāt svīkuryāt tanayam tatas

original: na ceddoṣo mahāneva bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: na ced doṣaḥ mahān eva bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
svīkṛti anantaram aurasa utpattau

original: svīkṛtya paraputraṃ yaḥ saṃjāte tvaurase punaḥ // Ang_1.364 //
analyzed: svīkṛtya para putram yaḥ saṃjāte tu aurase punar
purā uktāni anyathā kṛtvā mohāt tad ahitam caran
pralapan tat duruktāni mama mā astu ayam adya vai
vadet pāpī mahā krūraḥ tena bhūḥ bhāravatī alam

original: taṃ deśāddhārmiko rājā tāḍayitvā pravāsayet // Ang_1.366 // [046]
analyzed: tam deśāt dhārmikaḥ rājā tāḍayitvā pravāsayet

original: sarvasvaṃ tasya gṛhṇīyāt tasmin janapade na cet /
analyzed: sarva svam tasya gṛhṇīyāt tasmin janapade na ced

original: na varṣetkila parjanyaḥ rāṣṭrakṣobho 'pi jāyate // Ang_1.367 //
analyzed: na varṣet kila parjanyaḥ jāyate
putra pradāna samaye yat uktam tat kartavyam
putra pradāna samaye tad pitroḥ grāhakeṇa yā

original: vāguktā tāṃ tataḥ kāle tiraskartuṃ na śakyate // Ang_1.368 //
analyzed: vāc uktā tām tatas kāle tiraskartum na śakyate
tad bandhubhiḥ tena rājñā taiḥ janaiḥ dātṛ dāpakaiḥ

original: tadbhāryābhistattanayair yena kenāpi vā punaḥ // Ang_1.369 //
analyzed: tad bhāryābhiḥ tad tanayaiḥ yena kena api vā punar
putra pradāna samaye prokta vākyam tu tat param

original: alpaṃ mahadaśakyaṃ vā śakyaṃ vā tanna laṅghayet // Ang_1.370 //
analyzed: alpam mahat aśakyam vā śakyam vā tat na laṅghayet

original: svakāryāya purā proktvā janānāṃ purato dṛḍham /
analyzed: sva kāryāya purā proktvā janānām puratas dṛḍham

original: icchaṃstadanyathayituṃ yatate yastu yā jaḍā // Ang_1.371 //
analyzed: icchan tat anyathayitum yatate yaḥ tu yā jaḍā

original: ūrdhvaṃ lokaṃ na yāto vai bhrūṇahatyāmavāpnutaḥ /
analyzed: ūrdhvam lokam na yātaḥ vai bhrūṇa hatyām avāpnutaḥ
bhartuḥ pituḥ vā vākya atikrame
sva putra hitam icchantyaḥ bhartṛ vākyam purā uditam
tiraskurvanti sahasā tāḥ vai niraya bhājinaḥ

original: bhartuḥ piturvā yadvākyaṃ tadā pūrvamudīritam // Ang_1.373 //
analyzed: bhartuḥ pituḥ vā yat vākyam tadā pūrvam udīritam
maurkhyāt anṛtam maurkhya coditam

original: duḥśrutaṃ paruṣaṃ krūram asmatkāryavirodhi tat // Ang_1.374 //
analyzed: duḥśrutam paruṣam krūram asmad kārya virodhi tat
na api akurma svīkaraṇam iti durātmanaḥ

original: nyakkṛtya vācā dhikkṛtya tāḍayitvā kapolayoḥ // Ang_1.375 //
analyzed: nyakkṛtya vācā dhikkṛtya tāḍayitvā kapolayoḥ
śīghram pravāsayet deśāt sādhūn samyak prapūjayet
bhrātṛ putra svīkṛtau dattasya sama aṃśaḥ
svīkṛta bhrātṛ sūnoḥ ca paścāt jāta aurasasya ca
sama bhāgaḥ sadā proktaḥ tad anyasya punar yadi
sagotrasya turīya bhāgaḥ
turya bhāgaḥ sagotra ādeḥ evam āha pitāmahaḥ

original: auraso vayasā nyūno jyeṣṭha eva na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: aurasaḥ vayasā nyūnaḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: naṣṭe tu pālake tāte svīkṛto vayasādhikaḥ // Ang_1.378 //
analyzed: naṣṭe tu pālake tāte svīkṛtaḥ vayasā adhikaḥ
upanītaḥ kalatrī vā jāta putraḥ yajan

original: yatnācca taṃ nopanayed datto jātaṃ tadaurasam // Ang_1.379 //
analyzed: yatnāt ca tam na upanayet dattaḥ jātam tat aurasam

original: kaniṣṭho dharmato datto hy apyayaṃ vayasādhikaḥ /
analyzed: kaniṣṭhaḥ dharmataḥ dattaḥ hi api ayam vayasā adhikaḥ

original: nyūno 'pi vayasā jyeṣṭhaḥ auraso nātra saṃśayaḥ // Ang_1.380 //
analyzed: vayasā jyeṣṭhaḥ aurasaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ
datta naurase upanīte

original: tasmāddattaḥ svayaṃ paścāj jātaṃ dharmeṇa pūrvajam / [048]
analyzed: tasmāt dattaḥ svayam paścāt jātam dharmeṇa pūrvajam

original: dharmanyūno nopanayed yadi mohena tādṛśam // Ang_1.381 //
analyzed: dharma nyūnaḥ nā upanayet yadi mohena tādṛśam

original: pramādena hyupanayet syātāṃ tau patitau dhruvam /
analyzed: pramādena hi upanayet syātām tau patitau dhruvam
na tayoḥ dvandva bhāvaḥ sti kadācid tu parasparam
mṛta bhāryā yati ādi putra grahaṇam
mṛta bhāryaḥ yatiḥ varṇī viśvastā dūra bhartṛkā

original: putraṃ na pratigṛhṇīyād dūrabhāryo 'pi sūtakī // Ang_1.383 //
analyzed: putram na pratigṛhṇīyāt sūtakī
adhikāraḥ militayoḥ dampatyoḥ ubhayoḥ api
kadācid na pṛthaktvena tad dāne tad pratigrahe
sūti prajanana sthāna āpanna yugma dvayasya ced

original: vastuno melanaṃ putradānaṃ tadgrahaṇaṃ bhavet // Ang_1.385 //
analyzed: vastunaḥ melanam putra dānam tad grahaṇam bhavet
sūti prajanana sthāna yugma dvandva manaḥ sukham
acañcalam sthiram tuṣṭam ced manaḥ tat caret nanu
dampatī dampatī cittam tuṣṭam kṛtvā ambara ādibhiḥ

original: kṛtvā ca śapathaṃ gāḍhaṃ bhaviṣyatkāryahetave // Ang_1.387 //
analyzed: kṛtvā ca śapatham gāḍham bhaviṣyat kārya hetave
sākṣiṇām puratas nūnam deva brāhmaṇa sannidhau

original: rājñe bandhuni cāvedya gṛhṇīyātāṃ sutaṃ tataḥ // Ang_1.388 //
analyzed: rājñe bandhuni ca āvedya gṛhṇīyātām sutam tatas
tad kāle pratijñāya tad akaraṇe

original: śapathānantaraṃ kālān maryādā yā kṛtā purā /
analyzed: śapatha anantaram kālāt maryādā yā kṛtā purā
narāḥ tān ullaṅghayata rājā rāṣṭrāt pravāsayet

original: patnīṣu sutasvīkārakāle yā sannihitā sā mātā,
analyzed: patnīṣu suta svīkāra kāle yā sannihitā sā mātā
anyā sapatnī mātā

original: sutasvīkaraṇe yā ''rāt sthitā sā 'mbāsya vai bhavet /
analyzed: suta svīkaraṇe yā rāt sthitā sā mbā asya vai bhavet

original: sāpatnī jananī dūrasthitā bhavati nānyathā // Ang_1.390 //
analyzed: sāpatnī jananī dūra sthitā bhavati nā anyathā
anye mātṛ mātāmaha ādayaḥ

original: dve tisro vā sthitāścettu tadārādeva kevalam /
analyzed: dve tisraḥ vā sthitāḥ ced tu tad ārāt eva kevalam

original: putragrahaṇatuṣṭyaiva bhartrā sākaṃ hṛdā tayā // Ang_1.391 //
analyzed: putra grahaṇa tuṣṭyā eva bhartrā sākam hṛdā tayā

original: nikhilā mātaro jñeyā bahumātṛka eva saḥ /
analyzed: nikhilāḥ mātaraḥ jñeyāḥ bahu mātṛkaḥ eva saḥ

original: tadānīṃ svīkṛtasuto nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // Ang_1.392 //
analyzed: tadānīm svīkṛta sutaḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: tāsāṃ ca pitaraḥ sarve 'pyasya mātāmahāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: tāsām ca pitaraḥ sarve pi asya mātāmahāḥ smṛtāḥ
sarva śrāddheṣu anena atha sarvān mātāmahān kramāt
ekasmin eva tat piṇḍe yojayet vā pṛthak tu vā
piṇḍān vā nikṣipet teṣām smartḥṇām atra kevalam
vacanānām sama tvena vikalpaḥ tulyaḥ eva hi

original: yathāruci prakurvīta yathā vā purataḥ kṛtam // Ang_1.395 //
analyzed: yathāruci prakurvīta yathā vā puratas kṛtam
tathā eva paścāt kurvīta sarvatra evam hi nirṇayaḥ
sapatnī pitā na mātāmahaḥ

original: sapatnījananītāto na tu mātāmaho bhavet // Ang_1.396 //
analyzed: sapatnī jananī tātaḥ na tu mātāmahaḥ bhavet
sapatnī mātṛ tarpaṇam
sapatnī jananī nitya tarpaṇe dvi añjalī labhet

original: svamātṛvattyrañjaliṃ sā kadācidapi no labhet // Ang_1.397 //
analyzed: sva mātṛ vattyā añjalim sā kadācid api no labhet
punar vivāhitena eva tad bhāryā dvi añjalim labhet

original: aputrā vā saputrā vā tatsamā sā prakīrtitā // Ang_1.398 //
analyzed: aputrā vā sa putrā vā tad samā sā prakīrtitā
tasyāḥ aupāsana agnau śrāddham

original: tasyā aupāsane śrāddham agnau kuryānna laukike /
analyzed: tasyāḥ aupāsane śrāddham agnau kuryāt na laukike

original: yadi kuryātpramādena kulaṃ tasya vinaśyati // Ang_1.399 //
analyzed: yadi kuryāt pramādena kulam tasya vinaśyati
patnyāḥ agniḥ
yatas patnī mṛta dinam pitṛ nāśa dinena vai

original: tulyatvenaiva kathitaṃ tasyāḥ ko vā vimūḍhadhīḥ // Ang_1.400 //
analyzed: tulya tvena eva kathitam tasyāḥ kaḥ vā vimūḍha dhīḥ
laukika agnau prakurvīta sva samāyāḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: sā vidyamānā bhāryaiva mṛtā cenmātṛvargagā // Ang_1.401 //
analyzed: sā vidyamānā bhāryā eva mṛtā ced mātṛ varga gā
bhrātṛ putra grahaṇa vidhiḥ
kṛta traya vivāhasya patnīm dṛṣṭvā ciram pṛthak
dvādaśa abdam a labhya etam tad rajaḥ darśanāt param
putra grahaḥ prakathitaḥ mukhyaḥ yam tad grahe vidhiḥ
tatra sākṣāt kaniṣṭhasya sutaḥ ced jāta mātrakaḥ

original: pravaraḥ kathitaḥ sadbhis tasya vyavahitaśca cet /
analyzed: pravaraḥ kathitaḥ sadbhiḥ tasya vyavahitaḥ ca ced
tasmāt nyūnaḥ bhavet putraḥ evam dvi tri vibhedataḥ
bhrātuḥ putraḥ bhavet nyūnaḥ sadyas stanya rasa grahāt
param tad grahaṇāt putraḥ tasmāt nyūnaḥ prajāyate
evam anyeṣu navasu jāta homāt param pṛthak

original: dinabhedena tannyūno datto bhavati putrakaḥ // Ang_1.406 //
analyzed: dina bhedena tad nyūnaḥ dattaḥ bhavati putrakaḥ

original: tato jyeṣṭhasya cetputras tannyūno nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: tatas jyeṣṭhasya ced putraḥ tad nyūnaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: na cāpyekadvitribhedād bhrātā vyavahito yadi // Ang_1.407 //
analyzed: na ca api eka dvi tri bhedāt bhrātā vyavahitaḥ yadi
tasya sūnuḥ tathā nyūnaḥ evam eva punar tu atha
sāpatnī mātṛ tanayāḥ unneyāḥ jyeṣṭhataḥ param

original: tanayāḥ śāstramārgeṇa nyūnā eva bhavanti te /
analyzed: tanayāḥ śāstra mārgeṇa nyūnāḥ eva bhavanti te
evam pitṛvya tanaya tanayāḥ ca pṛthagvidhāḥ

original: tannyūnā eva kathitāḥ sagotrā evameva vai /
analyzed: tad nyūnāḥ eva kathitāḥ sagotrāḥ evam eva vai

original: vijñeyāḥ kila kiṃ bhinnagotrāścettu tataḥ punaḥ // Ang_1.410 //
analyzed: vijñeyāḥ kila kim bhinna gotrāḥ ced tu tatas punar
kim vācyam asti tat jñātvā buddhimān kāla deśakau
samālocya vidhānena kuryāt putrasya saṃgraham
vibhāge bhrātaraḥ tulyāḥ
vibhāge bhrātaraḥ tulyāḥ tad putrāḥ tad samāḥ hi yat

original: te gṛhītvā na turyāśaṃ tallabhante sutodbhave // Ang_1.412 //
analyzed: te gṛhītvā na turya āśam tat labhante suta udbhave

original: samameva labhante 'ṃśam aurasena samā hi te /
analyzed: samam eva labhante ṃśam aurasena samāḥ hi te

original: dharmapatnyāṃ samudbhūta aurasaḥ kathito budhaiḥ // Ang_1.413 //
analyzed: dharmapatnyām samudbhūtaḥ aurasaḥ kathitaḥ budhaiḥ
dvitīya ādi samudbhūtaḥ na tad sāmyam avāpnuyāt
kāma ja putrāḥ
dharma patnī sutam prāhuḥ aurasam brahma vādinaḥ
dvitīya ādi sutān sarvān kāma jān iti cocire
dharma patnī sutaḥ jyaiṣṭhyam dattāt gauravam āpnuyāt
paścāt jātaḥ dvitīya ādi sutāḥ tu ced
pitrya ādi kriyayā kālāt dharma patnī sutaiḥ samāḥ
bhavanti api na saṃdehaḥ tathā api punar ekakam
pravadāmi samudbhūtaḥ tasmāt tad kārya kṛt bhavet
vayaḥ dhikaḥ datta sutaḥ na tad kārye prabhuḥ bhavet

original: dattasūnurdharmapatnyāḥ sati tāte 'thavā na cet // Ang_1.418 //
analyzed: dattasūnuḥ dharmapatnyāḥ sati tāte na ced
dvi bhāryake kriyā kṛt ced tad bhāryāyāḥ atha api vā
datta sūnuḥ tayoḥ anyatarasya yadi karma kṛt
sati aurase tad samaḥ yam prabhavet iti vai manuḥ

original: dauhitro yadi dattaḥ syād bhrātṛjo vā tathāvidhaḥ // Ang_1.420 //
analyzed: dauhitraḥ yadi dattaḥ syāt bhrātṛ jaḥ vā tathāvidhaḥ
aurasena eva tulitau satatam dharma tatparau

original: dattasya pitarau proktau grāhakāveva saṃtatam // Ang_1.421 //
analyzed: dattasya pitarau proktau grāhakau eva saṃtatam
pitṛ tvam api dattena tiṣṭhet janakayoḥ na tu

original: dānahomātparaṃ tasmāt pitarāvasya tau matau // Ang_1.422 //
analyzed: dāna homāt param tasmāt pitarau asya tau matau
pitṛ tvam api mātṛ tvam ekatra eva hi tiṣṭhati
na tiṣṭhati tat anyatra kriyā śata sahasrakāt
pitṛ tvam mātari gatam eka śeṣa jam alpakam

original: yathā na tatkāryakaraṃ mātṛtvamapi tattathā // Ang_1.424 // [053]
analyzed: yathā na tat kārya karam mātṛ tvam api tat tathā
pitṛvya patnī ādīnām syāt tādṛś patnī tvam eva hi

original: tāsāṃ bhavati tasmāttu na tanmātṛtvamuccaret // Ang_1.425 //
analyzed: tāsām bhavati tasmāt tu na tad mātṛ tvam uccaret
prajāpatibhyaḥ hi abhimāna sūnuḥ pitṛvya sūnuḥ tu athavā sagotraḥ

original: jyeṣṭhaḥ kanīyānna bhavettathaiko na bhinnagotro na sagotravidviṭ // Ang_1.426 //
analyzed: jyeṣṭhaḥ kanīyān na bhavet tathā ekaḥ na bhinna gotraḥ na sagotra vidviṣ
sagotrī a saṃmataḥ sūnuḥ yaḥ kaścana samāgataḥ
putra tvena udara paraḥ na abhimāna sutaḥ bhavet
dharma patnī sutaḥ varṇī dvitīya ādi sutaḥ gṛhī
jāta putraḥ pi āhitāgniḥ na samastena varṇinā
dharma patnī sutaḥ bālaḥ dvitīya ādi sutaḥ yuvā
āhitāgniḥ daśa sutaḥ na samastena coditaḥ

original: sa eva pitṛkṛtyeṣu mukhyakartā na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva pitṛ kṛtyeṣu mukhya kartā na saṃśayaḥ
pi asau yadi api atha khilam
kārayet jyeṣṭha mukhataḥ tathā ced karma tat param
jāta mātre dharma patnī sute gauṇa sutāḥ pare
dvitīya ādi purā udbhūtāḥ bhaveyuḥ tad kṣaṇāt nanu
dharma patnī suta utpatyā ca
dvitīya ādi sutānām syāt sadyas hainyam śruti īritam
tad patnī karma kartā ced dvitīyā tanayasya saḥ
datta ādau viśeṣaḥ
dattaḥ dhikaḥ ced bhavati pituḥ yadi punastarām

original: asannidhau sannidhau vā tāte jīvati dattakaḥ // Ang_1.434 //
analyzed: asannidhau sannidhau vā tāte jīvati dattakaḥ
tad bhāryā karma kartā ced tad sutā patiḥ iṣyate
dvitīyā tanayaḥ ced tu karma kṛt dattakaḥ tadā
sadyas hainyam avāpnoti na jyeṣṭhā tanayaḥ yadi

original: tātastaddharmapatnī ca samau dattasya saṃtatam // Ang_1.436 //
analyzed: tātaḥ tad dharma patnī ca samau dattasya saṃtatam

original: parāṇi tatkalatrāṇi saṃskāryāṇi suto na cet /
analyzed: parāṇi tad kalatrāṇi saṃskāryāṇi sutaḥ na ced

original: sute sati sa eva syāt tatkarmaṇi na cetaraḥ // Ang_1.437 //
analyzed: sute sati saḥ eva syāt tad karmaṇi na ca itaraḥ

original: sarvadaivaṃ samākhyāto na tenāyaṃ hi durbalaḥ /
analyzed: sarvadā evam samākhyātaḥ na tena ayam hi durbalaḥ

original: dattena tatkalatrasya prathamasya kṛtā kriyā // Ang_1.438 //
analyzed: dattena tad kalatrasya prathamasya kṛtā kriyā
satyanyā tanaye tāvat mātreṇa ayam atha adhikaḥ

original: turyāṃśo 'pi samāṃśaḥ syāt tādṛśaṃ karma tatkṛtam // Ang_1.439 //
analyzed: samāṃśaḥ syāt tādṛśam karma tat kṛtam
sati datta sute tasmāt pitṛ patnyā vicakṣaṇaḥ
jyeṣṭhāyāḥ tad kaniṣṭhā jaḥ svayam karma samācaret
jyeṣṭhena datta putreṇa tad kṣetrasya pituḥ tu vā

original: kṛte karmaṇi tasya syād ādhikyaṃ tatsutātparam // Ang_1.441 //
analyzed: kṛte karmaṇi tasya syāt ādhikyam tat sutāt param

original: tāte sati kalatrasya tatpuro jyāyaso 'sya cet /
analyzed: tāte sati kalatrasya tad puras ced

original: kṛtaṃ karma hi dattena sadyaḥ putrādhiko bhavet // Ang_1.442 //
analyzed: kṛtam karma hi dattena sadyas putra adhikaḥ bhavet

original: putreṣu satsu dattena pituḥ karma kṛtaṃ tu cet /
analyzed: putreṣu satsu dattena pituḥ karma kṛtam tu ced

original: na tadā tasya vādhikyaṃ svāmyaṃ kimapi labhyate // Ang_1.443 // [055]
analyzed: na tadā tasya vā ādhikyam svāmyam kim api labhyate

original: yadi tajjyeṣṭhabhāryāyā aputrāyāḥ kṛtaṃ tu tat /
analyzed: yadi tad jyeṣṭha bhāryāyāḥ aputrāyāḥ kṛtam tu tat

original: karma tatpurato nūnaṃ dattaḥ syādadhikaḥ sutāt // Ang_1.444 //
analyzed: karma tat puratas nūnam dattaḥ syāt adhikaḥ sutāt

original: pituḥ karma kṛtaṃ tena dattena yadi tatparam /
analyzed: pituḥ karma kṛtam tena dattena yadi tat param

original: apyayaṃ mukhyakartā na mukhyaḥ syātsuta eva vai // Ang_1.445 //
analyzed: api ayam mukhya kartā na mukhyaḥ syāt sutaḥ eva vai
nikhilebhyaḥ sutebhyaḥ sau aurasaḥ hi atiricyate
patnī viśeṣāḥ
tatra dharma patnī

original: auraso dharmapatnījo dharmapatnī ca kevalam // Ang_1.446 //
analyzed: aurasaḥ dharmapatnījaḥ dharmapatnī ca kevalam

original: yā 'nena pūrvaṃ bālā vā durguṇā vā vivāhitā /
analyzed: yā nena pūrvam bālā vā durguṇā vā vivāhitā
sā eva asya dharmapatnī syāt dharma vidbhiḥ udāhṛtā
dvitīya patnī

original: tatpaścādyā kulīnā vā surūpā vā vayo 'dhikā /
analyzed: tad paścāt yā kulīnā vā surūpā vā vayaḥ dhikā

original: na sāsya dharmapatnī syād vitīyā bhoginī smṛtā // Ang_1.448 //
analyzed: na sā asya dharma patnī syāt vitīyā bhoginī smṛtā
sati ced tanaye talpe punar kāmāt vivāhitā

original: dvitīyā bhoginī nārī dharmapatnī na socyate // Ang_1.449 //
analyzed: dvitīyā bhoginī nārī dharma patnī na sā ucyate
putrāṇām jyaiṣṭhya kāniṣṭhyam
dharma patnī samudbhūtaḥ jyeṣṭha putraḥ iti smṛtaḥ
patnī tanaya rāhitya kṛta vaivāhikasya sā
yā iyam ūḍhā dharma hetoḥ dharmapatnī abhicoditā
bhoginī

original: kalatre sati putre vā pautre naptari santatau // Ang_1.451 //
analyzed: kalatre sati putre vā pautre naptari santatau
sthitāyām yā iyam ūḍhā syāt bhoginī kāñcana āhvayā
bharmaṇa avāvāta ādi patnayaḥ

original: bharmaṇo yāni nāmāni tāni sarvāṇi kṛtstraśaḥ // Ang_1.452 //
analyzed: bharmaṇaḥ yāni nāmāni tāni sarvāṇi kṛtstraśas
sā proktā dvitīyā kāñcana āhvayā

original: na dharmapatnī bhavati bhoginyeva parā smṛtā // Ang_1.453 //
analyzed: na dharma patnī bhavati bhoginī eva parā smṛtā

original: bharmaṇeyaṃ yataḥ sādhyā vanitā tena sā smṛtā /
analyzed: bharmaṇā iyam yatas sādhyā vanitā tena sā smṛtā
sarva svarṇa padaiḥ vācyā vāvātā iti ca phaṇyate
parā durvarṇa nāmāni yāni khyātāni bhū tale

original: tāni sarvāṇyavāpnoti tṛtīyeti ca tāṃ viduḥ // Ang_1.455 //
analyzed: tāni sarvāṇi avāpnoti tṛtīyā iti ca tām viduḥ
parivṛttī iti tām eke vijñeyāḥ vimalām iti
haridrām hariṇīm kalyām jagaduḥ brahma vādinaḥ
etāsām tanayāḥ sarve pi uttarottara durbalāḥ
dharma patnī sutāt nyūnāḥ vayasā api adhikāḥ tarām

original: prathamā dharmapatnī ca subhagā mahiṣīti ca /
analyzed: prathamā dharma patnī ca subhagā mahiṣī iti ca

original: satkarṇīti ca kalyāṇī dharmajñaiḥ kathitā hi sā // Ang_1.458 //
analyzed: satkarṇī iti ca kalyāṇī dharma jñaiḥ kathitā hi sā
dharma patnī sutaḥ bālaḥ vā
tiṣṭhatsu ca anyā putreṣu karmabhiḥ satkṛteṣu api
uttamaḥ pitṛ kṛtyeṣu tasmāt agni pradaḥ sa tu

original: tena prādhānikaṃ karma yadyattattattu tanmukhāt // Ang_1.460 //
analyzed: tena prādhānikam karma yat yat tat tat tu tad mukhāt
samyak kārayitum nyāyyam mantrān sarvān pare sutāḥ

original: paṭheyurvai vidhānena caiva dharmo 'khilo mahān // Ang_1.461 // [057]
analyzed: paṭheyuḥ vai vidhānena ca eva khilaḥ mahān

original: vihitastu samāsena tena yāvatkṛtaṃ na tu /
analyzed: vihitaḥ tu samāsena tena yāvat kṛtam na tu

original: tāvatsa tu mṛto tātaḥ paralokaṃ na vindati // Ang_1.462 //
analyzed: tāvat sa tu tātaḥ para lokam na vindati
preta tvāt ca na nirmuktaḥ kṣudh tṛṣṇā pīḍitaḥ tarām

original: śaraṇaṃ yatra kutrāpi hy aṭan dhāvan khalan bhraman // Ang_1.463 //
analyzed: śaraṇam yatra kutra api hi aṭan dhāvan khalan bhraman
nityam ca salila ākāṅkṣī preta loke hi adhomukhaḥ

original: rugṇo muṇḍaśca vikalo jaḍo bhrāntaśca durmanāḥ // Ang_1.464 //
analyzed: rugṇaḥ muṇḍaḥ ca vikalaḥ jaḍaḥ bhrāntaḥ ca durmanāḥ
nivaset eva satatam tasmāt aurasaḥ eva saḥ
dharma patnī samudbhūtaḥ hi a parijñāta varṇakaḥ
pretakārya sparśa mātram snātvā kuryāt amantrakam
tāvat mātreṇa tat tātaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ sukhītarām
samyak pitṛ tvam āpnoti nitya ānandaḥ prajāyate
tad tad mātuḥ tad tanayāḥ mukhya kartāraḥ īritāḥ

original: satsvauraseṣu mukhyatvāt ta eva kathitāḥ parāḥ /
analyzed: satsu auraseṣu mukhya tvāt te eva kathitāḥ parāḥ
tad tad karmasu kartāraḥ na anya mātṛ samudbhavāḥ
dharma patnī sute bāle kevalam rahita akṣare

original: aspaṣṭaspaṣṭavarṇe vā vidyamāne mṛte tu vā // Ang_1.469 //
analyzed: aspaṣṭa spaṣṭa varṇe vā vidyamāne mṛte tu vā
kakṣyā anantara niṣṭhena yena kena sutena vā
tad samena thavā bhrātrā śiṣyeṇa anyena bandhunā

original: sarvaṃ kārayitavyaṃ syāt samantreṇātra tatra cet /
analyzed: sarvam kārayitavyam syāt sa mantreṇa atra tatra ced

original: yadyatprādhānikaṃ karma tatra tatrāsya vai śiśoḥ // Ang_1.471 // [058]
analyzed: yat yat prādhānikam karma tatra tatra asya vai śiśoḥ
sānnidhyam sparśa mātra kartṛ tvam
sparśa mātraḥ prakartavyaḥ tad sānnidhyam ca kevalam
apekṣitam mṛtasya atra mahā tṛptyā eka hetave
tad sānnidhya sparśa mātrāt sa mṛtaḥ sukha bhāgalam

original: bhavedeva na saṃdehas tathā tasmāttu taccaret // Ang_1.473 //
analyzed: bhavet eva na saṃdehaḥ tathā tasmāt tu tat caret
mṛtasya etāni proktāni tārakāṇi mahātmabhiḥ

original: kārakāṇi mahātṛptes tānīmāni smṛtāni hi // Ang_1.474 //
analyzed: kārakāṇi mahā tṛpteḥ tāni imāni smṛtāni hi
śrāddha ādau atyanta tṛpti karāṇi
jakāra pañcakam tu ekam dharma patnī ja sannidhiḥ
tad kārya karaṇam tadvat grahaṇaśrāddham eva ca
gayā śrāddham ca phalgunyāḥ śāka śrāddham atha api ca

original: tathaiva varaṇaṃ gauryā vṛṣotsarjanameva ca // Ang_1.476 //
analyzed: tathā eva varaṇam gauryāḥ vṛṣotsarjanam eva ca

original: mahālayaśca panasas ta ete nikhilāḥ parāḥ /
analyzed: mahālayaḥ ca panasaḥ te ete nikhilāḥ parāḥ
atyanta tṛpti muktyā eka nidānāni iti tān jaguḥ
janma bhūmi ādikam tatra tat jakārasya pañcakam

original: mṛtasya tārakaṃ pūrvaṃ tatparaṃ tvaurasasya vai // Ang_1.478 //
analyzed: mṛtasya tārakam pūrvam tat param tu aurasasya vai
sānnidhyam mṛti kāle tu dvitīya ādi sutasya vā
para loka anukūlā yā mṛtasya prabhavet tathā
tad kriyā mantra pūrvā evam mṛtasya prabhavet tathā
evam syāt grahaṇa śrāddham gayā śrāddham atha aparam
tṛpti dam phālgunīśrāddham aṣṭottaraśataiḥ uta

original: śāke śrāddhaṃ yatkriyate tadekamatha tārakam // Ang_1.481 //
analyzed: śāke śrāddham yat kriyate tat ekam atha tārakam
gaurīdānam vṛṣotsargaḥ pākṣikaḥ yam mahālayaḥ

original: sthāpanaṃ panasākhyasya tānīmāni smṛtāni hi // Ang_1.482 //
analyzed: sthāpanam panasa ākhyasya tāni imāni smṛtāni hi
pitḥṇām api sarveṣām vallabhāni iti vai jaguḥ
jakārapañcakam vatsaḥ para loka gatasya tat
tṛptyai sa taraṇāya api provāca evam na ca itarat
jakāra pañcakam
jvalanaḥ janana utpanna suta sānnidhyam eva ca
grahaṇa śrāddha lakṣaṇam
graha sparśāt atha yatan sadyas patnī ādibhiḥ vṛtaḥ
tadā annena evam yat śrāddham karoti pitṛ tṛptaye
snātvā tena eva vidhinā tat grahaśrāddham ucyate
tat etat kila deveśaḥ bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ
ṣoḍaśa śrāddha tulitam mahā dāna śata adhikam

original: provāca kila sarveśo gayasya sumahātmanaḥ // Ang_1.488 //
analyzed: provāca kila sarva īśaḥ gayasya su mahātmanaḥ
gayā phalgunikā śāka śrāddhāni etad samāni vai
gaurī dānam tathā evā iti vṛṣotsarjanam eva ca
mahānti niṣkriyāṇi iti manuḥ kātyāyanaḥ ṅgirāḥ
kutsa vatsa agni bharata viśvāmitra śuka ādayaḥ
na eteṣām tulyam aparam paitṛkam karma vidyate
lokatraye pi paramam tasmāt eteṣu ca ekakam

original: api kartā kṛtārthaḥ syāt sukṛtī pitṛtārakaḥ /
analyzed: api kartā kṛtārthaḥ syāt sukṛtī pitṛ tārakaḥ

original: ityevamenaṃ jahṛṣuḥ panasasthāpakaṃ tu tam // Ang_1.492 //
analyzed: iti evam enam jahṛṣuḥ panasa sthāpakam tu tam

original: vayaṃ na vidmaḥ ko vā sa dūrvāsājanako 'thavā /
analyzed: vayam na vidmaḥ kaḥ vā sa

original: kumbhodbhavo dadhīcirvā śibirvā nahuṣo nalaḥ // Ang_1.493 //
analyzed: kumbha udbhavaḥ dadhīciḥ vā śibiḥ vā nahuṣaḥ nalaḥ
māndhātā vā pyalarkaḥ vā mahān

original: gayo rāmo 'thavā śrīmān eṣu caiko 'thavā na cet // Ang_1.494 //
analyzed: śrīmān eṣu ca ekaḥ na ced
etat samaṣṭiḥ lokānām hitāya bhuvaḥ sthale

original: avatīrṇo na sandeha iti brahmā śivo hariḥ // Ang_1.495 //
analyzed: avatīrṇaḥ na sandehaḥ iti brahmā śivaḥ hariḥ
panase sthāpite mahān viśeṣaḥ
panasa sthāpakam procuḥ śalāṭoḥ tasya pṛṣṭhatas
sarve kaṇṭaka rūpeṇa samāśritya eva santatam
aṣṭottaraśata śrāddha divya śāka viśeṣakāḥ
pravartante yatas tasmāt tadā śāka sahasrakam
tasya asya divya rūpasya pitṛ prāṇa eka rūpiṇaḥ
sarva deva sva rūpasya sarva mantra mayasya ca
sarva yajña mahā tīrtha sarit agni suvarṣmaṇaḥ
nikhila āgama śāstra ogha vrata kṛcchra amṛta andhasām
nidhānasya pavitrasya pitrya ākarṣaṇa varṣmaṇaḥ
sthāpanam kriyate yena tat chāyā patra mūlakaiḥ
phalaiḥ śalāṭubhiḥ vā api kāṣṭhaiḥ chāyābhiḥ eva ca
kriyate pitṛ tṛptiḥ syāt buddhi pūrvam abuddhitaḥ

original: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ guruṇā brahmaṇāpi vā /
analyzed: tasya puṇya phalam vaktum guruṇā brahmaṇā api vā

original: śakyaṃ varṣasahasreṇa phaṇirājena vā na tu // Ang_1.502 //
analyzed: śakyam varṣa sahasreṇa phaṇi rājena vā na tu
purā kila khilaśākakāḥ

original: tapastaptvā vareṇātha brahmaṇaḥ panasaṃ śritāḥ // Ang_1.503 //
analyzed: tapaḥ taptvā vareṇa atha brahmaṇaḥ panasam śritāḥ
alarka śrāddham
alaka alarka kārūṣa acyuta cūta anara amarāḥ
saptasu eteṣu acyutaḥ ced alarkaḥ ca ajarāḥ trayaḥ
pratimāsa ja bhedena smṛtāḥ dvādaśa jātayaḥ
atas ṣaṭtriṃśatka saṃkhyā tasmāt etad trayasya ca
eteṣām māsa jānām syāt eka jāti śalāṭutaḥ
tad bhinna ekādaśānām ca śalāṭu phala bhedataḥ

original: dvaividhyaṃ kila saṃprāptaṃ śalāṭorapi vai muhuḥ /
analyzed: dvaividhyam kila saṃprāptam śalāṭoḥ api vai muhur
ārdra śuṣka prabhedena dvaividhyam samupāgatam
tadvat phalānām ca punar vaividhyam samupāgatam
tat caitra āmalakaḥ grāhyaḥ āśarat sa pavitrakaḥ
divya śākāḥ śrāddha arhāḥ

original: vārukaḥ karmajaḥ śāriḥ śrīparṇaṃ śrīkaraḥ śamī /
yugado yugmado ramyaṃ vajraparṇī karīṣakī // Ang_1.509 //

analyzed: kāma vāhī kāma dūraḥ śākuṭa dvayam agrimā
kāmapram kāma dam kamraḥ kaliṅgaḥ kalivārukaḥ

original: kulaṃ kārī manurmānī rājaśrīḥ śekharī nalaḥ /
nālakaṃ kārakaḥ khādyo gāyatro harilocanaḥ // Ang_1.512 //
kārmukaḥ karmakṛtkāryo dhairyado mānakṛt kuṇiḥ // Ang_1.513 //

analyzed: valmīkajaḥ bālarājaḥ bālaputraḥ bṛhadrathaḥ

original: maṇimālo bṛhannālo nārado likuco naṭaḥ // Ang_1.519 //

analyzed: śvatthaḥ sundaraḥ parvata āśrayaḥ
pūrṇapātram śarma pātram śātakumbhaḥ sthira ākaraḥ
prāṇa taraṇaḥ devarāja priyaḥ paṇaḥ
guhā vāsaḥ guhā āścayam bharaṇyam muni vanditaḥ

original: ta ete divyaśākāḥ syuḥ śrāddhakarmaṇi coditāḥ // Ang_1.527 //
analyzed: te ete divya śākāḥ syuḥ śrāddha karmaṇi coditāḥ
eteṣām amla yogena tad ayogena ca dvidhā

original: bhaveyuḥ kila te bhūya eteṣāṃ punareva vai // Ang_1.528 //
analyzed: bhaveyuḥ kila te bhūyas eteṣām punar eva vai
madhye śākuṭaka ādīni mūlataḥ stambhataḥ tathā
patrataḥ trividhaḥ jñeyaḥ kānicid śuṣka bhedataḥ
pakvena jala tailābhyām pṛthaktvena samaṣṭitaḥ
cūrṇa kalka prabhedena yatnatas syāt sahasrakam
panasa mahimā
etat sarvam ca eka pātre nidhāya kila padmajaḥ

original: anyapātre ca panasaṃ tulayāmāsa pāṇinā // Ang_1.531 //
analyzed: anya pātre ca panasam tulayāmāsa pāṇinā

original: tadā tu panasaḥ kiṃcid babhūvādhika eva vai / [065]
analyzed: tadā tu panasaḥ kiṃcid babhūva adhikaḥ eva vai

original: bṛhatī triśatasamā tadā jātā hi paśyatām // Ang_1.532 //
analyzed: bṛhatī tri śata samā tadā jātā hi paśyatām
ārdrakam ṣaṣ śata samam tilāḥ śata samam tarām

original: evaṃ tulāyāṃ tritayaṃ saṃbabhūva tadādi vai // Ang_1.533 //
analyzed: evam tulāyām tritayam saṃbabhūva tad ādi vai
bhū tale brāhmaṇāḥ santaḥ pavitre śrāddha karmaṇi
tulyam śāka sahasrasya tila ārdraka bṛhatkakam
saṃpādayanti yatnena pitḥṇām atitṛptaye
tila māṣa vrīhi yavāḥ mudga godhūma śākakāḥ

original: kāśā daśavidhā darbhā mukhyāmukhyāśca ye matāḥ /
analyzed: kāśāḥ daśavidhāḥ darbhāḥ mukhya amukhyāḥ ca ye matāḥ
khaḍgam daśavidham māṃsam preta parpaṭa bhūtapāḥ
vāmadeva ādayaḥ viprāḥ pitṛ sūkta viśeṣakāḥ
gayā ādi puṇya kṣetrāṇi vaṭa bhūruhaḥ eva ca
bindu mādhava viśveśa caturdaśa padāni ca
īśāna ādi mukhāni evam gadādhara maheśvarau

original: bhāgīrathī phalgunī ca yamunā ca sarasvatī /
analyzed: bhāgīrathī phalgunī ca yamunā ca sarasvatī
pitṛsūktāni sarvāṇi vaiṣṇavāni viśeṣataḥ
rakṣaḥ ghnāni pavitrāṇi punar anye tathāvidhāḥ
śrāddha dravya viśeṣāḥ syuḥ pitḥṇām ativallabhāḥ
te sarve panasaḥ tu ekaḥ su mahā kṣaya kārakaḥ
etasmin panase labdhe sarva śrāddha nidānake
mṛtāha divase puṇye nitya tṛptāḥ su toṣitāḥ

original: pitarastundilāḥ sadyo bhavantyeveti sā śrutiḥ // Ang_1.542 // [066]
analyzed: pitaraḥ tundilāḥ sadyas bhavanti eva iti sā śrutiḥ

original: evaṃ satyatra yo martyaḥ panasasthāpako hṛdā /
analyzed: evam sati atra yaḥ martyaḥ panasa sthāpakaḥ hṛdā
matyā matyā athavā tīvam bhaktyā bhaktyā athavā punar
jñānena jñānataḥ vā bhū tale yatra kutracid

original: sa eva kathitaḥ sadbhir gayāśrāddhasahasrakṛt // Ang_1.544 //
analyzed: saḥ eva kathitaḥ sadbhiḥ gayā śrāddha sahasra kṛt
panasam sahakāraiḥ ca kadala ādi drumaiḥ saha
sthāpayitvā vidhānena yatnāt saṃvardhitaiḥ śivaiḥ
campakaiḥ pāṭalībhiḥ ca madhūkaiḥ su manoramaiḥ
candanaiḥ spandanaiḥ nīpaiḥ tad chāyābhiḥ ca tad phalaiḥ
patraiḥ puṣpaiḥ ca tad kāṣṭhaiḥ nānā śāka viśeṣakaiḥ
kurvan sva vṛtyā prayatan kula koṭi sahasrakaiḥ
brahma lokam avāpya iha tad sāyujyam avāpnuyāt

original: panasaṃ yatra kutrāpi dṛṣṭvā sadyo mahāmanāḥ // Ang_1.548 //
analyzed: panasam yatra kutra api dṛṣṭvā sadyas mahā manāḥ
tat kāṣṭha patra kusuma śalāṭu phala mukhyakaiḥ

original: yena kenāpi vā tṛptiṃ pitḥṇāṃ tāṃ samācaret // Ang_1.549 //
analyzed: yena kena api vā tṛptim pitḥṇām tām samācaret

original: sadya eva brāhmaṇebhyo labdhamātre ca tatphale /
analyzed: sadyas eva brāhmaṇebhyaḥ labdha mātre ca tad phale
dṛṣṭa mātre bhaktyā dadyāt vai pitṛ tṛptaye

original: śalāṭuṃ pānasaṃ patraṃ phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu yo naraḥ /
analyzed: śalāṭum pānasam patram phalam dṛṣṭvā tu yaḥ naraḥ
pitṛ tṛptim a kṛtvā eva tūṣṇīm tiṣṭhet mahā jaḍaḥ

original: taṃ tasya pitaraḥ sarve śapanti kila kopataḥ /
analyzed: tam tasya pitaraḥ sarve śapanti kila kopataḥ
dṛṣṭa mātre tu tasmāt tu pānasa dravyam uttamam

original: yena kenāpyupāyena patreṇa ca phalena vā / [067]
analyzed: yena kena api upāyena patreṇa ca phalena vā
śalāṭunā chāyayā vā pitṛ tṛpti nimattakam
yat kiṃcid api vā teṣu brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pradāpayet

original: tāvanmātreṇa pitaro nityatṛptā bhavanti vai // Ang_1.554 //
analyzed: tāvat mātreṇa pitaraḥ nitya tṛptāḥ bhavanti vai

original: evaṃ satyatra yaḥ kaścid bhāgyavān panasī naraḥ /
analyzed: evam sati atra yaḥ kaścid bhāgyavān panasī naraḥ

original: taddravyairaniśaṃ bhaktyā tṛptyakṛt pātakī bhavet // Ang_1.555 //
analyzed: tad dravyaiḥ aniśam bhaktyā tṛpti akṛt pātakī bhavet

original: gālavastu purā vipro dṛṣṭvā bījāni bhaktitaḥ /
analyzed: gālavaḥ tu purā vipraḥ dṛṣṭvā bījāni bhaktitaḥ

original: krayeṇa pañcaṣān gṛhya pitṛprītyai bubhukṣitaḥ // Ang_1.556 //
analyzed: krayeṇa pañcaṣān gṛhya pitṛ prītyai bubhukṣitaḥ

original: svayaṃ patnyā bhakṣayitvā pitṛtṛptiṃ cakāra ha /
analyzed: svayam patnyā bhakṣayitvā pitṛ tṛptim cakāra ha

original: tāvanmātreṇa te cāpi paraṃ tṛptāḥ śatābdakāt // Ang_1.557 //
analyzed: tāvat mātreṇa te ca api param tṛptāḥ śata abdakāt
ānanda sāgare magnāḥ babhūbuḥ iti naḥ śrutam

original: purā kuśavane puṇye māṇḍavyo vedavittamaḥ // Ang_1.558 //
analyzed: purā kuśa vane puṇye māṇḍavyaḥ veda vittamaḥ
mahā vindhya aṭavī mārge panasam kārtike vaśāt

original: dṛṣṭvārkaṃ ca natastūṣṇīṃ samālocya kṣaṇātparam // Ang_1.559 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā arkam ca nataḥ tūṣṇīm samālocya kṣaṇāt param
tad patrāṇi pavitrāṇi patitāni bhuvaḥ sthale
dṛṣṭvā samādāya etāni nipuṇaḥ sarva karmasu

original: tāni svakarataḥ śīghraṃ kṛtvā patrapuṭaṃ tvaran /
analyzed: tāni sva karataḥ śīghram kṛtvā patra puṭam tvaran
kasmaicid vipra putrāya pātrāya jala kāṃkṣiṇe

original: samudyuktāya pātuṃ taj jalaṃ bhūmigataṃ katham /
analyzed: samudyuktāya pātum tat jalam bhūmi gatam katham
pāsyāmi salilam vā iti samālokayatetarām
pibati aneka tarasā pitṛ prītyai mahān

original: smṛtvā dadau tadā te 'pi samāgatyātisatvaram // Ang_1.563 // [068]
analyzed: smṛtvā dadau tadā te samāgatya ati sa tvaram
tāvat mātreṇa saṃtuṣṭāḥ gayā śrāddha śata adhikāt

original: atiharṣaṃ gatāḥ sadyas tamenaṃ bhūritejasam // Ang_1.564 //
analyzed: ati harṣam gatāḥ sadyas tam enam bhūri tejasam
āśīrbhiḥ ca praśastābhiḥ pratyakṣeṇa enam īkṣya te

original: paraṃ tṛptāḥ smeti coktvā tvaṃ kṛtārtho mahānasi // Ang_1.565 //
analyzed: param tṛptāḥ sma iti ca uktvā tvam kṛtārthaḥ mahān asi
śāstra artha dharma tattva jñaḥ tvam asmad paritṛpti kṛt

original: ityuktvā '; 'bhāṣya te tena tatpadaṃ cakrapāṇinaḥ // Ang_1.566 //
analyzed: iti uktvā bhāṣya te tena tat padam cakrapāṇinaḥ
paśyataḥ tasya puratas jagmuḥ kila sura uttamaiḥ
prārthanīyam viśeṣeṇa saḥ yam etādṛśaḥ mahān

original: pitḥṇāṃ panasaḥ śrīmān vallabhaḥ paramo mahān /
analyzed: pitḥṇām panasaḥ śrīmān vallabhaḥ paramaḥ mahān

original: kāraśca kāravallīkaḥ kārukaḥ kāliko karut // Ang_1.568 //
analyzed: kāraḥ ca kāravallīkaḥ kārukaḥ kālikā karut
pañca ete brahma puratas devānām śṛṇvatām tadā

original: idamūcurvaco duḥkhād asmākamapi santi hi // Ang_1.569 //
analyzed: idam ūcuḥ vacaḥ duḥkhāt asmākam api santi hi
kaṇṭakāni tatas bhūyas kharāṇi su mahānti api

original: tvamasmākaṃ tu tatsāmyaṃ kimarthaṃ nākarorvibho // Ang_1.570 //
analyzed: tvam asmākam tu tad sāmyam kimartham na akaroḥ vibho
iti evam ati dainyena paunaḥpunyena kevalam
ruruduḥ kila duḥkha ārtāḥ tān etān tādṛśān vibhuḥ
nākinām puratas bhūyas prahasan vākyam abravīt
rodanam
yad māhātmya su mahataḥ janma siddha ati su śriyaḥ
dṛṣṭvā vibhūtim paramām a sahan eva kevalam
tad sāmyam icchuḥ ārāt me rodanam kṛtavān asi
tasmāt etad prabhṛti te bhuvane ye daridrataḥ
śrāddha eka karaṇa aśaktāḥ aṣṭottaraśateṣu api
śrāddheṣu keṣucid kāla viśeṣeṣu kathaṃcana
rodanāt śrāddha karaṇa phalam te prāpnuyuḥ param
kārasya ślādhya tvam
yasmāt atyamla vacanam mad puras proktavān asi

original: devānāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ cāpi tasmāttvaṃ śrāddhakarmasu // Ang_1.576 //
analyzed: devānām śṛṇvatām ca api tasmāt tvam śrāddha karmasu

original: nityāmlayukto vartasva kāra re re kṛtī bhava /
analyzed: nitya amla yuktaḥ vartasva kāra re re kṛtī bhava
kāravallī ādayaḥ yūyam sveṣām kaṇṭaka sāmyataḥ
tad sāmya cetasaḥ yasmāt aṅgīkurmaḥ ca sāṃpratam

original: yuṣmān śrāddheṣu sarveṣu tadyogyā bhavataiva vai // Ang_1.578 //
analyzed: yuṣmān śrāddheṣu sarveṣu tad yogyāḥ bhavata eva vai

original: tatsāmyaṃ tattrayasyaiva militvaiva pṛthaṅ na tu /
analyzed: tad sāmyam tad trayasya eva militvā eva pṛthak na tu

original: nityaṃ śākasahasrasya bṛhatyādestu vo na tu // Ang_1.579 //
analyzed: nityam śāka sahasrasya bṛhatī ādeḥ tu vaḥ na tu
yuṣmākam śrāddha yogya tva mātram mad vacasā matam
sa kaṇḍaka bṛhatyaḥ tāḥ manasā pūrvam eva vai
sāmyam kaṇṭakataḥ tasya panasasya tu akāmayan

original: yuṣmadīyamimaṃ vṛttaṃ jñātvā tūṣṇīṃ vyavasthitāḥ // Ang_1.581 // [070]
analyzed: yuṣmadīyam imam vṛttam jñātvā tūṣṇīm vyavasthitāḥ
tīva nipuṇāḥ ca vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: jñātvā taddhṛdayaṃ sarvam avalepaṃ tathāvidham // Ang_1.582 //
analyzed: jñātvā tad hṛdayam sarvam avalepam tathāvidham

original: sarvaṃ jñātvā vidhāsyāmi lokeṣvadya ca śrūyatām /
analyzed: sarvam jñātvā vidhāsyāmi lokeṣu adya ca śrūyatām
manu ādiṣu madīyeṣu yuga ādiṣu caturṣu api

original: aṣṭakāsu ca puṇyāsu saṃkrāntiṣu ca vṛddhike /
analyzed: aṣṭakāsu ca puṇyāsu saṃkrāntiṣu ca vṛddhike

original: naimittike ca tāsāṃ syād ayogyatvaṃ tathāvidham // Ang_1.584 //
analyzed: naimittike ca tāsām syāt ayogya tvam tathāvidham

original: tatra caitāsu yāḥ krūrāḥ pretakarmaṇi tāḥ parāḥ /
analyzed: tatra ca etāsu yāḥ krūrāḥ preta karmaṇi tāḥ parāḥ

original: saṃbhavantu na cānyeṣu maryādaiva mayā kṛtā // Ang_1.585 //
analyzed: saṃbhavantu na ca anyeṣu maryādā eva mayā kṛtā
etasmin antare tatra deva sṛṣṭaḥ ti sundaraḥ
patra puṣpa mahā vallī śalāṭu phala saṃvṛtaḥ
samāgatya ati capalāt kailāsāt dharaṇīdharāt

original: natvā baddhāñjalipuṭaś corvārurmama kā gatiḥ // Ang_1.587 //
analyzed: natvā baddhāñjali puṭaḥ ca urvāruḥ mama kā gatiḥ
iti ca uvāca loka īśam bhagavantam pitāmaham

original: tādṛśaṃ taṃ samudvīkṣya gaurīvākyena kevalam // Ang_1.588 //
analyzed: tādṛśam tam samudvīkṣya gaurī vākyena kevalam
śambhunā lokanāthena sṛṣṭam śuddha eka vigraham
samāgatam mahā prahvam mahā guruṣu vatsalam
śuddha satvam dūra garvam jñātvā tam sarva sundaram

original: atipraśasyaṃ covāca devānāṃ purato vibhuḥ // Ang_1.590 //
analyzed: ati praśasyam ca uvāca devānām puratas vibhuḥ
tvam urvāro sthāṇu sṛṣṭaḥ bhavānī vacasā yatas

original: svayaṃ prakṛtyā ca mahān śānto dānto mahāmanāḥ // Ang_1.591 //
analyzed: svayam prakṛtyā ca mahān śāntaḥ dāntaḥ mahā manāḥ
guru priyaḥ vinītaḥ ca satatam guru vatsalaḥ
avalepa eka rahitaḥ ca adya prabhṛti bhū tale

original: daivikeṣu ca pitryeṣu kalyāṇeṣu naveṣu ca /
analyzed: daivikeṣu ca pitryeṣu kalyāṇeṣu naveṣu ca
naimittikeṣu nityeṣu kāmyeṣu sakaleṣu api
kṛtsna kriyā viśeṣeṣu bāla vṛddha ātura ādiṣu

original: nityayuktaḥ sadā yogyaḥ śalāṭūnāṃ daśāsu ca // Ang_1.594 //
analyzed: nitya yuktaḥ sadā yogyaḥ śalāṭūnām daśāsu ca

original: daśāsveva phalānāṃ ca śāśvato bhava śāśvataḥ /
analyzed: daśāsu eva phalānām ca śāśvataḥ bhava śāśvataḥ

original: pitḥṇāṃ sarvadātyantaṃ vallabhaḥ paramo bhava // Ang_1.595 //
analyzed: pitḥṇām sarvadā atyantam vallabhaḥ paramaḥ bhava
vasanta mādhavasya tvam grīṣma mṛtyuṃjayasya ca
mahāvarṣā saptatantuḥ śarad kālyaḥ tathā punar
prathitaḥ bhava sarveṣām pānasaiḥ āmrakaiḥ śivaiḥ
rambhābhiḥ tulitaḥ bhūyas kadācid adhikaḥ tathā
vidvat stutyaḥ rājamānyo tvad jātīyaka ṣoḍaśaiḥ
saṃgrāhyaḥ bhava sarvatra sarva netra priyaḥ niśam
sarvadā sarva saṃvṛddhaḥ tivardhitaḥ
marut kṛtau tu tvad bīja vikṣepaṇa mukhāt itas
phala bīja samutpatti paryantam kila sarvadā
tad iṣṭi trayataḥ śuddhaḥ mahān mantra pariṣkṛtaḥ
trayastriṃśat koṭi saṃkhya devānām vallabhaḥ bhava

original: iti stutaḥ pūjitaśca śāsito vihito 'naghaḥ // Ang_1.602 // [072]
analyzed: iti stutaḥ pūjitaḥ ca śāsitaḥ vihitaḥ naghaḥ
atyanta pitṛ tṛptyā eka kārakaḥ kila kāritaḥ
urvāruḥ tādṛśaḥ proktaḥ saṃgrāhyaḥ śrāddha karmasu
urvāru tyāge doṣaḥ

original: tādṛśaṃ tamimaṃ yo vai mauḍhyācchrāddheṣu saṃtyajet /
analyzed: tādṛśam tam imam yaḥ vai mauḍhyāt śrāddheṣu saṃtyajet

original: sadya eva piturdrohī bhavedeva na saṃśayaḥ // Ang_1.604 //
analyzed: sadyas eva pituḥ drohī bhavet eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: devadrohī śrutidrohī sarvadrohī sa eva hi /
analyzed: deva drohī śruti drohī sarva drohī saḥ eva hi

original: vidhighnaḥ śrāddhahantā syāt tānīmāni pravacmyataḥ // Ang_1.605 //
analyzed: vidhi ghnaḥ śrāddha hantā syāt tāni imāni pravacmi atas
ṣaṇṇavati śrāddhāni
tisraḥ ṣṭakāḥ gajacchāyā ṣaṇṇavatyaḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: māsiśrāddhāni tānyevaṃ māsi māsi kṛtāni vai /
analyzed: māsiśrāddhāni tāni evam māsi māsi kṛtāni vai

original: aṣṭottaraśatāni syus tānīmāni tataḥ punaḥ // Ang_1.607 //
analyzed: aṣṭottaraśatāni syuḥ tāni imāni tatas punar
pitroḥ mṛtāhaḥ kathitaḥ laṅghanīyaḥ kathaṃcana

original: raviṃ ca prathame pāde kaviṃ caiva dvitīyake // Ang_1.608 //
analyzed: ravim ca prathame pāde kavim ca eva dvitīyake
trayodaśa tṛtīye syāt amā vyākhyānam ucyate
punar nirūpyate spaṣṭam amāvākyasya sāṃpratam
amāvāsyāḥ dvādaśa syuḥ manavaḥ tu caturdaśa

original: yugādayaśca catvāraḥ krāntayo dvādaśa smṛtāḥ // Ang_1.610 //
analyzed: yuga ādayaḥ ca catvāraḥ krāntayaḥ dvādaśa smṛtāḥ
dhṛtayaḥ ca api pātāḥ ca trayodaśa trayodaśa

original: mahālayāḥ pañcadaśa aṣṭakā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ // Ang_1.611 //
analyzed: mahālayāḥ pañcadaśa aṣṭakāḥ dvādaśa smṛtāḥ
gajacchāyā tathā ca ekā ṣaṇṇavatyaḥ iti īritāḥ

original: pratimāsaṃ prakartavyatvena tāni ca sāṃpratam // Ang_1.612 // [073]
analyzed: pratimāsam prakartavya tvena tāni ca sāṃpratam
kīrtitāni dvādaśa hi militvā ete khilāni api

original: aṣṭottaraśatāni syuḥ śrāddhāni vihitāni vai // Ang_1.613 //
analyzed: aṣṭottaraśatāni syuḥ śrāddhāni vihitāni vai
prativarṣam prayatnena brāhmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ

original: amāvāsyāstatra kḷptā māsāntā nityameva vai // Ang_1.614 //
analyzed: amāvāsyāḥ tatra kṛptāḥ māsa antāḥ nityam eva vai
atra eva pitṛ yajñaḥ ca kartavya tvena coditaḥ
śruti uktaḥ yam pitḥṇām syāt atitṛptyā eka kārakaḥ
śrāddhānām prakṛti tvena coditaḥ smṛti kartṛbhiḥ

original: naitasmāttu paraṃ śrāddhaṃ vidyate yatra kutracit // Ang_1.616 //
analyzed: na etasmāt tu param śrāddham vidyate yatra kutracid

original: śrutyuktametadeva syād etanmātre kṛte tu cet /
analyzed: śruti uktam etat eva syāt etad mātre kṛte tu ced

original: sarvāṇyapi kṛtāni syur athavaitaddine tu yaiḥ // Ang_1.617 //
analyzed: sarvāṇi api kṛtāni syuḥ athavā etat dine tu yaiḥ

original: śrāddhaṃ vai kriyate tadvā prakṛtiśceti vai jaguḥ /
analyzed: śrāddham vai kriyate tat vā prakṛtiḥ ca iti vai jaguḥ
itaraiḥ sarva pitryāṇām śrutitaḥ brahma vādinaḥ
yad anuṣṭhānataḥ sarva anuṣṭhānam jāyatetarām

original: tadeva prakṛtiḥ proktā hi kaiścidbrahmavādibhiḥ // Ang_1.619 //
analyzed: tat eva prakṛtiḥ proktā hi kaiścid brahma vādibhiḥ
darśa śrāddham
darśa anuṣṭhānataḥ sarva śrāddhāni syuḥ kṛtāni vai

original: iti sarve trayo lokās tūṣṇīṃ tiṣṭhanti kevalam // Ang_1.620 //
analyzed: iti sarve trayaḥ lokāḥ tūṣṇīm tiṣṭhanti kevalam

original: na kenāpi ca tasmāttu darśaḥ saṃtyajyate paraḥ /
