analyzed: na kena api ca tasmāt tu darśaḥ saṃtyajyate paraḥ
darśa mātre nuṣṭhite smin yena kena prakārataḥ
sarvāṇi anuṣṭhitāni syuḥ iti vai loka saṃsthitiḥ

original: na tatra sākṣācchrāddhaṃ ca kriyate yena kena vā // Ang_1.622 // [074]
analyzed: na tatra sākṣāt śrāddham ca kriyate yena kena vā

original: kriyate kṛtinā tattu bhūtale yena kenacit /
analyzed: kriyate kṛtinā tat tu bhū tale yena kenacid
tena api udaka mātreṇa śrāddhena api kṛtena vai
sarvāṇi api kṛtāni eva iti evam sarva eka niścayaḥ
sa darśaḥ tādṛśasya anuṣṭhātā yaḥ brāhmaṇa uttamaḥ
agnihotrī saḥ eva syāt darśa yājya kṣayāni api
saḥ eva karma caṇḍālaḥ tam enam brahma ghātakam

original: dṛṣṭvā samāgataṃ pāpaṃ vāṅmātreṇāpi nārcayet // Ang_1.626 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā samāgatam pāpam vāc mātreṇa api na arcayet
prakṛti śrāddha mātraḥ ca darśaḥ eva na ca aparaḥ
pitṛ yajña mukhāt eva prakṛti tvam tat īritam
tattā eva vihitaḥ yam hi pitṛ yajñaḥ śruti īritaḥ
darśa ābdikau tulyau

original: darśo mṛtāhaśca samau na kadācittu śakyate // Ang_1.628 //
analyzed: darśaḥ mṛtāhaḥ ca samau na kadācid tu śakyate

original: yena kenāpi vā tyaktuṃ tattyāgī cetpatatyadhaḥ /
analyzed: yena kena api vā tyaktum tad tyāgī ced patati adhas

original: pitrormṛtāhastvannena kāryaḥ syāttu na cānyataḥ // Ang_1.629 //
analyzed: pitroḥ mṛtāhaḥ tu annena kāryaḥ syāt tu na ca anyatas
na hemnā annena homena piṇḍa dānena mantrataḥ

original: akṣeṇa śaṣpairmantrairvā na duḥkhena tadācaret // Ang_1.630 //
analyzed: akṣeṇa śaṣpaiḥ mantraiḥ vā na duḥkhena tat ācaret
kim tu agnaukaraṇāt brahmabhojanāt piṇḍa dānataḥ

original: kṛtaṃ bhavati tatkarma na ceccaṇḍālatāṃ vrajet // Ang_1.631 //
analyzed: kṛtam bhavati tat karma na ced caṇḍāla tām vrajet
darśa ābdikau na tyājyau
mṛtāhaḥ laṅghanīyaḥ syāt darśaḥ ca api tathāvidhaḥ

original: yena kena prakāreṇa śakyate kila durbalaiḥ // Ang_1.632 //
analyzed: yena kena prakāreṇa śakyate kila durbalaiḥ
akiṃcanaiḥ durbalaiḥ vā vyādhitaiḥ vā viśeṣataḥ
bādhitaiḥ dhāvamānaiḥ vā jñāta vāsibhiḥ eva vai
naṣṭa kriyaiḥ naṣṭa dhanaiḥ mṛta prāyaiḥ atha api vā

original: tyuktuṃ na śakyate śrāddhaṃ mṛtāhākhyaṃ kathaṃcana // Ang_1.634 //
analyzed: tyuktum na śakyate śrāddham mṛtāha ākhyam kathaṃcana
mṛtāhaḥ tādṛśaḥ kḷptaḥ prativarṣam ca cāndrataḥ
mānena eva bhavet nūnam akṷptaḥ nyena ced bhavet

original: atyantāvaśyako na syād akḷptaścettu yo bhavet /
analyzed: atyanta āvaśyakaḥ na syāt akḷptaḥ ced tu yaḥ bhavet
kḷptasya avṛttiḥ iti eva maryādā śāstra saṃmatā
tithi agnī na tithiḥ tithi āśe kṛṣṇa ibhaḥ nalaḥ grahāḥ

original: tithyarkau na śivo 'śvo 'mātithī manvādayaḥ smṛtāḥ // Ang_1.637 //
analyzed: tithi arkau na śivo śvas mā atithī manu ādayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: tasmāttu kḷptā ityuktās tataśca krāntayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt tu kḷptāḥ iti uktāḥ tatas ca krāntayaḥ smṛtāḥ
sūrya rāśi kramaṇataḥ kḷptāḥ iti udīritāḥ
saṃkrānti svarūpam

original: ayane dve ca viṣuvau catasraḥ ṣaḍaśītayaḥ /
analyzed: ayane dve ca viṣuvau catasraḥ ṣaḍaśītayaḥ

original: catasro viṣṇupadyaśca saṃkramā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ // Ang_1.639 //
analyzed: catasraḥ viṣṇupadyaḥ ca saṃkramāḥ dvādaśa smṛtāḥ
sthira bheṣu arka saṃkrāntiḥ jñeyā viṣṇu pada āhvayā
ṣaḍaśīti mukham jñeyam dvi svabhāveṣu rāśiṣu
saumya yāmya ayane nūnam bhavataḥ mṛga karkaṭau
tulā meṣa ubhayam jñeyam viṣuvam sūrya saṃkrame
saṃkrānti puṇya kālaḥ
ahar saṃkramaṇe puṇyam ahar kṛtsnam prakīrtitam

original: rātrau saṃkramaṇe bhānor vyavasthā sarvakarmasu // Ang_1.642 //
analyzed: rātrau saṃkramaṇe bhānoḥ vyavasthā sarva karmasu
saumya yāmya ayana dvandve viśeṣaḥ iti vai jaguḥ
atītya a prāpya tad kālam puṇya kālaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
saṃkrāntiṣu akhilāsu evam tad kālaḥ puṇya daḥ smṛtaḥ

original: yā yāḥ sannihitāḥ nāḍyas tāstāḥ puṇyatamāḥ smṛtāḥ // Ang_1.644 //
analyzed: yāḥ yāḥ sannihitāḥ nāḍyaḥ tāḥ tāḥ puṇyatamāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: ayane dve ca viṣuve catasraḥ ṣaḍaśītayaḥ /
analyzed: ayane dve ca viṣuve catasraḥ ṣaḍaśītayaḥ

original: catasro viṣṇupadyaśca saṃkramā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ // Ang_1.645 //
analyzed: catasraḥ viṣṇupadyaḥ ca saṃkramāḥ dvādaśa smṛtāḥ
triṃśat karkaṭake nāḍyaḥ makare viṃśatiḥ smṛtāḥ
vartamāne tulā meṣe nāḍyaḥ tu ubhayatas daśa
ṣaḍaśītyām vyatītāyām ṣaṣṭiḥ uktāḥ praṇāḍikāḥ

original: puṇyāyāṃ viṣṇupadyāṃ ca prāk paścādapi ṣoḍaśa // Ang_1.647 //
analyzed: puṇyāyām viṣṇupadyām ca prāk paścāt api ṣoḍaśa
ardharātrāt tad ūrdhvam vā saṃkrāntau dakṣiṇāyane

original: pūrvameva dine kuryād uttarāyaṇa eva vai // Ang_1.648 //
analyzed: pūrvam eva dine kuryāt uttarāyaṇe eva vai
annaśrāddhe kutapaḥ
yat yat tu paitṛkam karma śrāddham annena ced punar

original: kutape taddhi kurvīta tadbhinnasya tu cedayam // Ang_1.649 //
analyzed: kutape tat hi kurvīta tad bhinnasya tu ced ayam

original: vidhiḥ khyāto na sandeho dharmavidbhiḥ sanātanaiḥ /
analyzed: vidhiḥ khyātaḥ na sandehaḥ dharma vidbhiḥ sanātanaiḥ
odanaśrāddha mātrasya saṃkrāntīnām ca kṛtsnaśas
dvādaśānām tathā anyeṣām kutapaḥ mukhyaḥ ucyate
tad bhinna snāna dāna ādi tarpaṇa ādiṣu te smṛtāḥ

original: tadā tadā tu vihitā ete kālaviśeṣakāḥ / [077]
analyzed: tadā tadā tu vihitāḥ ete kāla viśeṣakāḥ

original: śrāddhakartustu sarvatra kṛtinaḥ kāla ekakaḥ // Ang_1.652 //
analyzed: śrāddha kartuḥ tu sarvatra kṛtinaḥ kālaḥ ekakaḥ

original: kutapo vedavacasā mukhyaḥ prokto na cetaraḥ /
analyzed: kutapaḥ veda vacasā mukhyaḥ proktaḥ na ca itaraḥ

original: so 'pi yasmin dine samyag dakṣiṇāyanakālakaḥ // Ang_1.653 //
analyzed: saḥ pi yasmin dine samyak dakṣiṇāyana kālakaḥ
tam uttarāyaṇe kuryāt uttarāyaṇam eva hi

original: kutapasya tu yatra syāl lobhapūrvaṃ tathācaret // Ang_1.654 //
analyzed: kutapasya tu yatra syāt lobha pūrvam tathā ācaret
darśa saṃkrānti ādi śrāddhāni
tad krānti yugma śrāddha ādi kṛtyam sarvam yathā labhet

original: auttare hyayane samyak kutape 'smin tathā '; 'caret // Ang_1.655 //
analyzed: auttare hi ayane samyak kutape smin tathā caret
saṃkratti mātrāḥ kathitāḥ akḷptāḥ iti sūribhiḥ
evam dhṛtiḥ ca pātaḥ ca ṣaḍviṃśatika saṃkhyayā
kathitāḥ kila sarvāṇi api akḷptāni eva kevalam
mahālayaḥ

original: mahālayā bahuvidhāḥ pūrvaṃ pañcadaśeti vai // Ang_1.657 //
analyzed: mahālayāḥ bahuvidhāḥ pūrvam pañcadaśa iti vai
ṣoḍaśa evā iti kecid tu daśa iti ca tathā apare

original: pañcaiveti trayaṃ ceti ekameveti kecana // Ang_1.658 //
analyzed: pañca eva iti trayam ca iti ekam eva iti kecana

original: ṣoḍhā tāḥ kathitāḥ sadbhir aṣṭakā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: ṣoḍhā tāḥ kathitāḥ sadbhiḥ aṣṭakāḥ dvādaśa smṛtāḥ

original: yadenduḥ pitṛdaivatye haṃsaścaiva kare sthitaḥ // Ang_1.659 //
analyzed: yadā induḥ pitṛ daivatye haṃsaḥ ca eva kare sthitaḥ
yāmyā tithiḥ bhavet sā tu gajacchāyā prakīrtitā
śrāddha devatāḥ

original: karmāṇi kāni khyātāni tridaivatyāni kevalam // Ang_1.660 //
analyzed: karmāṇi kāni khyātāni tri daivatyāni kevalam
ṣaṣ daivatyāni kāni syuḥ nava daivatyakāni ca

original: tatrādau tu tridaivatyaṃ mṛtāhastveka ucyate // Ang_1.661 //
analyzed: tatra ādau tu tri daivatyam mṛtāhaḥ tu ekaḥ ucyate
ṣaṣ daivatyaḥ tu darśaḥ syāt aṣṭakāḥ nava devatāḥ

original: aṣṭakāsu ca vṛddhau ca gayāyāṃ ca mṛte 'hani // Ang_1.662 //
analyzed: aṣṭakāsu ca vṛddhau ca gayāyām ca mṛte hani

original: mātuḥ śrāddhaṃ pṛthak kuryād anyatra patinā saha /
analyzed: mātuḥ śrāddham pṛthak kuryāt anyatra patinā saha

original: patinā saha kartavyaṃ pṛthaktvena kṛte yadi // Ang_1.663 //
analyzed: patinā saha kartavyam pṛthaktvena kṛte yadi
tat paitṛka mahā saṅga saukhya vighna karam bhavet

original: pitṛvargastu pūrvaṃ syān mātṛvargastataḥ param // Ang_1.664 //
analyzed: pitṛ vargaḥ tu pūrvam syāt mātṛ vargaḥ tatas param
tatas mātāmahānām ca vargaḥ yam tad kalatrataḥ
pitrye pradakṣiṇam
śūnya lalāṭa tā ca

original: pitṛvargo yatra pūrvaṃ tatra syādapradakṣiṇam // Ang_1.665 //
analyzed: pitṛ vargaḥ yatra pūrvam tatra syāt apradakṣiṇam
apasavyam tathā śūnya lalāṭam prabhavet api

original: yatra yatrā 'pasavyaṃ syāt tatra tatrā 'pradakṣiṇam // Ang_1.666 //
analyzed: yatra yatrā pasavyam syāt tatra tatra pradakṣiṇam

original: tathā śūnyalalāṭaṃ ca pradhānāṅge ca tatsmṛtam /
analyzed: tathā śūnya lalāṭam ca pradhāna aṅge ca tat smṛtam
tatra gṛha alaṃkāraḥ na kartavyaḥ

original: yatraitattritayaṃ tatra gṛhālaṃkaraṇa na tu // Ang_1.667 //
analyzed: yatra etat tritayam tatra gṛha alaṃkaraṇa na tu
mātṛ varge pradakṣiṇa ādi

original: mātṛvargo yatra pūrvaṃ tatra syāttu pradakṣiṇam /
analyzed: mātṛ vargaḥ yatra pūrvam tatra syāt tu pradakṣiṇam

original: savyaṃ puṇḍralalāṭaṃ ca maṅgalasnānameva ca // Ang_1.668 //
analyzed: savyam puṇḍra lalāṭam ca maṅgala snānam eva ca
gṛha alaṃkaraṇam ca api maṅgalāni tathā punar

original: pitḥṇāṃ ca kramo mukhyo bhavatyapi ca santatam // Ang_1.669 //
analyzed: pitḥṇām ca kramaḥ mukhyaḥ bhavati api ca santatam
prapitāmaha pūrvam syāt tat pitāmaha madhyakam
śrāddha bhedena viśvedevāḥ
teṣām ca viśvedevāḥ te satya saṃjñika nāmakāḥ
sarvatra vṛddha śabdaḥ ca prayoktavyaḥ caturṣu api
tathā eva mātṛ varge tārtīyīke ca vargake
janana kramataḥ ca idam teṣām uccāraṇam bhavet
etad viruddham tat sarvam tad viruddham idam param

original: niḥśeṣamiti boddhavyaṃ te sarve devatāḥ kila // Ang_1.673 //
analyzed: niḥśeṣam iti boddhavyam te sarve devatāḥ kila
vasavaḥ pitaraḥ syuḥ rudrāḥ ca api pitāmahāḥ

original: prapitāmahāśca kathitā ādityā iti tadgaṇāḥ // Ang_1.674 //
analyzed: prapitāmahāḥ ca kathitāḥ ādityāḥ iti tad gaṇāḥ
sāpiṇḍya nirūpaṇam
etat trayāt pūrvakasya caturthasya sakṛt kila

original: śrāddhasya karaṇaṃ proktaṃ pātheyākhyasya sūribhiḥ // Ang_1.675 //
analyzed: śrāddhasya karaṇam proktam pātheya ākhyasya sūribhiḥ
tat evam sapta pūrṣa ākhyam sāpiṇḍyasya nirūpaṇam
āśaucam ca daśa tri dinam eka dinam

original: tāvattu sūtakaṃ sarvaṃ tajjānāṃ saṃprakīrtitam // Ang_1.676 //
analyzed: tāvat tu sūtakam sarvam tad jānām saṃprakīrtitam
samānodaka saṃjñāḥ ca tatas bhūyas sagotriṇaḥ

original: tadūrdhvamiti vijñeyaṃ teṣāṃ tatsūtakaṃ tataḥ // Ang_1.677 //
analyzed: tad ūrdhvam iti vijñeyam teṣām tat sūtakam tatas
tri dinam ca eka divasam paścāt snānam ca bodhitam

original: krameṇaiva paraṃ yāvat tāvatparyantameva vai // Ang_1.678 //
analyzed: krameṇa eva param yāvat tāvat paryantam eva vai
snāna mātram ca kathitam prasaṃgāt idam īritam
jīvacchrāddham tu tat proktam sarva śrāddha vilakṣaṇam
catvāriṃśat devatākam athavā pañca saṃkhyayā

original: punaḥ sametaṃ tatprocur atastaddvividhaṃ smṛtam // Ang_1.680 //
analyzed: punar sametam tat procuḥ atas tat dvividham smṛtam
śrāddhāni kānicid bhūyas devatā sahitāni api

original: adaivikāni ca punas tānīmāni ca bhaṇyate // Ang_1.681 //
analyzed: adaivikāni ca punar tāni imāni ca bhaṇyate
vṛddhiśrāddham gayāśrāddham hataśrāddham tathā eva ca
dadhiśrāddham tṛṇaśrāddham ama ādīni akhilāni api
sa daivikāni khyātāni preta śrāddhāni kṛtsnaśas
adaivikāni proktāni sa udakumbhāni kṛtsnaśas
ama ādi śrāddhe kartavyāni
preta śrāddheṣu sarvatra saṃkalpaḥ mukhyatas smṛtaḥ
abhyanujñā api paramā sā ca atrā
vāhanam matam
sa pādya arghya gandha dhūpa dīpa puṣpāṇi kevalāḥ

original: tilāḥ sarvatra tūṣṇīkā kṛtsnaṃ vedamanu vinā // Ang_1.685 //
analyzed: tilāḥ sarvatra tūṣṇīkā kṛtsnam vedam anu vinā

original: tatra pūjā prakartavyā piṇḍadānaṃ ca dakṣiṇā /
analyzed: tatra pūjā prakartavyā piṇḍa dānam ca dakṣiṇā

original: āvaśyakyatra paramā dadhyājye vastrameva ca // Ang_1.686 //
analyzed: āvaśyakī atra paramā dadhi ājye vastram eva ca
pūrvāhṇe eva kurvīta kutapam na avalokayet

original: piṇḍāni vāyasebhyo vā gṛdhrebhyo vā nivedayet // Ang_1.687 // [081]
analyzed: piṇḍāni vāyasebhyaḥ vā gṛdhrebhyaḥ vā nivedayet

original: na cejjalacarebhyo vā nānyatra tu vinikṣipet /
analyzed: na ced jalacarebhyaḥ vā na anyatra tu vinikṣipet
ekoddiṣṭa adhikāriṇaḥ

original: bhrātre bhaginyai putrāya svāmine mātulāya ca // Ang_1.688 //
analyzed: bhrātre bhaginyai putrāya svāmine mātulāya ca
mitrāya gurave śrāddham pituḥ mātuḥ svasuḥ tathā

original: śvaśurāya śyālakāya caikoddiṣṭaṃ na pārvaṇam // Ang_1.689 //
analyzed: śvaśurāya śyālakāya ca ekoddiṣṭam na pārvaṇam
apiṇḍakāni sapiṇḍakāni ca śrāddhāni
yuga krāntim anuśrāddham preta śrāddha ādikam tathā
apiṇḍakāni khyātāni sapiṇḍāni itarāṇi ca
mahālaya ṣoḍaśa tve gajacchāyā no bhavet
ṣaṇṇavati atva saṃkhyāyai sā hi pañcadaśa tvataḥ

original: yayā kayā saṃkhyayā vā tayā ṣaḍvidhayā bhavet /
analyzed: yayā kayā saṃkhyayā vā tayā ṣaḍvidhayā bhavet

original: mahālayatvasya siddhir viśeṣe tu phalaṃ tathā // Ang_1.692 //
analyzed: mahālaya tvasya siddhiḥ viśeṣe tu phalam tathā
sarvatra evam samākhyātā prayāsa ādhikyataḥ phalam

original: prabhavatyeva sumahan nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // Ang_1.693 //
analyzed: prabhavati eva su mahat na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
mahālayaḥ
mahālayaḥ pākṣikaḥ yam dvividhaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
eka vipra aneka vipra bhedena kila tatra vai
eka vipra ākhya pakṣasya svarūpam vacmi pūrvatas
mahā ālayānām sarveṣām āpakṣa antasya kevalam

original: ye vṛtāḥ prathamadivase vānyeṣāṃ ca kevalam / [082]
analyzed: ye vṛtāḥ prathama divase vā anyeṣām ca kevalam

original: ta eva nānye kartavyāḥ pakṣānte śrāddhadakṣiṇā // Ang_1.696 //
analyzed: te eva na anye kartavyāḥ pakṣa ante śrāddha dakṣiṇā

original: ekadaiva hi deyā syān na deyā syāttadā tadā /
analyzed: ekadā eva hi deyā syāt na deyā syāt tadā tadā

original: anekaviprapakṣe tu pratinityaṃ ca bāḍavāḥ // Ang_1.697 //
analyzed: aneka vipra pakṣe tu pratinityam ca bāḍavāḥ
bhinna bhinnāḥ prakartavyāḥ pratinityam pṛthak pṛthak

original: dakṣiṇā ca pradātavyā pratipūrṣaṃ pṛthak pṛthak // Ang_1.698 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇā ca pradātavyā pratipūrṣam pṛthak pṛthak
prativargam na ced viprāḥ varaṇīyāḥ vidhānataḥ

original: ṣaḍdaivatyaṃ tu sarvatra navadaivatyameva vā // Ang_1.699 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ daivatyam tu sarvatra nava daivatyam eva vā
khyātaḥ mahā ālayaḥ sadbhiḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ pi mahā ālayaḥ

original: evameva prakartavyo nānyathā taṃ samācaret // Ang_1.700 //
analyzed: evam eva prakartavyaḥ na anyathā tam samācaret
sakṛt mahālayaḥ
caret yadi viśeṣeṇa nānā daivatakena vai

original: sakṛnmahālayaḥ so 'yaṃ sa bhavetkiṃ tu sa smṛtaḥ // Ang_1.701 //
analyzed: sakṛt mahālayaḥ saḥ yam sa bhavet kim tu sa smṛtaḥ
gayā śrāddha samaḥ kaḥ pi kathitaḥ paramaḥ mahān
anirvācyaḥ khilaiḥ śāstraiḥ mahāśrāddha viśeṣakaḥ
tādṛśa śrāddha kartā ṣaḍdaivatyena saṃyutam
nava daivatakena api viṣṇunā vā samanvitam
dhuri locana saṃyuktam kuryāt śrāddham mahālayam

original: sakṛtpakṣeṇa vā pūrvaproktapakṣeṣu yena vā // Ang_1.704 //
analyzed: sakṛt pakṣeṇa vā pūrva prokta pakṣeṣu yena vā
pakṣeṇa kenacid kuryāt sa mahā laya kṛt bhavet

original: na cedayaṃ gayāśrāddhatulitaṃ yaṃ ca kaṃcana // Ang_1.705 //
analyzed: na ced ayam gayā śrāddha tulitam yam ca kaṃcana

original: puṇyaṃ śrāddhaviśeṣaṃ vai kuryādeveti sā śrutiḥ / [083]
analyzed: puṇyam śrāddha viśeṣam vai kuryāt eva iti sā śrutiḥ
mahālayasya bharaṇī ādīnām ślāghya tvam

original: dine dine gayātulya bharaṇyāṃ gayapañcakam // Ang_1.706 //
analyzed: dine dine bharaṇyām gayapañcakam
daśa tulyam vyatīpāte pakṣa madhye tu viṃśatiḥ

original: dvādaśyāṃ śatamityāhur amāyāṃ tu sahasrakam // Ang_1.707 //
analyzed: dvādaśyām śatam iti āhuḥ amāyām tu sahasrakam
mahālaya kālaḥ
āṣāḍhīm avadhim kṛtvā yasyāḥ pakṣaḥ tu pañcamaḥ

original: mahālaya iti proktaḥ pitḥṇāṃ śrāddhasaṃpade // Ang_1.708 //
analyzed: mahālayaḥ iti proktaḥ pitḥṇām śrāddha saṃpade
yatinām mahā layaḥ

original: tatra pakṣe yatīnāṃ tu dvādaśyāṃ śrāddhamācaret /
analyzed: tatra pakṣe yatīnām tu dvādaśyām śrāddham ācaret
durmṛtānām
caturdaśyām viśeṣeṇa durmṛtānām caret kriyām
su maṅgalyāḥ
sumaṅgalīnām kathitam navamyām śrāddham ekakam
aśrotriya kalatrāṇām yāvat tad bhartṛ vartanam

original: prāṇiloke tatastattu kuryādvā na tu vā dvayam /
analyzed: prāṇi loke tatas tat tu kuryāt vā na tu vā dvayam

original: etadasti hyanuṣṭhānaṃ sakṛnmahālaye tu cet // Ang_1.711 //
analyzed: etat asti hi anuṣṭhānam sakṛt mahālaye tu ced
yāvat paitṛka dharmāḥ syuḥ tulitaḥ tena sa smṛtaḥ

original: atīto yadi pakṣaḥ sa tadbhinne 'parapakṣake // Ang_1.712 //
analyzed: atītaḥ yadi pakṣaḥ sa tad bhinne para pakṣake
tad anyasmin tādṛśe vai tad anyasmin tathāvidhe
yāvat tu vṛścikaḥ tiṣṭhet tāvat tat tu samācaret
adarśane vṛścikasya jāte tad pitaraḥ param

original: dhanurmāse tu saṃprāpte śrāddhākaraṇamīkṣya vai // Ang_1.714 //
analyzed: dhanuḥ māse tu saṃprāpte śrāddhākaraṇam īkṣya vai
sadyas śāpa pradānāya udyuktāḥ eva bhavanti vai

original: tāvadeva tato bhaktyā śrāddhaṃ mahālayākhyakam // Ang_1.715 //
analyzed: tāvat eva tatas bhaktyā śrāddham mahālaya ākhyakam

original: vidhinaiva prakurvīta na ceddoṣo mahān bhavet /
analyzed: vidhinā eva prakurvīta na ced doṣaḥ mahān bhavet

original: yena kena prakāreṇa tataśca śrāddhamekakam // Ang_1.716 //
analyzed: yena kena prakāreṇa tatas ca śrāddham ekakam
kuryāt eva pituḥ śrāddha tulyam pratyabdam eva vai
mahālaye pare hani tarpaṇam
pratyabda dharmāḥ nikhilāḥ sakṛt mahālayasya te
bhaveyuḥ eva tasmāt tu pare hanyeva tarpaṇam

original: śrāddhe yāvanta uddiṣṭās tatpare 'hani tān yajet // Ang_1.718 //
analyzed: śrāddhe yāvantaḥ uddiṣṭāḥ tad pare hani tān yajet
ravi udayāt pūrvam tarpaṇam
tad śeṣa tila darbhaiḥ tu pūrvam sūrya udayasya vai
pranaṣṭa pitṛkaḥ ced tu tarpaṇasya adhikārī ayam
sa pranaṣṭa prasūḥ nityam tarpaṇe dhi kṛtaḥ bhavet
jīvatpitṛkaśrāddham

original: māsiśrāddhe pitṛyajñe nāndīśrāddhe ca santatam // Ang_1.720 //
analyzed: māsiśrāddhe pitṛyajñe nāndīśrāddhe ca santatam

original: jīvattāto 'pi kartā syād ā homātkaraṇaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: kartā syāt homāt karaṇam smṛtam

original: pūrvadvaye tu satataṃ nāndīśrāddhaṃ tu sarvadā // Ang_1.721 //
analyzed: pūrva dvaye tu satatam nāndīśrāddham tu sarvadā

original: yeṣāmeva pitā dadyāt tebhyo dadyāttu tatsutaḥ / [085]
analyzed: yeṣām eva pitā dadyāt tebhyaḥ dadyāt tu tad sutaḥ

original: tāte bhraṣṭe ca saṃnyaste rugṇe rogaikapīḍite // Ang_1.722 //
analyzed: tāte bhraṣṭe ca saṃnyaste rugṇe roga eka pīḍite
yat kartavyam tena karma paitṛkam tat sutaḥ caret
śrāddhe vaidika agni adhikāriṇaḥ

original: pitroḥ śrāddhaṃ svapatnyāśca sapatnīmātureva ca // Ang_1.723 //
analyzed: pitroḥ śrāddham sva patnyāḥ ca sapatnī mātuḥ eva ca
mātāmahasya tad patnyāḥ śrāddham aupāsane bhavet

original: tadbhinnānāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ śrāddhaṃ syāllaukikānale // Ang_1.724 //
analyzed: tad bhinnānām tu sarveṣām śrāddham syāt laukika anale
aputrāṇām pitṛvyānām bhrātḥṇām agrajanmanām

original: tatpatnīnāṃ ca sarvāsāṃ laukikāgnau yathāvidhi // Ang_1.725 //
analyzed: tad patnīnām ca sarvāsām laukika agnau yathāvidhi
avaśya tvena kartavyam na tyājyam khilaiḥ
pratyabdam śrāddha mātram syāt pitṛ śrāddha samānatas
aṣṭakā māsiśrāddham
māgha kṛṣṇa aṣṭamī yasyām rātrau kuryāt sa mantrakam
homam dadhi añjaliḥ tasya apūpasya sthānake tatas

original: navamyāṃ tu tato bhaktyā śrāddhaṃ kuryādvidhānataḥ /
analyzed: navamyām tu tatas bhaktyā śrāddham kuryāt vidhānataḥ
māsiśrāddha vidhānena tāvat mātreṇa kevalam

original: tāni śiṣṭāni sarvāṇi hy ekādaśa kilā 'ṣṭakāḥ /
analyzed: tāni śiṣṭāni sarvāṇi hi ekādaśa kila ṣṭakāḥ
kṛtā eva bhavet nūnam laghu upāyaḥ yam ucyate
aṣṭakāsu yathā khila paitṛkāḥ

original: kṛtaprāyā iti tathā laghūpāyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // Ang_1.730 //
analyzed: kṛta prāyāḥ iti tathā laghu upāyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: sarvāṇi pṛthageva syuḥ kāryāṇi niyamena vai /
analyzed: sarvāṇi pṛthak eva syuḥ kāryāṇi niyamena vai
aṣṭa uttarāṇi khyātāni kadācid tu viśeṣataḥ
asamarthasya tu proktaḥ laghu upāyaḥ tu kaścana
samarthaḥ tu yathākalpam pratisaṃvatsaram dvijaḥ
sarvāṇi kuryāt śrāddhāni na ced doṣaḥ ca kīrtitaḥ
śrāddha prayogaḥ
śrāddha prayogaḥ ca mayā kṛtsnaḥ evā ucyate dhunā
nimantraṇam
nimantraṇam ca pūrvedyus prakartavyam vidhānataḥ
nimantraṇa arhāḥ

original: viprāṇāṃ vedināṃ nityaṃ kāryaṃ nā 'vedināṃ tarām // Ang_1.734 //
analyzed: viprāṇām vedinām nityam kāryam nā vedinām tarām
kukṣau tiṣṭhati yasya annam veda abhyāsena jīryate

original: kulaṃ tārayate teṣāṃ daśa pūrvān daśā 'parān // Ang_1.735 //
analyzed: kulam tārayate teṣām daśa pūrvān daśa parān

original: vedādhyāyī tu yo vipraḥ satataṃ brahmaṇi sthitaḥ /
analyzed: veda adhyāyī tu yaḥ vipraḥ satatam brahmaṇi sthitaḥ

original: sācāraḥ sāgnihotrī ca so 'gnirvai kavyavāhanaḥ // Ang_1.736 //
analyzed: sa ācāraḥ sa agnihotrī ca saḥ agniḥ vai kavya vāhanaḥ
veda hīna nimantraṇe
mantra pūtam tu yat śrāddham a mantrāya prayacchati

original: tadannaṃ tasya kukṣisthaṃ rudatyeva na saṃśayaḥ // Ang_1.737 //
analyzed: tat annam tasya kukṣi stham rudati eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: śapatyenaṃ pradātāraṃ svasya taṃ tādṛśaṃ kila /
analyzed: śapati enam pradātāram svasya tam tādṛśam kila

original: yajanaṃ ca pradātāraṃ tadannaṃ taddhṛdi sthitam // Ang_1.738 //
analyzed: yajanam ca pradātāram tat annam tat hṛdi sthitam

original: yāvataḥ piṇḍān khalu sa prāśnāti haviṣo 'lpakaḥ /
analyzed: yāvataḥ piṇḍān khalu sa prāśnāti haviṣaḥ lpakaḥ

original: tāvataḥ śūlān grasati prāpya vaivasvataṃ yamam // Ang_1.739 //
analyzed: tāvataḥ śūlān grasati prāpya vaivasvatam yamam
dātṛ hastam ca chindanti ca
paśyataḥ cakṣuṣī ca eva śṛṇvataḥ śrotra yugmakam
durlabhāyām sva śākhāyām bhoktṝn anyān nivedayet
sva śāravīyaḥ ślāghyaḥ
pitroḥ śrāddhe viśeṣeṇa sva śākhīyān nivedayet
kanyā dānam pitṛ śrāddham śuddhakacchebhyaḥ eva ca

original: pradeyaṃ syātprayatnena nāsatkacchebhya eva vai // Ang_1.742 //
analyzed: pradeyam syāt prayatnena na asat kacchebhyaḥ eva vai
abhojyāḥ
roga yuktam duṣṭa buddhim duṣṭa cāritra tatparam

original: sadoṣakaṃ ca sadveṣaṃ kunakhaṃ śyāvadantakam // Ang_1.743 //
analyzed: sa doṣakam ca sa dveṣam kunakham śyāva dantakam
nityā prayata varṣmāṇam durvarṇam ca kurūpiṇam
nakṣatra jīvanam dāsa kṛtyam śūdra eka jīvinam
śūdra eka yājakam śūdra puṣṭam śūdra niketanam
śūdra pratigraha param nitya yācakam eva ca
tathā pallavikam krūram ātmasaṃbhāvinam śapam
atimāninam agrāhyam niṣkriyam veda nindakam
veda vikrayiṇam nityam grāmayājakam eva ca
brahma vidveṣiṇam ca eva brahma sva haraṇa unmukham
para dāra param duṣṭam para dāra eka cintakam
tyakta bhāryam datta putram putra vikrayiṇam tathā
mātā pitroḥ upoṣṭāram guru drohiṇam eva ca
dhana saṃgrahaṇa udyukta mānasam dhaninam kaṭum
nirdayam dāna vimukham nāstikam para dūṣakam
maṇikāra svarṇakāra rajaka ādi purohitam
adhikāśam atṛptam ca durvādam dāmbhikam jaḍam
veda karma tyāga pūrva śāstra mātra kṛta śramam
nāstikam kiṃbhaviṣyantam ṛṇinam tyakta vedakam
tyakta snānam tyakta saṃdhyam nivṛtta kṣura karmakam
kṛta ardha kṣura karmāṇam tuccham vikasita mehanam

original: phalguṃ kubjaṃ tathā cāndhaṃ badhiraṃ bhrāntamulbaṇam // Ang_1.753 //
analyzed: phalgum kubjam tathā ca andham badhiram bhrāntam ulbaṇam

original: unmattaṃ durbalaṃ sannaṃ kopinaṃ kunakhaṃ ratam /
analyzed: unmattam durbalam sannam kopinam kunakham ratam

original: kuṇḍakaṃ golakaṃ vrātyam aśuciṃ parasūtakam // Ang_1.754 //
analyzed: kuṇḍakam golakam vrātyam aśucim parasūtakam
para anninam para adhīnam karṣakam vārdhuṣim vṛṣam
nṛpa vṛttim vaiśya vṛttim śūdra vṛttim durāśayam
atyanta capalam śrāntam avīrā patim eva ca
tathā eva garbhiṇī nātham abhojya annam durāgasam
a śrotriya sutam kāru dhṛta vastram ca duḥśaṭham
gāyakam vraṇinam kṣudra bhāṣiṇam tuccha bhāṣakam
hāsya kāram naṭam nāṭya vidyam buruḍa kṛtyakam
kṣudra jīvam kārya jīvam nitya vetana jīvinam
na bhojayet prayatnena nimantraṇa dināt param
anumāsika bhoktāram pakṣa mātram parityajet
ūna māsika bhoktāram māsa mātram parityajet

original: ṣoḍaśe sārdhavarṣaṃ tu sapiṇḍe ca dvivatsaram // Ang_1.761 //
analyzed: ṣoḍaśe sa ardha varṣam tu sapiṇḍe ca dvi vatsaram
varjayitvā dvijam paścāt grāhayet śrāddha karmaṇi
śūdrām aśrāddha gam samyak tyajet varṣa trayam tathā
nṛpa vaiśya śrāddhabhiḥ sā bhakṣakam santatam tarām
varjayet abda mātram tu grāma caṇḍāla karmasu
āmaśrāddha gṛhītāram tad dine na avalokayet
divārātram a saṃbhāṣyaḥ divākīrtya purohitaḥ
puṇya kāle tu a saṃbhāṣyaḥ kulālānām purohitaḥ

original: bhānuvāre bhaumavāre śukravāre ca santatam // Ang_1.765 //
analyzed: bhānuvāre bhaumavāre śukravāre ca santatam
a saṃbhāṣyaḥ prayatnena para sauna purohitaḥ
parvaṇoḥ yoga kāleṣu dvija veśyā purohitaḥ

original: nāvekṣyā eva caite vai yadi dṛṣṭāstadā tadā /
analyzed: na avekṣyāḥ eva ca ete vai yadi dṛṣṭāḥ tadā tadā
agneḥ manve nuvākasya paṭhanāt kṛtakṛtya tā
tīrtha pratigrahī dṛṣṭaḥ yadi śrāddha dine tarām

original: tīrthajīvī tadāvāsī tatpurohita eva ca // Ang_1.768 //
analyzed: tīrtha jīvī tad āvāsī tad purohitaḥ eva ca
yadā dṛṣṭaḥ tadā sūryam paśyema iti vilokayet
varaṇam
tripūrṣa caryā vṛttāntaḥ spaṣṭaḥ yasya bhavettarām
tādṛśam prayatam dvāntam a lolupa mada āmbhikam
yadṛcchā lābha santuṣṭam śrotriyam vedinam śucim
nitya agnim pūrvavayasam sudhiyam sat kula udbhavam
tasmāt pratyupakāra eka rahitam sumukham dvijam
samīkṣya varayet samyak brāhmaṇam śrāddha karmaṇi
ādau saṃkalpya prayataḥ sa pavitra karaḥ tathā
darbha pāṇiḥ tvarataraḥ tarām
akrodhanaḥ ca su mukhaḥ vācā saṃkalpam ācaret

original: deśaṃ kālaṃ ca saṃkīrtya tathā ca prakṛte tataḥ /
analyzed: deśam kālam ca saṃkīrtya tathā ca prakṛte tatas

original: pitḥn devān prākṛtānvai samuddiśya ca prākṛtam // Ang_1.774 //
analyzed: pitṝn devān prākṛtān vai samuddiśya ca prākṛtam

original: kariṣye karma caiveti saṃkalpaṃ prathamaṃ caret /
analyzed: kariṣye karma ca eva iti saṃkalpam prathamam caret
prasādāya darbha dānam
viśveṣām atra devānām sthānam āhavanīyake
kṣaṇam kṛtvā prasādaḥ karaṇīyaḥ udīryate

original: ityevaṃ dakṣiṇe haste dadyāddarbhān dvijasya vai // Ang_1.776 //
analyzed: iti evam dakṣiṇe haste dadyāt darbhān dvijasya vai
etat hai varaṇam proktam pitḥṇām evam eva vai
maṇḍala pūjā

original: kṛtvā tu varaṇaṃ paścād oṃ tatheti ca codite // Ang_1.777 // [091]
analyzed: kṛtvā tu varaṇam paścāt om tathā iti ca codite

original: kṛtvā tu maṇḍalaṃ śuddhaṃ gomayena vidhānataḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā tu maṇḍalam śuddham gomayena vidhānataḥ

original: maṇḍalaṃ pūjayitvādau daivaṃ paitṛkameva ca // Ang_1.778 //
analyzed: maṇḍalam pūjayitvā ādau daivam paitṛkam eva ca
maṇḍalāt paścime bhāge brāhmaṇe svāgatīkṛte
tatra eva visṛjet pādyam kṣālayet maṇḍala upari
gulphayoḥ adhas kṣālanam
pāda prakṣālanam śrāddhe varam syāt gulphayoḥ adhas
pitḥṇām narakam ghoram roma saṃsakta vāriṇā
yadi syāt roma saṃsaktam pāda prakṣālane bhavet
tad doṣa parihārāya ājānu kṣālayet param
ācamana prakaraṇam

original: ādāvantye ca pādye ca viṣṭare vikire tathā /
analyzed: ādau antye ca pādye ca viṣṭare vikire tathā

original: ucchiṣṭapiṇḍadāne ca ṣaṭsu cācamanaṃ smṛtam // Ang_1.782 //
analyzed: ucchiṣṭa piṇḍa dāne ca ṣaṭsu ca ācamanam smṛtam
kartuḥ pūrvam bhoktuḥ ācamane
kartā na ācamya yat bhoktā kuryāt ācamana kriyām
śunaḥ mūtra samam toyam tasmāt tat parivarjayet
deva ādi bhojana diś
udak mukhaḥ tu devānām pitḥṇām dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ
pradadyāt pārvaṇe sarvam deva pūjā vidhānataḥ
varaṇa traya kālaḥ

original: kecidrātrau tu pūrvedyus taddine prātareva ca / [092]
analyzed: kecid rātrau tu pūrvedyus tad dine prātar eva ca

original: kutape taddine bhūyas trivāraṃ śrāddhamūcire // Ang_1.785 //
analyzed: kutape tad dine bhūyas tri vāram śrāddham ūcire
sakṛt eva iti tad jāmitayā śrāddham prakurvate

original: tatsthāne varaṇaṃ kṛtvā śrāddhaṃ sarvaṃ prakurvate // Ang_1.786 //
analyzed: tad sthāne varaṇam kṛtvā śrāddham sarvam prakurvate

original: oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ suvariti svāhāntamantro vai tataḥ /
analyzed: om bhūḥ bhuvaḥ suvar iti svāhā anta mantraḥ vai tatas
viṣṭaraḥ

original: ayaṃ vo viṣṭaraśceti pradadyādviṣṭaraṃ tathā // Ang_1.787 //
analyzed: ayam vaḥ viṣṭaraḥ ca iti pradadyāt viṣṭaram tathā
svadhā śabdam pitṛ sthāne sarvatra evam vidhīyate

original: anenaiva tu mantreṇa tatpūjā vihitā parā // Ang_1.788 //
analyzed: anena eva tu mantreṇa tad pūjā vihitā parā

original: ayaṃ hi paramo mantraḥ pitḥṇāmarcane mahān /
analyzed: ayam hi paramaḥ mantraḥ pitḥṇām arcane mahān
prayoktavyaḥ śrāddha dine mantrāḥ prākṛta mātṛkāḥ
viśvān devān pitṝn vā api saṃbudhya uccārya tat param
pūrva uktena eva mantreṇa viṣṭaram pratipādayet
ṣaṣṭhī antena āsanam dadyāt kṣaṇaḥ ca kriyatām iti

original: kṣaṇaṃ dadyāttu darbheṇa hastasaṃsparśanena vā // Ang_1.791 //
analyzed: kṣaṇam dadyāt tu darbheṇa hasta saṃsparśanena vā
prāpnuvantu bhavantaḥ ca tāra pūrveṇa vai vadet

original: arghyaṃ kṛtvā kṛtaḥ proktaḥ kartavya iti cettataḥ // Ang_1.792 //
analyzed: arghyam kṛtvā kṛtaḥ proktaḥ kartavyaḥ iti ced tatas
darbhān āstīrya bhū pṛṣṭhe tatra pātram adhas bilam

original: nikṣipya taduparyevaṃ darbhairācchidya vai tataḥ // Ang_1.793 //
analyzed: nikṣipya tad upari evam darbhaiḥ ācchidya vai tatas
uddhṛtya prokṣya tad pātre yavān nikṣipya śambaram
bhūḥ bhuvaḥ suvarā pūrva gandha akṣata suma ādikam
tatra nikṣipya tat ca ambhaḥ tad haste ṛghyam pradāpayet

original: āvāhanaṃ ca tatpūrvaṃ paraṃ vā tatkṛtākṛtam // Ang_1.795 //
analyzed: āvāhanam ca tat pūrvam param vā tat kṛta a kṛtam
yadi kartavya dhīḥ syāt ced tadā vyāhṛtibhiḥ caret

original: yā divyā iti vā no ced devā vo 'rdhyamiti bruvan // Ang_1.796 //
analyzed: yāḥ divyāḥ iti vā na u ced devāḥ vaḥ ṛdhyam iti bruvan
dadyāt tam arghyam devebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ ca krameṇa vai
āvāhane viśve devāḥ uśantaḥ tu iti yugmakam
ubhayatra prakathitam kecana atra aparāmṛcam

original: viśvedevāsa ityekāṃ viśvedeveti vai parām // Ang_1.798 //
analyzed: viśve devāsaḥ iti ekām viśve deva iti vai parām

original: āgacchantviti tāṃ cāpi devārthe prajapanti vai /
analyzed: āgacchantu iti tām ca api deva arthe prajapanti vai

original: pitṛsthāna uśantastvā āyantu na itīva vai // Ang_1.799 //
analyzed: pitṛsthāne uśantaḥ tvā āyantu naḥ iti iva vai
prajapeyuḥ kecana atra tat etat kathitam param

original: kṛtākṛtaṃ prakathitam anuktābādhakaṃ na tu // Ang_1.800 //
analyzed: kṛtākṛtam prakathitam anukta ābādhakam na tu
veda mātra anuktitaḥ tu gandha akṣata yava ādikam
dhūpa dīpa dukūla ādi kṛtsnam yajñopavītakam
sarvam vyāhātebhiḥ dadyāt tūṣṇīm vā tat yathāruci
agnaukaṇāma

original: tato 'gnau karaṇaṃ kuryād yadi pūrvaṃ svasūtrataḥ // Ang_1.802 //
analyzed: tatas gnau karaṇam kuryāt yadi pūrvam sva sūtrataḥ
anukta mantraiḥ kāścid tu kṛtāḥ syuḥ tāḥ kriyāḥ tatas
tad pūrva kṛta saṃkalpa karma madhya adhika tvataḥ
punaḥsaṃkalpa prakaraṇam
tat kiṃcid viguṇībhūyāt tad vaiguṇyataḥ eva vai
punar saṃkalpayitvā eva tad pūrvaka kriyām caret
sarvatra evam vijānīyāt tad tad saṃkalpa karmasu

original: na cedekasya saṃkalpa ekadhaiva bhaveddhi vai // Ang_1.805 //
analyzed: na ced ekasya saṃkalpaḥ ekadhā eva bhavet hi vai
āsamāpteḥ vidhānena prakṛte paitṛke kila
an ukta mantra paṭhanāt punar saṃkalpam ācaret
yad yukta mantra mātreṇa yat karma calati sthale

original: tatkarmamadhye na punaḥ saṃkalpaḥ prabhaveddhi vai // Ang_1.807 //
analyzed: tad karma madhye na punar saṃkalpaḥ prabhavet hi vai
tasmāt saṃkalpayitvā
pariveṣaṇa prakāra paurvāparyam
saṃparistīrya vidhinā darbhaiḥ taiḥ dakṣiṇa agrakaiḥ
annam ādāya pakvāt tu ca upastīrya tatas punar
mekṣaṇena annam ādāya mantram etam śruti īritam
pratikalpa eka paṭhitam somāya iti hunet haviḥ

original: taccheṣeṇa yamāyeti agnayeti ca tatparam // Ang_1.810 //
analyzed: tad śeṣeṇa yamāya iti agnaye iti ca tat param
uddeśa tyāga mātram ca prācīnāvītinā eva vai
samuccārya punar ca eva pariṣicya apradakṣiṇam
amantrakam vidhānena tat annam śiṣṭam uddhṛtam

original: ardhaṃ kṣipedviprapātre datvā hastodakaṃ tataḥ // Ang_1.812 //
analyzed: ardham kṣipet vipra pātre da tvā hasta udakam tatas
daiva pātre bhighārya atha pūrvavat ca vidhānataḥ

original: annaṃ ca pāyasaṃ bhakṣyaṃ vyañjanāni phalāni ca // Ang_1.813 //
analyzed: annam ca pāyasam bhakṣyam vyañjanāni phalāni ca

original: payo madhu ghṛtaṃ cānte sūpaṃ tu pariveṣayet /
analyzed: payaḥ madhu ghṛtam ca ante sūpam tu pariveṣayet
agre su upadāne
yadi punar vastu syāt pariveṣitam
tat rākṣasam bhavet śrāddham tathā tasmāt na ca ācaret
rakṣaḥ ghna mantram
annam ājyena abhighārya gāyatryā prokṣya tat param
dadhinā annam ca pracchādya ca aham asmi iti sūktakam
prapaṭhet atra vidhinā rākṣoghna śruti madhya gam
yena kena api uccāraṇam asamarthasya
svayam yadi asamarthaḥ ced mantra uccāraṇa karmaṇi

original: yena kena ca vipreṇa vācanīyaṃ prayatnataḥ // Ang_1.817 //
analyzed: yena kena ca vipreṇa vācanīyam prayatnataḥ

original: naite mantrā yājamānā atroktāḥ kila karmaṇi /
analyzed: na ete mantrāḥ yājamānāḥ atra uktāḥ kila karmaṇi
rākṣasānām vināśāya veda ghoṣaḥ praśasyate

original: sa ghoṣo brāhmaṇaiḥ kartuṃ śakyate prakṛte kila /
analyzed: sa ghoṣaḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ kartum śakyate prakṛte kila
uṣṇam dātavyam

original: annaṃ vastūni yānīha pātreṇa saha kevalam // Ang_1.819 //
analyzed: annam vastūni yāni iha pātreṇa saha kevalam

original: cullisthāni bhaveyurhi tebhyaḥ pātrebhya eva vai /
analyzed: culli sthāni bhaveyuḥ hi tebhyaḥ pātrebhyaḥ eva vai

original: darvimyaśca samuddhṛtya svalpaṃ svalpaṃ yathoṣmakam // Ang_1.820 //
analyzed: darvimyaḥ ca samuddhṛtya svalpam svalpam yathoṣmakam
yadā bhavet tadā tatra viprebhyaḥ pariveṣayet

original: ūṣmabhāgā hi pitaraś coṣmaśūnyaṃ na paitṛkam // Ang_1.821 // [096]
analyzed: ūṣma bhāgāḥ hi pitaraḥ ca ūṣma śūnyam na paitṛkam

original: bhavedeva na sandehaḥ paścādannaṃ yathā purā /
analyzed: bhavet eva na sandehaḥ paścāt annam yathā purā

original: viprahaste jalaṃ datvā gāyatryā prokṣya vai tataḥ // Ang_1.822 //
analyzed: vipra haste jalam da tvā gāyatryā prokṣya vai tatas
yadā eva āhavanīyam vai dakṣiṇāgnim vidhānataḥ

original: nityaṃ vai gārhapatyaṃ ca pariṣiñcati mantrataḥ // Ang_1.823 //
analyzed: nityam vai gārhapatyam ca pariṣiñcati mantrataḥ

original: satyaṃ tvartena vidhinā brāhmaṇaṃ pariṣicya vai /
analyzed: satyam tvā ṛtena vidhinā brāhmaṇam pariṣicya vai

original: pṛthivī teti tatsarvam abhimṛśya tataḥ punaḥ // Ang_1.824 //
analyzed: pṛthivī tā iti tat sarvam abhimṛśya tatas punar
samupasparśayitvā atha pitṛ ādibhyaḥ nivedayet
pradhānam etat homaḥ ca samupasparśanam punar
mantrāḥ vācyāḥ
etat mantra trayam vācā yajamānaḥ samuccaret
etat mantra trayam śrāddhe pradhānakam iha ucyate
tathā piṇḍa pradānasya mantrāḥ kecana coditāḥ
etad uccāraṇa aśaktau vyartham śrāddham bhavet kila
tasmāt yatnena mahatā homa āgneyaḥ iti trayam

original: dvayaṃ vātha punaścaikaṃ pṛthivī teti kiṃcana // Ang_1.828 //
analyzed: dvayam vā atha punar ca ekam pṛthivī kiṃcana
anna abhimarśane proktam amṛtopastarāṇakam

original: pañca prāṇāhutau mantrāḥ prāṇāyetyādikā parāḥ // Ang_1.829 //
analyzed: pañca prāṇa āhutau mantrāḥ prāṇāya iti ādikā parāḥ
yathāvat eva vācā te pravācyā śrāddha karmaṇi

original: na cecchrāddhaṃ bhavennaitad etairmantrairbhaveddhi tat // Ang_1.830 //
analyzed: na ced śrāddham bhavet na etat etaiḥ mantraiḥ bhavet hi tat
paścāt piṇḍa pradāne mantrāḥ vācyāḥ ca bhaktitaḥ
mantra vaikalpa nāśāya vedaghoṣaḥ
bhojane samupakrānte veda ghoṣam prayatnataḥ
kārayet vipra mukhatas ṛk yajuḥ sāmabhiḥ tarām

original: tena vaikalyadoṣā ye rakṣobhiḥ parikalpitāḥ // Ang_1.832 //
analyzed: tena vaikalya doṣāḥ ye rakṣobhiḥ parikalpitāḥ
sadyas naṣṭāḥ bhaveyuḥ hi tasmāt eva tathā ācaret
yathā anya ghoṣaḥ viprāṇām śṛṇuyāt na atra kevalam
tathā ghoṣaḥ prakartavyaḥ svayam para mukhāt tathā

original: yatnātkārayitavyaśca na ceddoṣo mahān bhavet // Ang_1.834 //
analyzed: yatnāt kārayitavyaḥ ca na ced doṣaḥ mahān bhavet
veda uccāraṇa sāmarthya vikalaḥ yadi tad karaḥ

original: namo vaḥ pitaro mantramātraṃ bhaktyā japettu vai // Ang_1.835 //
analyzed: namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ mantra mātram bhaktyā japet tu vai
idam viṣṇuḥ vyāhṛtīḥ vā gāyatrīm vā vidhānataḥ
viṣṇoḥ arāṭa mantre vā gāyatrīm vaiṣṇavīm api

original: na cettu pauruṣaṃ sūktam athavā taṃ triyambakam /
analyzed: na ced tu pauruṣam sūktam athavā tam triyambakam

original: ā vo rājānamantraṃ vā madhutrayamathāpi vā // Ang_1.837 //
analyzed: ā vaḥ rājāna mantram vā madhutrayam atha api vā

original: namo brahmaṇyamantraṃ vā daśa śāntiṣu kāmapi /
analyzed: namaḥ brahmaṇya mantram vā daśa śāntiṣu kām api

original: svādhīnā tāmṛcaṃ no ced gāyatrīṃ sarvaśūnyadām // Ang_1.838 //
analyzed: svādhīnā tām ṛcam na u ced gāyatrīm sarva śūnya dām
pra tad viṣṇu mantram irāvatī dhenumatī iti ca

original: yajamānaḥ svayaṃ prītyai pitṛbhyo pravadettarām // Ang_1.839 //
analyzed: yajamānaḥ svayam prītyai pitṛbhyaḥ pravadettarām
bhojana ante ca saṃpannam pradadet puratas sthitaḥ

original: tṛptāḥ stheti dvivāraṃ tad uktvā dadyāttadannakam // Ang_1.840 // [098]
analyzed: tṛptāḥ stha iti dvi vāram tat uktvā dadyāt tat annakam
tatra eva vikiret pātra samīpe tad puras sthitaḥ

original: ucchiṣṭapiṇḍaṃ ca dadyād uttarāpośanaṃ tataḥ // Ang_1.841 //
analyzed: ucchiṣṭa piṇḍam ca dadyāt uttara apośanam tatas
sarvāṇi etāni śiṣṭānām ācāreṇa na ca uktitaḥ
sūtra kārasya vedasya kṛte bhyudayam ucyate
a kṛte pratyavāyaḥ na punar anyāni kevalam
tad tad kriyā viśeṣeṣu tūṣṇīkam veda mantrakaiḥ
atrā anuktaiḥ mahā kāla vilambaḥ bādhakāya vai

original: bhavedeva na sandehaḥ śrāddhamantro ya īritaḥ // Ang_1.844 //
analyzed: bhavet eva na sandehaḥ śrāddha mantraḥ yaḥ īritaḥ
tad mātrasya samīcīna proktyai tat karma sādhu vai

original: bhavetkilānyathā taddhi kiṃ bhavediti sādhubhiḥ // Ang_1.845 //
analyzed: bhavet kila anyathā tat hi kim bhavet iti sādhubhiḥ
samyak ālocanīyaḥ śrāddha mantra ukti mātrataḥ

original: yāvān kālavilambaḥ syāt tāvānevātra kevalam // Ang_1.846 //
analyzed: yāvān kāla vilambaḥ syāt tāvān eva atra kevalam
prāmāṇikaḥ hi tad bhinnaḥ vihitaḥ ca vidhānataḥ

original: karmaṇo bādhakāyaiva sādhakāya bhavenna tu // Ang_1.847 //
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ bādhakāya eva sādhakāya bhavet na tu
tasmāt vidvān sūtra veda vihitam yāvat eva vai
tāvat eva prakurvīta sarva saukhyāya kevalam
ātmanaḥ brāhmaṇānām ca bhoktḥṇām śāstra vartmanaḥ
śāstra virodhi tyājyam eva
yathāvat eva kurvīta ā adhikam śāstra virodhi yat
sarvam samyak parityājyam vihitam yat tat ācaret
viprāṇām bhojanāt paścāt tad śāstra adhika kṛtyataḥ
samāgatāt punar proktaḥ saṃkalpaḥ na anyathā ācaret

original: apāṃ madhyena cācchindya darbhān mūlaiḥ sakṛddhataiḥ // Ang_1.851 //
analyzed: apām madhyena ca ācchindya darbhān mūlaiḥ sakṛt hataiḥ
śundhantām pitaraḥ prokṣya āyantu iti abhimantrya ca
sakṛdācchinna mantreṇa saṃstīrya eva tatas punar
mārjayantā iti mantreṇa tatas dadyāt tila udakam
sakṛt ācchinna darbheṣu triṣu sthāneṣu tat param
ca mantreṇa dadyāt piṇḍa trayam punar

original: yanme māteti mantraṃ tat pitṛbhya iti vai punaḥ // Ang_1.854 //
analyzed: yat me mātā iti mantram tat pitṛbhyaḥ iti vai punar

original: atra pitaro 'mutra ca amī madamataḥ param /
analyzed: atra pitaraḥ mutra ca amī madam atas param

original: ye samānāstato bhūyo yena jātāstataḥ param // Ang_1.855 //
analyzed: ye samānāḥ tatas bhūyas yena jātāḥ tatas param

original: vīraṃ dhatteti tatprāśyāghrāya vā tatparaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: vīram dhatta iti tat prāśya āghrāya vā tat param punar
mārjayantā iti mantreṇa pūrvavat ca tila udakam
da tvā añjana abhyañjane ca vāsaḥ chitvā vidhānataḥ

original: namo va iti mantreṇa namaskārān samācaret // Ang_1.857 //
analyzed: namaḥ vaḥ iti mantreṇa namaskārān samācaret

original: gṛhānna iti mantraṃ ca ūrja vahantīmanuṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: gṛhān naḥ iti mantram ca ūrje vahantī manum tatas

original: uttiṣṭhata pitaro mano nvāhuveti mantrakam // Ang_1.858 //
analyzed: uttiṣṭhata pitaraḥ manaḥ nu āhuva iti mantrakam
punar naḥ iti bhūyaḥ ca yat antarikṣam iti vai
mantrān japtvā krameṇa evam piṇḍān tān pūjayet tatas
pitṛ piṇḍa arcanam yaiḥ tu kriyate darbha patrakaiḥ
taṇḍulaiḥ akṣataiḥ puṣpaiḥ tilaiḥ api yavaiḥ tathā
prīṇitāḥ pitaraḥ tena yāvat candra arka medinī
putra kalatra ādibhiḥ pitṛ pradakṣiṇa namaskārāḥ
vāsobhiḥ pūjayet piṇḍān yathāśaktyā vicakṣaṇaḥ
dakṣiṇābhiḥ ca tāmbūlaiḥ dhūpa dīpa ādibhiḥ tathā
pradakṣiṇa namaskāraiḥ putra pautra ādibhiḥ saha

original: kalatraiḥ parivāraiśca na cettasya kulaṃ tarām /
analyzed: kalatraiḥ parivāraiḥ ca na ced tasya kulam tarām

original: na vardhate kṣīyate ca kāle kāle śanaiḥ śanaiḥ // Ang_1.863 //
analyzed: na vardhate kṣīyate ca kāle kāle śanais śanais

original: ta eva piṇḍāḥ pitaras tadrūpeṇa sthitāḥ param /
analyzed: te eva piṇḍāḥ pitaraḥ tad rūpeṇa sthitāḥ param

original: bhaveyuḥ pūjanārthāya nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // Ang_1.864 //
analyzed: bhaveyuḥ pūjana arthāya na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
apratyakṣāḥ hi pitaraḥ vāyu rūpam samāśritāḥ
ākāśa rūpam āpannāḥ kāla bhedeṣu santatam
nityam ākāśa rūpāḥ te śrāddha kāleṣu bhaktitaḥ
samāhūtāḥ tadā sadyas vāyu rūpam samāśritāḥ

original: samāyānti manovegāt piṇḍakāle tu te punaḥ /
analyzed: samāyānti manaḥ vegāt piṇḍa kāle tu te punar
tat praviśya eva putrāṇām hitāya kṣaṇam añjasā
tiṣṭhanti kila tad pūjā svīkārāya tatas yatan
tad pūjām vidhinā kuryāt tatas ced putra kāmukaḥ
madhyama piṇḍam parimṛjya
prayacchet madhyamam piṇḍam dharmapatnyai sa mantrakam

original: ādhatta pitaraśceti tataḥ sā niyatā śuciḥ // Ang_1.869 //
analyzed: ādhatta pitaraḥ ca iti tatas sā niyatā śuciḥ
pragṛhya añjalinā bhaktyā prāc mukhī maunam āśritā

original: taṃ prāśya vidhinācamya tatpaścāttu trirātrakam // Ang_1.870 //
analyzed: tam prāśya vidhinā ācamya tad paścāt tu tri rātrakam
kurvantī bhojanam bhartuḥ mukteḥ paścāt sakṛt śuciḥ

original: muditā harṣitātīva duḥkhitā malinā tathā // Ang_1.871 //
analyzed: muditā harṣitā atīva duḥkhitā malinā tathā
bhāvayantī mahārudram tam kālam ninayet api

original: tāvanmātreṇa ca tataḥ sā putraṃ puṣkarasrajam // Ang_1.872 //
analyzed: tāvat mātreṇa ca tatas sā putram puṣkarasrajam

original: labhate nātra sandeho yadi sā syādrajasvalā /
analyzed: labhate na atra sandehaḥ yadi sā syāt rajasvalā
śrāddha dine śūdra bhojane

original: na śūdraṃ bhojayecchrāddhe gṛhe yatnena taddine // Ang_1.873 //
analyzed: na śūdram bhojayet śrāddhe gṛhe yatnena tad dine

original: śrāddhaśeṣaṃ na śūdrebhyo na dadyāttu khaleṣvapi /
analyzed: śrāddha śeṣam na śūdrebhyaḥ na dadyāt tu khaleṣu api
pitṛ bhojana pātrasya khananam
pituḥ ucchiṣṭa pātrāṇi śrāddhe gopyāni kārayet

original: khanitvaiva vinikṣipya yathā śrāddhe na gocaram /
analyzed: khanitvā eva vinikṣipya yathā śrāddhe na gocaram
sa udakumbham

original: kṛte 'kṛte vā sāpiṇḍye mātāpitroḥ parasya vā // Ang_1.875 //
analyzed: kṛte kṛte vā sāpiṇḍye mātā pitroḥ parasya vā
tasya api annam sodakumbham dadyāt saṃvatsaram dvijaḥ
a daivam pārvaṇa śrāddham sa udakumbham adharmakam
kuryāt ābdika paryantam saṃkalpa vidhinā anvaham

original: kuryādaharahaḥ śrāddham amāvāsyāṃ vinā sadā // Ang_1.877 //
analyzed: kuryāt aharahar śrāddham amāvāsyām vinā sadā
yat sa uda kalaśa śrāddham na kuryāt anumāsike
prathama abde na tila tarpaṇam
prathama abde na kartavyam tila tarpaṇam iti api
sapiṇḍīkaraṇāt param śrāddha aṅga tarpaṇam
yat etat tat tu kathitam vatsara abde sapiṇḍane

original: ekādaśe dvādaśe vā sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ yadi // Ang_1.879 //
analyzed: ekādaśe dvādaśe vā sapiṇḍīkaraṇam yadi
kṛtam ced tat puram samyak sadyas śrāddha aṅga tarpaṇam

original: kurvītaiva tathā darśaṃ pratimāsaṃ pṛthak pṛthak // Ang_1.880 //
analyzed: kurvīta eva tathā darśam pratimāsam pṛthak pṛthak
a kṛte tarpaṇe bhūyas pitaraḥ tasya kevalam
bhaveyuḥ duḥkhitāḥ ghoram punar preta tva śaṅkayā
teṣām śaṅkā nirāsāya māsikeṣu aṅga tarpaṇam

original: śrāddhānte vidhinā kāryaṃ sadya eva na saṃśayaḥ // Ang_1.882 //
analyzed: śrāddha ante vidhinā kāryam sadyas eva na saṃśayaḥ
pratimāsam tadā darśam yat śrāddham tarpaṇa ādikam

original: asaṃśayaṃ prakurvīta na ceddoṣo mahān bhavet // Ang_1.883 //
analyzed: asaṃśayam prakurvīta na ced doṣaḥ mahān bhavet
śrāddha mukteḥ param teṣām dvijānām kara śuddhaye
tilaiḥ hasta udakam kāryam ṣaṣ vāram darbha puñjataḥ
na ced tad kara śuddhiḥ ca na bhavet eva kevalam

original: madgotraṃ vardhatāṃ deva pitḥṇāṃ ca prasādataḥ // Ang_1.885 //
analyzed: mad gotram vardhatām deva pitḥṇām ca prasādataḥ
iti brāhmaṇa pādeṣu saparyām tām tadā ācaret

original: viśvedevaprasādaṃ ca pitḥṇāṃ ca prasādakam // Ang_1.886 //
analyzed: viśvedeva prasādam ca pitḥṇām ca prasādakam
svīkṛtya śirasā gṛhya devāḥ ca pitaraḥ tatas

original: svasti brūteti vācoktvā hy akṣayodakamityapi // Ang_1.887 //
analyzed: svasti brūta iti vācā uktvā hi akṣaya udakam iti api
astu iti api ca tad haste śambaram sa tila akṣatam

original: yathākrameṇa dadyācca vācayiṣye svadhāṃ tathā // Ang_1.888 // [103]
analyzed: yathākrameṇa dadyāt ca vācayiṣye svadhām tathā
svāhām api ca saṃprārthya vācyatām iti taiḥ tatas

original: saṃproktastu ṛce tveti dhārāṃ tāṃ pravadetparām // Ang_1.889 //
analyzed: saṃproktaḥ tu ṛce tvā iti dhārām tām pravadet parām
pitṛbhyaḥ ca prathamatas pitāmahebhyaḥ eva ca
prapitāmahebhyaḥ ca tadvat svadhā astāḥ vācyatām iti

original: bruvantu ca bhavanto vai oṃ svadhāmiti vai vadet /
analyzed: bruvantu ca bhavantaḥ vai om svadhām iti vai vadet

original: saṃpadyantāṃ svadhāśceti devāścāpi tathā punaḥ // Ang_1.891 //
analyzed: saṃpadyantām svadhāḥ ca iti devāḥ ca api tathā punar
prīyantām pitaraḥ paścāt pitāmahāḥ tatas kila

original: prapitāmahāśca pitaras taddhaste salilaṃ kṣipet // Ang_1.892 //
analyzed: prapitāmahāḥ ca pitaraḥ tad haste salilam kṣipet
pitḥṇām rajatam
devānām svarṇam
tatas śrāddha aika sādguṇya hetave dakṣiṇām mudā

original: yathāśaktyā pradadyācca pitḥṇāṃ rajataṃ param // Ang_1.893 //
analyzed: yathāśaktyā pradadyāt ca pitḥṇām rajatam param

original: hiraṇyaṃ cāpi devānāṃ vājevājeti vai vadet /
analyzed: hiraṇyam ca api devānām vājevāja iti vai vadet
uttiṣṭhata iti pitaraḥ anugacchantu devatāḥ

original: ityudvāsya tu tān paścād annaśeṣo 'khilaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: iti udvāsya tu tān paścāt anna śeṣaḥ khilaḥ punar

original: kriyatāṃ kimiti prokte ceṣṭaiḥ sa upabhujyatām // Ang_1.895 //
analyzed: kriyatām kim iti prokte ca iṣṭaiḥ saḥ upabhujyatām

original: ityuktastu tato bhūyaḥ svāduṣaṁ sada ityataḥ /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ tu tatas bhūyas svāduṣaḥ sadaḥ iti atas

original: upasthānaṃ pitḥṇāṃ tu kuryātprāñjalinā dvijaḥ // Ang_1.896 //
analyzed: upasthānam pitḥṇām tu kuryāt prāñjalinā dvijaḥ
teṣām tām āśiṣam gṛhya praṇipatya vidhānataḥ
anuvrajya vidhānena sva gṛhasya antime tyajet

original: na cetsarvatra tāḥ proktāḥ parā vyāhṛtayaḥ śivāḥ /
analyzed: na ced sarvatra tāḥ proktāḥ parāḥ vyāhṛtayaḥ śivāḥ

original: na cettu vāmadevāya mantraṃ paramamuttamam // Ang_1.898 // [104]
analyzed: na ced tu vāmadevāya mantram paramam uttamam
pravadet tena manunā yat yat vaiguṇyam āgatam

original: karmamadhye paitṛke 'smin jñānājñānata eva vai // Ang_1.899 //
analyzed: karma madhye paitṛke smin jñāna ajñānataḥ eva vai
kartṛ bhoktṛ mahā doṣa dravya kāla ādi saṃbhavāḥ
lobha moha ajñāna citta kāya kṛtya viśeṣa jāḥ
mahā aparādhāḥ su krūrāḥ parīhāra eka varjitāḥ

original: te sarve smaraṇāttasya mahāmantrasya vaibhavāt // Ang_1.901 //
analyzed: te sarve smaraṇāt tasya mahā mantrasya vaibhavāt
sadyas vilayam āyānti karma sādguṇyam api ati
prabhavet sadyas eva evam tasmāt tu manum uttamam
namaḥ dvādaśa saṃyuktam paṭhanīyam sakṛt kila
tāvat mātreṇa tat karma paramam tṛpti kārakam
acchidram sat guṇam sa aṅgam vikala eka vivarjitam
pratyavāya eka rahitam gayā śrāddha śata adhikam
bhavati eva na sandehaḥ tasmāt tat mantram uccaret
ucchiṣṭa ādi śrāddhe sapta pavitrāṇi
ucchiṣṭam śiva nirmālyam vamanam pretaparpaṭam
śrāddhe sapta pavitrāṇi dauhitraḥ kutapaḥ tilāḥ

original: payaso vatsapītatvād ucchiṣṭamiti nāma tat // Ang_1.906 //
analyzed: payasaḥ vatsa pīta tvāt ucchiṣṭam iti nāma tat
bhagīratha prārthanayā tat gaṅgā ati avalepa hā
tirodhānam jaṭāraṇye kṛtvā tām adharat yatas

original: tannirmālyaṃ tato gaṅgā sā prītyai paramā smṛtā /
analyzed: tat nirmālyam tatas gaṅgā sā prītyai paramā smṛtā

original: sā nityaśuddhā tadyogād gaṅgā patitapāvanī // Ang_1.908 // [105]
analyzed: sā nitya śuddhā tad yogāt gaṅgā patita pāvanī

original: nirdoṣā saiva kathitā tadbhinnā sapta yāśca tāḥ /
analyzed: nirdoṣā sā eva kathitā tad bhinnā sapta yāḥ ca tāḥ

original: aśuddhāśca kadācitsyuḥ śivāṅgapatitā tu sā // Ang_1.909 //
analyzed: aśuddhāḥ ca kadācid syuḥ śiva aṅga patitā tu sā

original: atyantaikapavitrā hi nānyā vai tatsamā sarit /
analyzed: atyanta eka pavitrā hi na anyā vai tad samā sarit

original: tadīyodakasaṃbandhād yatpitryaṃ karma tattu vai // Ang_1.910 //
analyzed: tadīya udaka saṃbandhāt yat pitryam karma tat tu vai
apavitra sahasrebhyaḥ muktam sadyas bhaviṣyati
pitaraḥ nitya tṛptāḥ te naṣṭa kṣutkāḥ pitāmahāḥ
pārameśvara sāyujyam labhante prapitāmahāḥ

original: apyanye kulajā eva syuste kulasahasrakam // Ang_1.912 //
analyzed: api anye kula jāḥ eva syuḥ te kula sahasrakam
tat ca api vaiṣṇavam dhāma tad kṣaṇāt prāpitam bhavet
tri rātra phala dāḥ nadyaḥ puṇye tad ayana dvaye
ardhodaye mahodaye cakrike grahaṇe tathā

original: padmakāpilaṣaṣṭhyāṃ vā punaranyeṣu tāḥ punaḥ // Ang_1.914 //
analyzed: padmakāpilaṣaṣṭhyām vā punar anyeṣu tāḥ punar
vidhi prayatna racitāḥ vagāhana japa ādikaiḥ

original: phalapradā hi sarito na tathā jāhnavī śivā // Ang_1.915 //
analyzed: phala pradāḥ hi saritaḥ na tathā jāhnavī śivā
darśana sparśana dhyānaiḥ jantūnām janma mocanī
tad uttara kṣaṇāt gaṅgā tad bhārga tanu saṃbhavā
siṃha karkaṭayoḥ madhye sarvāḥ nadyaḥ rajasvalāḥ
dina trayam asaṃspṛśyāḥ tatra ādau yāḥ sarit varāḥ
mahā nadyaḥ

original: tāpī payoṣṇī divyā syur dakṣiṇe tu saridvarāḥ // Ang_1.918 //
analyzed: tāpī payoṣṇī divyā syuḥ dakṣiṇe tu sarit varāḥ

original: pāvanī narmadā caiva yamunā ca mahānadī / [106]
analyzed: pāvanī narmadā ca eva yamunā ca mahā nadī

original: sarasvatī viśokā ca vitastā ca tathā punaḥ // Ang_1.919 //
analyzed: sarasvatī viśokā ca vitastā ca tathā punar
dakṣiṇāyana kāle tu saṃprāpte ca avagāhanāt
param tri dina paryantam bhaveyuḥ tāḥ rajasvalāḥ

original: na tu sā śambhusaṃbandhān nityaśuddhā prakīrtitā /
analyzed: na tu sā śambhu saṃbandhāt nitya śuddhā prakīrtitā
jāhnavī saritām mukhyā sarva loka eka pāvanī
karakā kaluṣa ghnī yāḥ nāgāḥ ca etāḥ turīyakāt

original: divasāt prabhṛti proktās tisro rātrī rajasvalāḥ /
analyzed: divasāt prabhṛti proktāḥ tisraḥ rātrīḥ rajasvalāḥ
saptamī prabhṛti hi evam saritaḥ kāścana aparāḥ

original: nalinī nirmalā nārā gurvī garbhā garā dharā /
kṣurikā kāśikā śyāmā daśa proktā rajasvalāḥ // Ang_1.924 //
analyzed: kṣurikā kāśikā śyāmā daśa proktāḥ rajasvalāḥ

original: śarmiṣṭhā śayanā svāpā nava nadyo rajasvalāḥ // Ang_1.925 //
analyzed: śarmiṣṭhā śayanā svāpā nava nadyaḥ rajasvalāḥ
daśamī prabhṛti proktāḥ tisraḥ rātrīḥ manīṣibhiḥ

original: taptā tāpā tāpasā ca viśvāmitrā bṛhadvarā // Ang_1.926 //
analyzed: taptā tāpā tāpasā ca viśvāmitrā bṛhat varā

original: dhenā senā sanā somā nava nadyo rajasvalāḥ /
analyzed: dhenā senā sanā somāḥ nava nadyaḥ rajasvalāḥ
kathitāḥ tāḥ rajasvalāḥ

original: kalikā varuṇā vāmā somadā mahilā kalā / [107]
analyzed: kalikā varuṇā vāmā somadā mahilā kalā

original: tvaritā lulitā tārā ṣoḍaśaprabhṛti smṛtāḥ // Ang_1.928 //
analyzed: tvaritā lulitā tārā ṣoḍaśa prabhṛti smṛtāḥ
tisraḥ rātrīḥ āpagāḥ tāḥ mahā śuddhāḥ rajasvalāḥ

original: guṇāḍhyā guṇadā śeṣā sapta nadyaḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: guṇāḍhyā guṇadā śeṣā sapta nadyaḥ prakīrtitāḥ
ekonaviṃśati dina prabhṛti etāḥ rajasvalāḥ
śātadruḥ ca śatadruḥ ca varaṇī vāruṇī rasā
rajasvalā navā etāḥ syuḥ dvāviṃśati dināt itas
antar jalā kheya toyā bṛhat toyā sravat jalā
pañcaviṃśati āditaḥ vai vijñeyāḥ tāḥ rajasvalāḥ

original: aṣṭāviṃśatprabhṛti vai yāḥ kāścana janaiḥ kila /
analyzed: aṣṭāviṃśat prabhṛti vai yāḥ kāścana janaiḥ kila

original: nadīti nityaṃ kathyante khanyante ca tadā tadā // Ang_1.934 //
analyzed: nadī iti nityam kathyante khanyante ca tadā tadā
nadīgāḥ sindhugāḥ vā api parvata ādi samudbhavāḥ

original: yatra kutrāpi vā jātāḥ kṣudrā dīrghā jalairyutāḥ // Ang_1.935 //
analyzed: yatra kutra api vā jātāḥ kṣudrāḥ dīrghāḥ jalaiḥ yutāḥ
varṣā jalāḥ ca khanana jalāḥ lavaṇa śambarāḥ

original: sarvāstāḥ kathitāḥ sadbhir māsānte syū rajasvalāḥ // Ang_1.936 //
analyzed: sarvāḥ tāḥ kathitāḥ sadbhiḥ māsa ante syuḥ rajasvalāḥ
viśeṣeṇa adhunā proktāḥ sarvāsām saritām api
prasaṃgāt tad sva rūpasya māhātmyam ca tathāvidham

original: uktaprāyaṃ vijānīyād yā vā nityajalāḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: ukta prāyam vijānīyāt yāḥ vā nitya jalāḥ punar

original: uttamā iti tāḥ proktā nadīnāṃ sindhusaṃgataḥ // Ang_1.938 //
analyzed: uttamāḥ iti tāḥ proktāḥ nadīnām sindhu saṃgataḥ
ādhikyam tat prakathitam puṇya kṣetra ādinā tathā

original: kṣetraṃ cāpi tathā jñeyaṃ nadīyugmaikamelanāt // Ang_1.939 //
analyzed: kṣetram ca api tathā jñeyam nadī yugma eka melanāt
khanana utpanna salilā tad nyūnā kathitā tathā
khananāt ca adhika jalā tad śreṣṭhā vai smṛtā akhilaiḥ
pañca yojana paryanta pravahat salila uttamā
utpatti prabhṛti sthairya vahat salila saṃyutā

original: paramā cottamā ceti sā gaṅgeti ca phaṇyate /
analyzed: paramā ca uttamā ca iti sā gaṅgā iti ca phaṇyate

original: nadīnāṃ pravarā gaṅgā tajjalaṃ śrāddhakarmaṇi // Ang_1.942 //
analyzed: nadīnām pravarā gaṅgā tad jalam śrāddha karmaṇi

original: pāvanaṃ paramaṃ proktaṃ vamanaṃ madhu cocyate /
analyzed: pāvanam paramam proktam vamanam madhu ca ucyate
tat pretaparpaṭam sākṣāt pitḥṇām duḥkha vārakam

original: khaḍgapātraṃ hi kutapo dauhitro vā punaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: khaḍga pātram hi kutapaḥ dauhitraḥ vā punar smṛtaḥ
śiva nirmālyataḥ śrāddha vaiguṇyam tat praśāmyati
punaḥkaraṇa saṃprāptau śiva nirmālya yogataḥ

original: pranaṣṭaḥ prabhaveddoṣas te cātrāpi vadāmyuta // Ang_1.945 //
analyzed: pranaṣṭaḥ prabhavet doṣaḥ te ca atrā api vadāmi uta
punaḥśrāddha prakaraṇam
vipra vāntau agni nāśe piṇḍe ca vidalīkṛte
piṇḍa golaka saṃyoge dīpa nāśe tathā eva ca
rajasvalā anātha bhuktau buddhi pūrvam tathā eva ca
aśauca bhuktau āśauci saṃsparśe homa vismṛtau
atithau tad dina bhrāntyā saṃkalpa karaṇe vā
ekasmin eva divase pitroḥ vyatyāsataḥ kṛtaḥ

original: taddine copavāsaḥ syāt punaḥ śrāddhaṃ pare 'hani / [109]
analyzed: tad dine ca upavāsaḥ syāt punar śrāddham pare hani

original: ādyaśrāddhe tu bhuñjānaviprasya vamanaṃ yadi // Ang_1.949 //
analyzed: ādyaśrāddhe tu bhuñjāna viprasya vamanam yadi
yat te kṛṣṇā iti mantreṇa homam kuryāt yathāvidhi
ṣoḍaśa śrāddha bhuñjāna brāhmaṇaḥ tu vamet yadi
pretāhutiḥ tu kartavyā laukika agnau yathāvidhi
anumāsika ādi ucchiṣṭa vamane

original: anumāsike 'tra kartavya ucchiṣṭe vamanaṃ yadi // Ang_1.951 //
analyzed: anumāsike tra kartavyaḥ ucchiṣṭe vamanam yadi

original: kabale tu subhuñjāne tṛptiṃ caiva vinirdiśet /
analyzed: kabale tu su bhuñjāne tṛptim ca eva vinirdiśet
amāvāsyāmāsike ca brāhmaṇaḥ mukha niḥsrutam
tathā mahālayaśrāddhe pitṛ ādeḥ vamanam yadi
pitāmaha ādi vat kṛtvā śrāddha śeṣam samāpayet
ucchiṣṭa ucchiṣṭa saṃsparśe
ucchiṣṭena tu saṃspṛṣṭaḥ bhuñjānaḥ śrāddha karmaṇi

original: śeṣamannaṃ tu nāśnīyāt kartuḥ śrāddhasya kā gatiḥ // Ang_1.954 //
analyzed: śeṣam annam tu na aśnīyāt kartuḥ śrāddhasya kā gatiḥ
tad sthāna nāma gotreṇa hma āsana ādi tathā arcayet

original: annatyāgaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā pāvake juhuyāccarum // Ang_1.955 //
analyzed: anna tyāgam tatas kṛtvā pāvake juhuyāt carum
puruṣasūktena juhuyāt yāvat dvātriṃśat āhutiḥ
homa śeṣam samāpya atha śrāddha śeṣam samāpayet

original: akṛtvā tu samīpe tu brāhmaṇe vamanaṃ yadi /
analyzed: a kṛtvā tu samīpe tu brāhmaṇe vamanam yadi

original: punaḥ pākaṃ prakurvīta piṇḍadānaṃ yathāvidhi // Ang_1.957 //
analyzed: punar pākam prakurvīta piṇḍa dānam yathāvidhi

original: ucchiṣṭasparśanaṃ jñātvā tatpātraṃ ca vihāya ca /
analyzed: ucchiṣṭa sparśanam jñātvā tad pātram ca vihāya ca

original: tatpātraṃ parihatyātha bhūmiṃ samanulipya ca // Ang_1.958 // [110]
analyzed: tat pātram parihatya atha bhūmim samanulipya ca
tasya śīghram vidhāya eva sarvam annam praveṣṭayet

original: pariṣicya tataḥ paścād bhojayecca na doṣakṛt // Ang_1.959 //
analyzed: pariṣicya tatas paścāt bhojayet ca na doṣa kṛt
anyonya sparśe

original: śrāddhapaṅktau tu bhuñjānāv anyonyaṃ spṛśato yadi /
analyzed: śrāddha paṅktau tu bhuñjānau anyonyam spṛśataḥ yadi

original: dvau viprau visṛjedannaṃ bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret // Ang_1.960 //
analyzed: dvau viprau visṛjet annam bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇam caret
ucchiṣṭa ucchiṣṭa saṃsparśe śunā śūdreṇa vā tathā
upoṣya rajanīm ekām pañcagavyena śudhyati
indrāya somasūktena śrāddha vighnaḥ yadā bhavet
agni ādibhiḥ bhojanena śrāddham saṃpūrṇam eva hi
indrāya somasūktena bhojanena iti ca trayam

original: vidhānaṃ kathitaṃ samyag vyavasthā hyatra cocyate // Ang_1.963 //
analyzed: vidhānam kathitam samyak vyavasthā hi atra ca ucyate
piṇḍa dānāt param yasya kasyacid brāhmaṇasya vai

original: vamanācchrāddhavighne tu tadā sūktajapāddhi sā // Ang_1.964 //
analyzed: vamanāt śrāddha vighne tu tadā sūkta japāt hi sā
śrāddha saṃpūrṇa tā jñeyā tad pūrvam ced tu daivake
pitāmaha viṣṇu vamane

original: pitāmahe tatparasmin viṣṇvā vā vamane yadi // Ang_1.965 //
analyzed: pitāmahe tad parasmin viṣṇvā vā vamane yadi

original: homenaiva tadā jñeyā dvayoryadi tadā punaḥ /
analyzed: homena eva tadā jñeyāḥ dvayoḥ yadi tadā punar
tad sūkta japa homābhyām śrāddha saṃpūrṇa tā smṛtā
darśa ādau chardane
pitṛsthānasya viprasya vamane yadi darśake

original: punaḥ pākena tacchrāddhabhojanaṃ vihitaṃ tadā // Ang_1.967 // [111]
analyzed: punar pākena tat śrāddha bhojanam vihitam tadā
ābdike vā anumāse vā tad dina upoṣaṇam bhavet
pare hani punaḥśrāddham bhojanena eva na anyathā

original: eka eva yadā vipro bhonane chardito yadi /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva yadā vipraḥ bhonane charditaḥ yadi

original: ābdike tu pare 'hnyeva darśe vā yadi māsike // Ang_1.969 //
analyzed: ābdike tu pare hni eva darśe vā yadi māsike
tathā eva agnim samādhāya homam kuryāt yathāvidhi
tad sthāna nāma gotreṇa ca āsana ādi samarcayet
anna tyāgam prakurvīta tatas gnau juhuyāt carum
prāṇa ādi pañcabhiḥ mantraiḥ yāvat dvātriṃśat āhutiḥ
homa śeṣam samāpya atha śrāddha śeṣam samāpayet

original: punaḥ pākena sadyo vai śrāddhasya karaṇaṃ smṛtam // Ang_1.972 //
analyzed: punar pākena sadyas vai śrāddhasya karaṇam smṛtam
darśa ādiṣu eva kathitam na pratyabde kathaṃcana

original: pratyabdasya pare 'hnyeva sthānaṃ viprasya tatsmṛtam // Ang_1.973 //
analyzed: pratyabdasya pare hni eva sthānam viprasya tat smṛtam
upavāsa arthaḥ

original: upāvṛttistu pākebhyo yastu vāso guṇaiḥ saha // Ang_1.974 //
analyzed: upāvṛttiḥ tu pākebhyaḥ yaḥ tu vāsaḥ guṇaiḥ saha
upavāsaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ sarva bhoga vivarjitaḥ
aputrā sāpiṇḍyam
patnyāḥ kuryāt aputrāyāḥ patyuḥ mātrā ādibhiḥ saha
sāpiṇḍyam anuyāne tu janakena saha ātmajaḥ
anugamane

original: mṛtaṃ yānugatā nāthaṃ sā tena saha piṇḍanam // Ang_1.976 // [112]
analyzed: mṛtam yā anugatā nātham sā tena saha piṇḍanam
arhati svarga vāse yāvat ābhūtasaṃplavam
strī piṇḍam bhartṛ piṇḍena saṃyujya vidhivat punar
tredhā vibhajya tat piṇḍam kṣipet mātrā ādiṣu triṣu

original: bhartuḥ pitrādibhiḥ kuryād bhartrā patnyāstathaiva ca // Ang_1.978 //
analyzed: bhartuḥ pitṛ ādibhiḥ kuryāt bhartrā patnyāḥ tathā eva ca

original: sapatnyā vā 'sapatnyā vā na bheda iti gobhilaḥ /
analyzed: sapatnyā vā sapatnyā vā na bhedaḥ iti gobhilaḥ
ekādaśe hani ṣoḍaśam

original: kecidatra pṛthakprocus taṃ pakṣaṃ pravadāmyaham // Ang_1.979 //
analyzed: kecid atra pṛthak procuḥ tam pakṣam pravadāmi aham
ekacityām samārūḍhau dampatī nidhanam gatau
ekoddiṣṭam ṣoḍaśam ca pṛthak ekādaśe hani
dvādaśe hani saṃprāpte piṇḍam ekam dvayoḥ kṣipet
pitāmaha ādi piṇḍeṣu tam pituḥ viniyojayet

original: kecittameva piṇḍaṃ tu dvedhā kṛtvā tataḥ param /
analyzed: kecid tam eva piṇḍam tu dvedhā kṛtvā tatas param
udak bhāga gatam piṇḍam pitṛ varge niyojayet
yam dakṣiṇa sthitam piṇḍam mātṛ varge niyojayet
tad dine paredyus vā saha gamane śrāddham

original: atra kecitpunaḥ procuḥ prakārāntarataḥ kila // Ang_1.983 //
analyzed: atra kecid punar procuḥ prakāra antarataḥ kila
tad dine vā paredyus vā bhartāram anugacchati

original: bhartrā sahaiva śuddhiḥ syāt śrāddhaṃ caikadine bhavet // Ang_1.984 //
analyzed: bhartrā saha eva śuddhiḥ syāt śrāddham ca eka dine bhavet
paitṛkam maraṇam yatra tat eva āhuḥ pradhānakam

original: kecittu mātṛkaṃ prāhur evaṃ pakṣadvayaṃ smṛtam // Ang_1.985 // [113]
analyzed: kecid tu mātṛkam prāhuḥ evam pakṣa dvayam smṛtam
pracetāḥ atra ca uvāca sva matam tat pravacmi aham

original: bhartrā saha pramītāyāḥ mṛte 'hanyapare 'hni vā // Ang_1.986 //
analyzed: bhartrā saha pramītāyāḥ mṛte hani apare hni vā
āśaucam maraṇa uddiśya dahana ādi tayoḥ na tu

original: punaḥ pakṣāntaraṃ proktaṃ kaiścittatra maharṣibhiḥ // Ang_1.987 //
analyzed: punar pakṣa antaram proktam kaiścid tatra mahā ṛṣibhiḥ
pativratā tu anya dine nugacchet yā strī pati citti adhirohaṇena

original: daśāhato bharturaghasya śuddhiḥ śrāddhadvayaṃ syātpṛthagekakāle // Ang_1.988 //
analyzed: daśa ahataḥ bhartuḥ aghasya śuddhiḥ śrāddha dvayam syāt pṛthak eka kāle
tayoḥ āśauce maraṇa ādi
bhartāram anugacchantī patnī ced ārtavā yadi

original: tailadroṇyāṃ vinikṣipya lavaṇe vā svakaṃ patim // Ang_1.989 //
analyzed: taila droṇyām vinikṣipya lavaṇe vā svakam patim
param tri rātrāt dahanam kuryuḥ te bāndhavāḥ tayā

original: śrāddhaṃ caikadine kuryur dvayorapi hi nirṇayaḥ // Ang_1.990 //
analyzed: śrāddham ca eka dine kuryuḥ dvayoḥ api hi nirṇayaḥ
ekoddiṣṭam ṣoḍaśam ca bhartuḥ ekādaśe hani

original: dvādaśe 'hani saṃprāpte piṇḍamekaṃ dvayoḥ kṣipet // Ang_1.991 //
analyzed: dvādaśe hani saṃprāpte piṇḍam ekam dvayoḥ kṣipet
pitāmaha ādi piṇḍeṣu tam pituḥ viniyojayet

original: brahmavādimataṃ bhūyas tv anyadvakṣyāmi śobhanam // Ang_1.992 //
analyzed: brahma vādi matam bhūyas tu anyat vakṣyāmi śobhanam

original: dahyamānaṃ tu bhartāraṃ dṛṣṭvā nārī pativratā /
analyzed: dahyamānam tu bhartāram dṛṣṭvā nārī pativratā
anugacchet tayoḥ śrāddham pṛthak ekādaśe hani
śilā pratiṣṭhāpana ādi kṛtyam sarvam pṛthak pṛthak
ekatra eva prakurvīta pituḥ mātuḥ sa mantrakam
ṣoḍaśāntam pṛthakkṛtvā sāpiṇḍyam dvādaśe hani

original: pretatvāttu vimuktena saha mātuḥ sapiṇḍakam // Ang_1.995 // [114]
analyzed: preta tvāt tu vimuktena saha mātuḥ sapiṇḍakam
tad piṇḍa saṃyojanam
strī piṇḍam bhartṛ piṇḍena saṃyujya vidhivat punar

original: tredhā vibhajya taṃ piṇḍaṃ kṣipenmātrādiṣu triṣu // Ang_1.996 //
analyzed: tredhā vibhajya tam piṇḍam kṣipet mātrā ādiṣu triṣu
mātuḥ sāpiṇḍya abhāva sthalam
atra viṣṇuḥ matam svasya sulabhāya avadat kila

original: kṛte pituḥ sapiṇḍatve mātustu na sapiṇḍanam // Ang_1.997 //
analyzed: kṛte pituḥ sapiṇḍa tve mātuḥ tu na sapiṇḍanam

original: pitureva sapiṇḍatve tasyā api kṛtaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: pituḥ eva sapiṇḍa tve tasyāḥ api kṛtam bhavet

original: strīṇāṃ pṛthaṅ na kartavyā sapiṇḍīkaraṇakriyā // Ang_1.998 //
analyzed: strīṇām pṛthak na kartavyā sapiṇḍīkaraṇa kriyā
dattena pālaka pituḥ sāpiṇḍyam
anya gotra pradattaḥ ced tanayaḥ sva pituḥ tatas
pālakasya prakurvīta tat pitṛ ādi sapiṇḍanam
datta putra kṛtyam
vivādaḥ na atra kaḥ pi asti tādṛś datta sutaḥ pituḥ

original: svayaṃ tadbhinnagotro 'pi tadgotre yojayecca tam // Ang_1.1000 //
analyzed: svayam tad bhinna gotraḥ tad gotre yojayet ca tam
pitāmaha ādibhiḥ samyak yat prācīna eka gotrakaiḥ
datta pautrasya pitaram prapitāmaha mukhyakaiḥ

original: tyaktvā pitāmahaṃ tvanyagotraṃ samyak tataḥ param /
analyzed: tyaktvā pitāmaham tu anya gotram samyak tatas param
yojayet na atra sandehaḥ tad jam tad prapitāmaham
tyaktvā samyak vicāya eva sva gotraiḥ eva yojanam

original: kuryāttadvidhinā no cet pitḥṇāṃ saṃkaro bhavet // Ang_1.1003 //
analyzed: kuryāt tad vidhinā no ced pitḥṇām saṃkaraḥ bhavet
tena doṣaḥ ca su mahān prabhavet eva durghaṭaḥ
datta putra udbhavaḥ yatnāt sapiṇḍīkaraṇe pituḥ
tyajet pitāmaham yatnāt tad putraḥ prapitāmaham
tad putraḥ ced tatas vṛddhaprapitāmaham eva vai
evam mātuḥ sapiṇḍe tu datta putra udbhavaḥ caret
anya gotra dattaḥ
yadi anya gotra jaḥ dattaḥ santatau tad paraṃparām
catur kula eka paryantam jātānām saṅkaṭam mahat
tasmin sapiṇḍīkaraṇe tadānīm samupasthite
bhavati eva hi tat paścāt pañcama ādi yathākramam

original: svayameva bhavettāvat tadvarge janmināṃ mahat // Ang_1.1008 //
analyzed: svayam eva bhavet tāvat tad varge janminām mahat

original: avekṣaṇaṃ jāgarūkatā ca nitye smṛte tarām /
analyzed: avekṣaṇam jāgarūka tā ca nitye smṛte tarām
tasmāt sagotre tanayam saṃgṛhṇīyāt aputrakaḥ

original: śiṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ pūrvameva mayā samyaṅ nirūpitam /
analyzed: śiṣṭam sarvam pūrvam eva mayā samyak nirūpitam

original: putre jāte tato bhūyaḥ putrasvīkaraṇādatha // Ang_1.1010 //
analyzed: putre jāte tatas bhūyas putra svīkaraṇāt atha
jātaḥ dhikaḥ pradatta āttu dharmataḥ sarva karmasu

original: pituḥ śrāddhasya ṣaṇmāsāt pūrvaṃ prabhṛti kṛtyam
analyzed: pituḥ śrāddhasya ṣaṣ māsāt pūrvam prabhṛti kṛtyam

original: pitroḥ śrāddhasya ṣaṇmāsāt pūrvameva tadā tadā // Ang_1.1011 //
analyzed: pitroḥ śrāddhasya ṣaṣ māsāt pūrvam eva tadā tadā
śrāddha smṛtim prakurvan vai kathāḥ kāścana santatam
prakurvan sva janaiḥ tiṣṭhet iṣṭān kāṃścid viśeṣakān
tila māṣa vrīhi yavān guḍa mudga ādikān madhu
kanda mūla ādikān kāṃścid vastra kārpāsaka ādikān
saṃgṛhya sthāpayet yatnāt divya candana khaṇḍakam
divya uśīram guggulum ca nikṣipet ca avanī tale
śuṣkān śalāṭukān kāṃścid gopayet śrāddha hetave
vṛkṣeṣu kāṃścid yatnena bhūmi antar bhū tale tathā
kusūleṣu dukūleṣu punar kumbha ghaṭeṣu ca
sthāpayet nikṣipet evam nikhanet kāṃścid api uta
samīcīnāni vastūni dṛṣṭa mātrāṇi ced tadā

original: śrāddhārthamiti niścitya proktvā svīyaiśca kevalam // Ang_1.1017 //
analyzed: śrāddha artham iti niścitya proktvā svīyaiḥ ca kevalam
gopayitvā eva yatnena sthāpayet pālayet api
tad ukti tad kathā tṛptāḥ pitaraḥ nityam eva vai
āśīrbhiḥ enam satatam vardhayanti api tāritāḥ
kathā tṛptiḥ

original: bhavanti kathayā svarge pitṛloke ca te 'niśam // Ang_1.1019 //
analyzed: bhavanti kathayā svarge pitṛ loke ca te niśam
kathayā tṛptiḥ eteṣām smṛtyā uktyā vacanāt api
tadīya kṛtya saṃbhāṣā priya vastu pracāraṇaiḥ
vidyamāna agniḥ api tri dināt pūrvam punar
yatnāt dina trayāt pūrvam vidyamāna agniḥ api alam
punaḥsaṃdhāna vidhinā śrāddhāya agnim su saṃskriyāt
śrāddha dine varjyam

original: aupāsanaṃ vinā homam anyaṃ homaṃ tu taddine /
analyzed: aupāsanam vinā homam anyam homam tu tad dine

original: na kuryādeva vidhinā yadi kuryāttu tatpatet // Ang_1.1022 // [117]
analyzed: na kuryāt eva vidhinā yadi kuryāt tu tat patet
śrāddha dine dāna japa ādi na kartavyam
dāna adhyayana deva arcā japa homa vrata ādikān
na kuryāt śrāddha divase prāk viprāṇām visarjanāt
na dadyāt yācamānebhyaḥ phala puṣpa jala akṣatān
taṇḍulān dadhi takra ājya śāka pātra tṛṇa sthalam
kāṣṭha mūla kanda bhāṇḍa vidyā pustaka bhūṣaṇam

original: ṛṇamevaṃ dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ celaṃ vā 'nugrahādikam // Ang_1.1025 //
analyzed: ṛṇam evam dhanam dhānyam celam vā nugraha ādikam
kalyāṇa vārtā kopa ādi cāṭu pāruṣya bhāṣaṇam
bāla nigraha tad grāha tad sallāpa ādi varjayet
uccais saṃbhāṣaṇam hasta tāḍanam hasanam vṛthā
durālāpam duṣṭa loka bhāṣaṇam duṣṭa śikṣaṇam
na etāni kuryāt yatnena pratyabde tu viśeṣataḥ
mṛtāhe darśe
darśa ādiṣu mṛtāhaḥ ced mṛtāham pūrvam ācaret
paścāddarśam prakurvīta pitroḥ eva ayam ucyate
mātāmahasya tad patnyā sāpatnī mātuḥ eva ca
pituḥ śrāddha sama tvena procuḥ kila mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: darśe samāgataṃ manvādikaṃ śrāddhaṃ samācaret // Ang_1.1030 //
analyzed: darśe samāgatam manu ādikam śrāddham samācaret
darśa siddhiḥ tāvatā syāt daivata aikyena kevalam

original: sapiṇḍakamapiṇḍaṃ vā daivataikye pṛthaṅ na tu // Ang_1.1031 //
analyzed: sapiṇḍakam apiṇḍam vā daivata aikye pṛthak na tu
kāryam bhavati tat śrāddham bhinna daivatake punar
nitya naimittike prāpte

original: pūrvaṃ naimittikaṃ kāryaṃ pratyabde yadi tattadā // Ang_1.1032 //
analyzed: pūrvam naimittikam kāryam pratyabde yadi tat tadā
pratyabdam āgatam pratyāsatti yoga vaśāt caret

original: pituḥ śrāddhaṃ prathamato mātuḥ śrāddhaṃ tataḥ param // Ang_1.1033 //
analyzed: pituḥ śrāddham prathamatas mātuḥ śrāddham tatas param
paścāt mātāmahasya api tad patnyāḥ ca tatas param
paścāt sapatnī mātuḥ syāt paścāt patnyā prakīrtitam
suta bhrātṛ pitṛvyāṇām mātula ādi kramāt smṛtam
darśe bahu śrāddha saṃbhave
pitṛ ādi bhinna śrāddhānām kāruṇyānām yadā punar
darśa ādiṣu āgatānām ced mṛtāhānām tadā param
darśa ādikam samāpya eva kāruṇya śrāddham ācaret
kecid patnyāḥ pitṛvyasya tad patnyāḥ ca samāgamam

original: darśādiṣu mṛtāhaṃ vai pūrvaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ param // Ang_1.1037 //
analyzed: darśa ādiṣu mṛtāham vai pūrvam kṛtvā tatas param
darśa ādikam anuṣṭheyam iti procuḥ ca tad kṛtau
tasmāt yathāruci param ātma tṛptiḥ praśasyate
vastutas punar vacmi pitṛvyaḥ yadi kevalam

original: etasya paramo mukhyas tatpatnī vāpi patnyapi // Ang_1.1039 //
analyzed: etasya paramaḥ mukhyaḥ tad patnī vā api patnī api
mātṛ tva kārya kāraṇe mahatī su mahatī api

original: tadā cettanmṛtāhaṃ tu pūrvaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ punaḥ // Ang_1.1040 // [119]
analyzed: tadā ced tat mṛtā aham tu pūrvam kṛtvā tatas punar

original: darśādikaṃ prakurvīta na cette kevalā yadi /
analyzed: darśa ādikam prakurvīta na ced te kevalāḥ yadi

original: nāmamātreṇa kathitās tadā darśādikaṃ purā // Ang_1.1041 //
analyzed: nāma mātreṇa kathitāḥ tadā darśa ādikam purā
kṛtvā eva paścāt tat śrāddham kāruṇyānām iti sthitiḥ

original: sarvatraivaṃ prakathitaṃ svāminaḥ sakhyureva vā // Ang_1.1042 //
analyzed: sarvatra evam prakathitam svāminaḥ sakhyuḥ eva vā
purohita ācāryayoḥ ca pratyāsatti prabhedataḥ
śrāddhasya karaṇam proktam punar api upakāriṇaḥ
teṣām teṣām kriyā bhedāt śrāddha anuṣṭhānam ucyate
sarvatra eva ātma tuṣṭiḥ syāt viduṣaḥ parama uttamā
keṣāṃcid kalpa prakāraḥ
punar viśeṣaḥ kaḥ pi asti pravakṣyāmi atra tam punar

original: yatastāto yato vṛttir yato jīvo yataḥ prasūḥ // Ang_1.1045 //
analyzed: yatas tātaḥ yatas vṛttiḥ yatas jīvaḥ yatas prasūḥ
sa svīkṛtaḥ śrāddhatithiḥ bhraṣṭa tyakta pitā api vā
darśa ādi śrāddha paratas mṛtāha śrāddham ācaret
pitrā atyanta eka kalahe dhāvana avasare sute

original: jāte naṣṭe ca pitari tathā mātari tatparam // Ang_1.1047 //
analyzed: jāte naṣṭe ca pitari tathā mātari tat param
alpa kāla mṛtāyām tu tad tad grāma sthitaiḥ api

original: tadā tadā pālito yo daivājjīvanpravardhitaḥ // Ang_1.1048 //
analyzed: tadā tadā pālitaḥ yaḥ daivāt jīvan pravardhitaḥ
dṛṣṭa mātraiḥ bālye eva viprabudhya eva taiḥ tarām
saṃskṛtaḥ ca adhyāpitaḥ ca jñāta a jñāta eka gotrakaḥ
ajñāta grāma tāta ādiḥ jñāta jātiḥ jana uktitaḥ

original: tato vidvān mahātmā yo yatastāta iti smṛtaḥ // Ang_1.1050 //
analyzed: tatas vidvān mahātmā yaḥ yatas tātaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
evam eva tathā anyaḥ tathā avasthā prabhedataḥ
yata utpattiḥ tu kathitā ajñāta grāma saṃbhavaḥ
sva jīvana prakāram yaḥ bālye dvādaśa vārṣikāt

original: na vetti naṣṭajanako yatotpattistu kathyate // Ang_1.1052 //
analyzed: na vetti naṣṭa janakaḥ yatas utpattiḥ tu kathyate
mātaram yaḥ na jānāti svakīya jana śūnyataḥ

original: tathā pitrādikān sarvān procyate 'sau yataḥ prasūḥ // Ang_1.1053 //
analyzed: tathā pitṛ ādikān sarvān procyate sau yatas prasūḥ
te ete kila sarve api vipad kāla samudbhavāḥ
naṣṭa pitṛ ādika janāḥ daivāt saṃprāpta jīvanāḥ
yaiḥ ca kaiścid dṛṣṭa mātraiḥ viprabudhya eka pālitaiḥ
avasthā bhedataḥ sarve tad tad nāma aṅkitāḥ smṛtāḥ
catvāraḥ kathitāḥ sadbhiḥ ati duḥkha eka jīvitam

original: atibālye tato bhūyo yauvane prāptasaṃpadaḥ // Ang_1.1056 //
analyzed: ati bālye tatas bhūyas yauvane prāpta saṃpadaḥ
daiva yogena vidvāṃsaḥ karmaṭhāḥ ca api vā bhavan

original: piturmṛtatithiṃ yo vā jñātvā bālyena kevalam // Ang_1.1057 //
analyzed: pituḥ mṛta tithim yaḥ vā jñātvā bālyena kevalam
svayam eva śrāddha hetoḥ mārgaśīrṣe hi ama ādikam
śāstra dṛṣṭyā samālocya gṛṇan
sva svīkṛta śrāddha tithiḥ ucyate brahma vādibhiḥ
bhraṣṭa kriyā

original: madyapānādinā bhraṣṭaḥ pitā yasya babhūva vai // Ang_1.1059 //
analyzed: madya pāna ādinā bhraṣṭaḥ pitā yasya babhūva vai
mṛteḥ tasya param proṣya caturviṃśati vārṣikam
bhraṣṭa kriyā prakartavyā putreṇa

original: tasya śrāddhaṃ tataḥ kāryaṃ tādṛśasya durātmanaḥ /
analyzed: tasya śrāddham tatas kāryam tādṛśasya durātmanaḥ

original: tādṛkpitṛkriyākartā sa u bhraṣṭapitā smṛtaḥ // Ang_1.1061 //
analyzed: tādṛś pitṛ kriyā kartā saḥ u bhraṣṭa pitā smṛtaḥ
pituḥ tu bhraṃśa mātreṇa na ayam bhraṣṭa pitā bhavet
tādṛś karma eka karaṇa samayāt atha tādṛśaḥ
sarvathā patitasya pañcaviṃśat varṣāt param kriyā ārambhaḥ
bhavati api tathā tyakta pitā ca api prakathyate

original: svayaṃ caṇḍālatāṃ budhyā prāpto yo svajanairapi // Ang_1.1063 //
analyzed: svayam caṇḍāla tām budhyā prāptaḥ sva janaiḥ api
bahiṣkṛtaḥ ca saṃtyaktaḥ tādṛśam pitaram mṛtam

original: pañcaviṃśativarṣebhyaḥ paraṃ putraḥ sa śāstrataḥ // Ang_1.1064 //
analyzed: pañcaviṃśati varṣebhyaḥ param putraḥ sa śāstrataḥ
ṣaṣ abdam ṣaḍguṇa tvena varṣayitvā atikṛcchrakaiḥ
mahākṛcchraiḥ taptakṛcchraiḥ parākāti śataiḥ api
cāpa agra snāna śanakaiḥ mantra kumbha sahasrakaiḥ
go sahasraiḥ vidhānena saṃskuryāt tasya kevalam
pratisaṃvatsaram paścāt tādṛś śrāddha karaḥ tu yaḥ

original: sa u tyaktapitā jñeyas ta ete tanayāḥ sadā // Ang_1.1067 //
analyzed: saḥ u tyakta pitā jñeyaḥ te ete tanayāḥ sadā

original: evaṃjātīyakā ye syus te sarve dharmatatparāḥ /
analyzed: evaṃjātīyakāḥ ye syuḥ te sarve dharma tatparāḥ
darśa ādi śrāddha paratas mṛtāhaśrādvam ācaret
teṣām śrāddha eka karaṇam eteṣām svasya kevalam

original: pratyavāyaikaśūnyāya na ceddoṣo mahān bhavet // Ang_1.1069 //
analyzed: pratyavāya eka śūnyāya na ced doṣaḥ mahān bhavet
tad saṃbhūta mahā doṣa parihārāya vā na ced

original: prāptaye karmaṭhatvasya na cedasya tu kevalam // Ang_1.1070 //
analyzed: prāptaye karmaṭha tvasya na ced asya tu kevalam
śrāddha tyāgāt pratyavāyaḥ bhavet tasmāt tathā caret

original: nityaṃ teṣāṃ mṛtāheṣu dānadharmādikaṃ caret // Ang_1.1071 //
analyzed: nityam teṣām mṛta aheṣu dāna dharma ādikam caret
viprāṇām bhojanāt pūrvam niyamaḥ yam udāhṛtaḥ
durātmanām viśeṣeṇa pūrvavat doṣa śāntaye
śrāddha mukteḥ param teṣām na kuryāt bhūri bhojanam
śrāddha aṅga tarpaṇam pare hani
paredyus vā prayatnena śrāddha aṅga tila tarpaṇam

original: sadya eva prakartavyaṃ pūrvaṃ paścāttu vā tathā /
analyzed: sadyas eva prakartavyam pūrvam paścāt tu vā tathā

original: abhiśravaṇamevaṃ syād ekenaiva hi kāritam // Ang_1.1074 //
analyzed: abhiśravaṇam evam syāt ekena eva hi kāritam
na anna sūktam tyāga kāle prācīnāvītikam na tu
agnaukaraṇa home piṃ tat ca āvaśyakam ucyate
uddeśa tyāga kāle savyam
uddeśa tyāga kāle ca savyam eva bhavet hi vai
madhu vāta ādi ante na

original: madhuvātādikaṃ mukter ante naiva vadedapi // Ang_1.1076 //
analyzed: madhu vāta ādikam mukteḥ ante nā eva vadet api
vikiram na kuryāt

original: vikiraṃ naiva kurvīta nityakarmāṇi yāni vā /
analyzed: vikiram na eva kurvīta nityakarmāṇi yāni vā

original: tāni sarvāṇi sarvatra dhṛtvā puṇḍraṃ vidhānataḥ // Ang_1.1077 // [123]
analyzed: tāni sarvāṇi sarvatra dhṛtvā puṇḍram vidhānataḥ
nivedita annataḥ pañcayajña ante tithi pūjanāt

original: pūrvaṃ teṣāṃ prakartavyaṃ pratyabdādikakarma vai // Ang_1.1078 //
analyzed: pūrvam teṣām prakartavyam pratyabda ādika karma vai

original: teṣāṃ śrāddhe tyāgamātrāt kṛte sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: teṣām śrāddhe tyāga mātrāt kṛte sarvam kṛtam bhavet
vamane

original: api prāpte 'pi vamane pitṛsthānasya vā kimu // Ang_1.1079 //
analyzed: api prāpte vamane pitṛsthānasya vā kimu

original: na punaḥ karaṇaṃ kuryāc chrāddhaśeṣaṃ samāpayet /
analyzed: na punar karaṇam kuryāt śrāddha śeṣam samāpayet
pāda prakṣālane teṣām maṇḍala anarcanam bhavet
pāda prakṣālana arthāya pradeyam udakam param

original: ta ete nikhilā dharmā mṛtāhe kevalaṃ smṛtāḥ // Ang_1.1081 //
analyzed: te ete nikhilāḥ dharmāḥ mṛtāhe kevalam smṛtāḥ

original: na darśādiṣu vijñeyās tatra dharmā yathoktitaḥ /
analyzed: na darśa ādiṣu vijñeyāḥ tatra dharmāḥ yathā uktitaḥ
prakartavyāḥ viśeṣeṇa tyanta kutsitaḥ

original: mṛtāha eva kathito nānyato yatra kutracit /
analyzed: mṛtāhaḥ eva kathitaḥ na anyatas yatra kutracid

original: śrāddhānte vā paredyurvā śakto yaḥ pitṛkarmaṇi // Ang_1.1083 //
analyzed: śrāddha ante vā paredyus vā śaktaḥ yaḥ pitṛ karmaṇi
na kuryāt mohataḥ tūṣṇīm viprāṇām bhūri bhojanam

original: ardhatṛptā hi pitaro bhaveyurnātra saṃśayaḥ // Ang_1.1084 //
analyzed: ardha tṛptāḥ hi pitaraḥ bhaveyuḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ
kartuḥ bhojana abhāve

original: śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā tu yo mūḍho na bhuṅkte pitṛsevitam /
analyzed: śrāddham kṛtvā tu yaḥ mūḍhaḥ na bhuṅkte pitṛ sevitam
iṣṭaiḥ putraiḥ bandhubhiḥ ca brāhmaṇaiḥ bahma vādibhiḥ
ācāyaiḥ gurubhiḥ sadbhiḥ āgata abhyāgataiḥ api

original: pitaro naiva tṛptāḥ syur bhuñjīyāttena tṛptitaḥ // Ang_1.1086 //
analyzed: pitaraḥ na eva tṛptāḥ syuḥ bhuñjīyāt tena tṛptitaḥ
tat vaṃśyānām arbhakāṇām viprabhukteḥ anantaram
tad kāṃkṣitāni vastūni bhakṣya ādīni phalāni api
svacchandanaḥ pradeyāni tāvat mātreṇa te param
atituṣṭāḥ mahā tuṣṭāḥ parituṣṭāḥ praharṣitāḥ
pūjitāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti tasmāt bāla manoratham
pūrayet pitṛ tṛpti artham tat dineṣu viśeṣataḥ

original: tṛptāḥ stheti tathā prokte trivāraṃ pitṛsūnunā /
analyzed: tṛptāḥ stha iti tathā prokte tri vāram pitṛ sūnunā

original: bhāvayanti tadā taṃ vai cetasā tu vayaṃ tathā // Ang_1.1090 //
analyzed: bhāvayanti tadā tam vai cetasā tu vayam tathā

original: tṛptā jātāstathā tvaṃ ca tṛpto yadi tadā vayam /
analyzed: tṛptāḥ jātāḥ tathā tvam ca tṛptaḥ yadi tadā vayam

original: tṛptā bhūma na cenno 'dya kā tṛptiriti vai tarām // Ang_1.1091 //
analyzed: tṛptāḥ bhūma na ced naḥ dya kā tṛptiḥ iti vai tarām

original: dūyamānana manasā tiṣṭhanti kila tena vai /
analyzed: dūyamāna manasā tiṣṭhanti kila tena vai

original: samyagbhuñjīta vai pūrvaṃ yathā kurvan bhujikriyām // Ang_1.1092 //
analyzed: samyak bhuñjīta vai pūrvam yathā kurvan bhuji kriyām

original: atṛptā eva no te syur iṣṭaiḥ putraiśca bandhubhiḥ /
analyzed: atṛptāḥ eva no te syuḥ iṣṭaiḥ putraiḥ ca bandhubhiḥ
vipra alaṃkaraṇe jāte gṛha alaṃkaraṇam bhavet
patnī ādīnām alaṃkāraḥ śiṣṭa brāhmaṇa bhojanam

original: anveva bhojanaṃ taṣāṃ taddine kriyate tu yat // Ang_1.1094 //
analyzed: anu eva bhojanam taṣām tad dine kriyate tu yat

original: tatsarvaṃ prītaye teṣāṃ bhavedevaṃ na cānyathā /
analyzed: tat sarvam prītaye teṣām bhavet evam na ca anyathā

original: yadvā tadvā prakartavyaṃ tattatsarvaṃ prayatnataḥ // Ang_1.1095 //
analyzed: yat vā tat vā prakartavyam tat tat sarvam prayatnataḥ
anantaram vipra bhukteḥ pitṛ udvāmanataḥ param

original: tatpūrvaṃ lavamātraṃ vā vastu kiñcidapi svayam // Ang_1.1096 //
analyzed: tat pūrvam lava mātram vā vastu kiñcid api svayam
na dadyāt śrāddha kṛt vācā dāsyāmi iti vadet na vā
tila droṇa vrayaḥ
tila droṇa vrayam kuryāt tad dine samupasthite
bhakṣyāḥ tila mayāḥ kāryāḥ tila kalkam viśeṣataḥ
tila cūrṇam taila piṣṭam tila bharjanam api uta
tila arcanam tila mukham rakṣaḥ hananam ācaret
tilaiḥ vikiraṇam kuryāt dravya lopeṣu kṛtsnaśas

original: samīcīnaṃ tilaiḥ kuryāt tilāḥ syuḥ somadevatāḥ /
analyzed: samīcīnam tilaiḥ kuryāt tilāḥ syuḥ soma devatāḥ

original: somaḥ pitḥṇāmādhāraḥ somāyaiva tu hūyate // Ang_1.1100 //
analyzed: somaḥ pitḥṇām ādhāraḥ somāya eva tu hūyate

original: so 'yaṃ hi pitṛbhiḥ prītas taddattaṃ kavyamuttamam /
analyzed: saḥ yam hi pitṛbhiḥ prītaḥ tad dattam kavyam uttamam
soma tṛptyā eka janakam tasmāt soma hutam haviḥ

original: tatkalāvṛddhijanakaṃ sā kalā pīyate hi taiḥ /
analyzed: tat kalā vṛddhi janakam sā kalā pīyate hi taiḥ

original: vasvādibhiḥ pitṛbhistu tadeva tattilaiḥ sadā // Ang_1.1102 //
analyzed: vasu ādibhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ tu tat eva tat tilaiḥ sadā
sarva śrāddheṣu pitaraḥ pūjanīyāḥ viśeṣataḥ
darśa śrāddham tarpaṇa svarūpeṇa
sarva abhāve viśeṣeṇa tilaiḥ jala vimiśritaiḥ
darśa ādikāni śrāddhāni kāryāṇi eva sa mantrataḥ

original: svadhā namastarpayāmi pitaraṃ ca pitāmaham // Ang_1.1104 //
analyzed: svadhā namaḥ tarpayāmi pitaram ca pitāmaham
prapitāmaham evam ca vasu ādika mayān tathā
nāma gotra eka saṃyuktān śrāddham kṛtvā api tat param
tad aṅga tarpaṇam kāryam mṛtasya ādau tilodakam
samārabhya kriyāḥ kāryāḥ tasmāt santaḥ tilodakam
prayamaśrāddham eva ūcuḥ śrāddha pratividhi tvataḥ
tat eva ūcuḥ ca nikhilāḥ durbalānām hita icchavaḥ
samālokya eva śāstrāṇi śruti mūlāni te purā

original: manvādayo mahātmānas tilā syustādṛśāḥ kila // Ang_1.1108 //
analyzed: manu ādayaḥ mahātmānaḥ syuḥ tādṛśāḥ kila
sa tilaiḥ vidyate śrāddham vinā sarvatra kevalam
mukhya dravyaiḥ tilaiḥ adbhiḥ paitṛkam nikhilam bhavet
sarveṣām karmaṇām ādyāḥ āpaḥ eva viśeṣataḥ
paramāḥ kāraṇāni iha tasmāt brāhmaṇa puṃgavāḥ

original: apa eva samāśritya varṣante toyadā mahat /
analyzed: apaḥ eva samāśritya varṣante toya dāḥ mahat

aṣṭamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

analyzed: bhoktḥṇām samatām yāti tiryagyonim ca gacchati
śūdra anna bhojane

original: śūdre vedaphalaṃ yāti śūdratvaṃ ca sa gacchati // Ang_2,8.2 //
analyzed: śūdre veda phalam yāti śūdra tvam ca sa gacchati
śūdram praśasya svastivacane

original: praśasya svasti cetyuktvā bhoktā eva na saṃśayaḥ // Ang_2,8.3 //

ete doṣāḥ bhavanti iha śūdra annasya parigrahe

original: pratigṛhya pradātavyaṃ na bhuñjīta svayaṃ tataḥ // Ang_2,8.6 //
analyzed: pratigṛhya pradātavyam na bhuñjīta svayam tatas

analyzed: japataḥ juhvataḥ vā api gatiḥ ūrdhvam na vidyate
ṣaṣ māsam bhuktau
ṣaṭ māsān atha yaḥ bhuṅkte śūdrasya annam nirantaram

original: jīvanneva bhavecchūdro mṛtaḥ śvā cābhijāyate // Ang_2,8.8 //
analyzed: jīvan eva bhavet śūdraḥ mṛtaḥ śvā ca abhijāyate

original: vaiśyāttu sarvadhānyāni śadrāddhānyaṃ na kiṃcana // Ang_2,8.10 //

original: śūdraveśmani viprāṇāṃ kṣīraṃ vā yadi vā dadhi // Ang_2,8.14 //

original: aśṛtaṃ cāranālaṃ ca tāmbūlaṃ saktavastilāḥ // Ang_2,8.17 //

original: pibetpānīyamajñānād bhuṅakte vā saṃspṛśeta vā // Ang_2,8.19 //

original: daśarātraṃ pivedvajraṃ brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇasya tu // Ang_2,9.1 //

original: dīkṣitānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ rājñāṃ sarvanidhestathā // Ang_2,9.4 //

original: teṣu sarveṣu saṃcintya pādamekaṃ samācaret // Ang_2,10.21 //

original: uṣṇe varṣati śīte vā mārute vāti vā bhṛśam /
analyzed: uṣṇe varṣati śīte vā mārute vāti vā bhṛśam

original: anena vidhinā goghno yastu gā anugacchati /

atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi prāyaścitta vidhim śubham

original: yamadhītya vimuñcanti śrutvā smṛtvā ca vai dvijāḥ // Ang_2,12.1 //
analyzed: yam adhītya vimuñcanti śrutvā smṛtvā ca vai dvijāḥ

original: sadā triṣavaṇaṃ snāyāt sakṛtsnātvā payaḥ pibet / [150]
analyzed: sadā triṣavaṇam snāyāt sakṛt snātvā payaḥ pibet

original: prātaḥ snātvā samārambhaṃ kuryājjapyaṃ tu nityaśaḥ // Ang_2,12.2 //
analyzed: prātar snātvā samārambham kuryāt japyam tu nityaśas

original: oṃkāramāditaḥ kṛtvā rūpe rūpe tathāntaram // Ang_2,12.3 //

original: āsanaṃ śalyaviddhaṃ syād amadhaḥśāyī bhavetsadā // Ang_2,12.4 //
analyzed: āsanam śalya viddham syāt bhavet sadā

original: gomūtreṇa tu saṃyuktaṃ yāvakaṃ tatpibeddvijaḥ // Ang_2,12.6 //

original: praṇavātta samārambho nāmnā vajramiti smṛtam // Ang_2,12.7 //

etad pātaka yuktānām prāyaścittam vidhīyate

original: mahāpātakasaṃyuktā varṣaiḥ śudhyanti te tribhiḥ // Ang_2,12.8 //
analyzed: mahāpātaka saṃyuktāḥ varṣaiḥ śudhyanti te tribhiḥ
atha upapātakāḥ cintyāḥ tathā kālam samādiśet

original: kālasya tu yathoktasya brāhmaṇastatra kāraṇam // Ang_2,12.9 //
analyzed: kālasya tu yathā uktasya brāhmaṇaḥ tatra kāraṇam

original: brāhmaṇā eva ca kṣetraṃ brāhmaṇā eva daivatam /
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ eva ca kṣetram brāhmaṇāḥ eva daivatam

original: brāhmaṇānāṃ prasādena sūryo divi virājate // Ang_2,12.10 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇānām prasādena sūryaḥ divi virājate
na brāhmaṇa samam kṣetram na brāhmaṇa samaḥ nalaḥ

original: vidhirna brāhmaṇādūrdhvaṃ na daivaṃ brāhmaṇātparam // Ang_2,12.11 // [151]
analyzed: vidhiḥ na brāhmaṇāt ūrdhvam na daivam brāhmaṇāt param

original: japatāṃ juhvatāṃ caiva yacchato ca satāmapi /
analyzed: japatām juhvatām ca eva ca satām api
kṣetraḥ gneḥ tu su saṃbhūtaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ viśiṣyate

original: na skandate na vyathate na vinaśyati karhicit /
analyzed: na skandate na vyathate na vinaśyati karhicit
variṣṭham agnihotrebhthaḥ brāhmaṇasya mukhe hutam
devanā pitṛ bhūtānām kācid bhavati kasyacid

original: brāhmaṇe devatāḥ sarvāḥ sa ca sarvasya devatā // Ang_2,12.14 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇe devatāḥ sarvāḥ sa ca sarvasya devatā
yaḥ hi yām devatām icchet ārādhayitum avyayam
sarva upāya prayatnena toṣayet brāhmaṇān sadā
samasta saṃpad samavāpti hetavaḥ samutthita āpad ku lakṣma ketavaḥ
apāra saṃsāra samudra setavaḥ punantu mām brāhmaṇa pāda pāṃsavaḥ
iti āṅgirasa dharmaśāstre kṛcchrādisvarūpakathanam nāma dvādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
iti uttarāṅgirasam
iti āṅgirasa smṛtiḥ
